1b1(mdo sde): //rgyu gar skad du/Ar+ya ma hA pa ri nirbAN nA mA ma hA yAn s+yAt+ma/bod skad
1b2(mdo sde): du/'phags pa yongs su mya ngan los 'das pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo//ba ma
1b3(mdo sde): pa drang po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
1b4(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ku shi
2a1(mdo sde): na/chu klung gser ldan gyi 'gram gyad kyi nyen kor shrIng sA la zung gi tshal na bzhugs te/de na bcom
2a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das dge slong byi ba 'bum phrag brgyad cus bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas te/dpyid zla tha chung zla ba nye ba'i nang
2a3(mdo sde): par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus dang nye bar gyur pa na/sems can thams cad kyi rang rang gi yul gyi skad
2a4(mdo sde): du shin tu zur phyin par don brda sprod pa'i tshig rnams kyis/srid pa'i rtse mo man chad go bar mdzad de/deng de bzhin
2a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba can
2b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa/sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa skyabs chen po'i gnas
2b2(mdo sde): dang gzhi por gyur pa thob pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'dib bur 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/sems can thams
2b3(mdo sde): cad kyi zhu ba lung bstan pa tha ma la de lta bu'i gsung rnams byung bar gyur to/gzhan yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi
2b4(mdo sde): zhal nas 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmyur po dang /dkar po dang /shel gyi
2b5(mdo sde): kha dog dang /rdo'i snying po'i kha dge lta bu dgu byung ste/'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
2b6(mdo sde): khams dang /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgus
3a1(mdo sde): dang /lha ma yin dang /grwashin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag la phog nas/de
3a2(mdo sde): mod la nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad dang /ngan song dang /mi khom pa thams cad rgyun chad par gyur to//de nas
3a3(mdo sde): mya ngan chen pos non te tshig mthun par kye ma khebs so khe bas so zhes kyang zer to//kyi hud kyi hud ces kyang skad tsher 'bod cing lag
3a4(mdo sde): po brkyang bas kyang mgo bo la rdobs shing lus 'dar zhing shin tu ngu'o//de'i tshe sa chen po nags tshal dang bcasA ri dang bcas pa'i
3a5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i mthus gtugs pa'ang rab tu g.yos te/sems can dri dag kyang gcig la gcig 'dzin cing /'di skad du grogs po
3a6(mdo sde): dag rings grogs po dag rings/gyad yul gyi grong khyer ku shir 'dong ngo 'dong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
3b1(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa las bzlog lnga bsgrim mi dgos par bskal pa 'am/bskal pa las lhag
3b2(mdo sde): par yang bzhugs par gsol ba gda' bo zhes zer to//gcig la gcig 'jus nas 'di skad du/kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro//kye ma 'jig
3b3(mdo sde): rten stongs par 'gyur ro//kye ma sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par sminA pi ni zad do//lngas mi bzod pa ni byung ngo //tshe dang ldan pa
3b4(mdo sde): dag myur cig/tshe dang ldan pa dag myur cig/de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dreng gi yud tsam 'di la yongs su mya ngan las
3b5(mdo sde): 'dra' bar 'gyur ro//kye ma 'jig rten sbyongs par 'gyur ro//kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro//de bzhin+da gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/bdag cag
3b6(mdo sde): mgon med pa dang rtsa lag med pa dang /phongs par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhig gu/bdag cag gi the tshom dang so me nyi ci dang ci yod pa de dang de dag zhu bar bya'o zhes
3b7(mdo sde): kyang zer to//nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang de na 'khod de 'di lta ste gnas brtan klet+yA ya na chen po dang gnas brtan bku la dang gnas brtan nyi dga' bo dang
4a1(mdo sde): de dag la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang de na 'khod de/de dag la 'od zer gyis phog nas/'dar rab tu 'dar/dam dam rab tu dam
4a2(mdo sde): dam/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/brtabs rab tu brtabs/'ur 'u rI rab tu'u 'ur/'khyams rab tu 'khyams/rmugs rab tu rmugs/reng sa rab
4a3(mdo sde): tA rengs te/de dag la sogs pa dag tu gyur nas ches so//dri'i tshe dge slong sa yi phyag brgyad so shing zos nas phyir byung ste/gnas brten de dag la 'od zer
4a4(mdo sde): gyi snang ba des phog nas shin tu rings par kha gdong bkrus te gcig la gcig 'jus so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras de dag thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/
4a5(mdo sde): dbang thob pa bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa cang shes pa gtso bo chen po/chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang gi don thob pa/tsin+dan chen po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor
4a6(mdo sde): rludrung ldan pa song go chen po lto bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa shu stug ste/de la sogs pa'i yon tan drapag tu med pa dang ldan pa de dag thams cad snga dro
4a7(mdo sde): nyi ma char kar yan lag thams cad kyi bsdu rgyu skyegs kyi shing gi me tig ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/mig ni mchi me khrag lte bus gang ste/mchog tu
4b1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba'i tshor bu dang ldan nas/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang breng ba dang snying brtse ba'i phyir drung /gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog
4b2(mdo sde): tu gsang ba/stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das ga la bya der dong ste lhags nas
4b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgro bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nos/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo ster ba btung
4b4(mdo sde): dedophyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe kota ka'i bu myo rab bzangs me la sogs pa dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug thams cad kyang /dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/dbang thob
4b5(mdo sde): pa bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa khur bor ba/nyon mongs pa med pa/gtso mo chen mo/chen po stong pa nyid kyis rlung gi don thob pa sha sta ga ste/'di lta ste ko ta ki'i bu mo dge
4b6(mdo sde): slong ma rab bzong ma drong dge slong mnye dga' mo dang dge slong ma rgya mtsho blo gros drang de dag la sogs pa dge slong mya bye ba 'bum phrag drug sde dro nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams
4b7(mdo sde): cad kyi baspu rgyu skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/mig ni mchi mkhrig lta bus gang ste/mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/sems can
5a1(mdo sde): thams cad la phan bya dang bde ba dang snying brtse ba'i phyir dang gdul brur bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/stong pa nyid
5a2(mdo sde): kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
5a3(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud dri phyogs
5a4(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do//'khor de na dge slong ma 'khod pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' mi mchogs bcu thob pa sha stag ste/gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir bud med kyi gzugs//
5a5(mdo sde): dang bud med kyi dbyibs dang sha dang khrag dang rgyus pa mang po dang rus pa'i lus 'chang ba rtag tu tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi
5a6(mdo sde): cho 'phrul chen po'i don byed nus pa sha stag go/gzhan yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos byin la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams
5a7(mdo sde): cad kyang mi mchogs bcu thob pa/thabs kyis lus 'chang ba sha stog la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtshos byin dang /byang chub
5b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang /theg pa chen po thos par 'dod
5b2(mdo sde): pa theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/theg pa chen pos bkres pa theg pa chen po lnga sred pa theg pa chen po la sder sna med pa/'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par byed nus pa
5b3(mdo sde): sha stag dang /bdag cig rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o snyam ste/sngon gyi bskal pa skye ba snyed du tshul khrims kyi 'god pa'i dam bca' ba legs par blangs po/'dzin pa'i
5b4(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod pa sha stag dang /de bzhin du bdag ceg grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o snyam pa dang /de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam pa dang /
5b5(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam pa dang /go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o snyam du sems pa sha stagu dang /de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa dang /bu gcig pa
5b6(mdo sde): la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms par lta ba sha stag ste/de dag thams cad snga dro'i nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar
5b7(mdo sde): rtsa do mar ba ni langs/mig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang snying brtse ba'i phyir
6a1(mdo sde): dang gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du/theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo'i tshul bshad
6a2(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sti lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la ldan 'bum bskor
6a3(mdo sde): ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing /tshul khrims
6a4(mdo sde): dang cho ga dang yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grogs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa dge bsnyen gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang zung dang zung du
6a5(mdo sde): shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba dang rtag pa dang mi rtog pa dang bdag yod pa dang bdag med pa dang stong pa dang stong pa ma yin pa dang de kho na dang de
6a6(mdo sde): kho na ma yin pa dang skyabs dang skyabs ma yin pa dang sems can dang sems can med pa dang brtan pa dang brtan pa ma yin pa dang zhi ba drang zhi ba ma yin pa dang 'dus byas dang
6a7(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas dang thor zug dang ther zug ma yin pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang
6b1(mdo sde): khyad par du 'phags pa shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/'di lta ste dge bsnyen 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /dge bsnyen rab sbyin la sogs pa dge
6b2(mdo sde): bsnyen theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o snyam du dam bcas shing tshul khrims blangs pa/theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms nas
6b3(mdo sde): kyang gzhan sgom pa dag ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa theg pa chen po la srid pa/theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa 'jug rten thams cad dang mthun par byed nus pa shu
6b4(mdo sde): stag dang bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o//bdag cag grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o//dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi chad par bya'o//chos kyi 'khor lo
6b5(mdo sde): bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa/go tshe chen po bgos pa bslab pa rnams la sems gus pa dang /de bzhin du yon tan grangs med pa dang ldan pa/bu gcig pa
6b6(mdo sde): la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhin pa'i phyir re res kyang
6b7(mdo sde): tsan+dan dang a ga ru dang thang shing gi mchog dang tsin+dan se mchog pa'i bud shing rnams dang yam sreg shing dri bsung dang ldan pa yon tan can lnga stong lnga stong khyer te 'ongs
7a1(mdo sde): so/ la yum sgeg shing skyu re zhing yang bye skyer gyi skad pa rin po che swA bAdun dgas bdun dang ldan pas smras pas+yA kris pa/rlom la thos pa
7a2(mdo sde): bzhin du 'dug pa/rang bzhin gyis gzhon shAtsa ni 'gras par bcos pa shrI stug ste/sgra re zhing yang 'od rnam pa sna tshogs da'i ldan pa'i byeng po chen po//medog slo
7a3(mdo sde): dang bar bar kha cig tu mdog dkar kha cig tu s+ho sgyu kha cig tu dmar kha cig ser ba mig tu sdug par byas pa sha stig+sa go/bame po re re'i g.yogs mA'i phyir bu'ang rin
7a4(mdo sde): po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag go//dri la chi ngas mu'i the gu med po re re zhing yang ldong ros kyu mi dugu lta bu dang zar ma'i me tog gi mdog lta bu dang sngon po dang ser po rnams
7a5(mdo sde): kyis bying bar du sbrel ba sha stag go/de la chings mra'i the gu mAng po re re zhing yang gser thags kyi mu chog rnam par dag pa/yul mang por grags pa dag gis spel ba sha
7a6(mdo sde): stag go//de la yam sreg shring sna re zhing yang spos dri bsung zhim po dang me tog phreng dang gung gum gyi phye mu dang ldan par byas pa/gser thugs kyis g.yogs pa dang snas
7a7(mdo sde): brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun gyi shugs sngon po dang ser po dang sngo sgyu dang dkar ba dang btsod ka lte bu dag gi nang du bcug pa/yul ka ling+ka'i ras dang zar ma'i ras dang za dir dung
7b1(mdo sde): rgya dar gyi mchog rnams kyis dkris pa/me tog mang pos brgyan pa byug pa dri bsung zhim po dgu gis byugs pa sha stag gro//yam sreg shing sA re'i shring rta re re zhing yang rin po
7b2(mdo sde): tshe sna bdun gyis brgyan pa gser gyis mdzes par byas pa kha cig/kha cig tu sngon po dang dkar po dang be bla'i kha dog dang li khri'i kha dog pas lhag pa'i 'od gsal ba dang ldan pa
7b3(mdo sde): sha stag go//shing rta de dag gi gnya' shing rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/dpe med pa rta cang shes mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar ba sha stag go/rta de dag kyang rlung gi
7b4(mdo sde): shugs pas mgyogs pa/spu kha chu skyar gyi mdog dang ldong ros kyi mdog dang sprin gyi mdog can sha stag ste/thabs dri 'dra ba'i shing rta re re'i mdun logs dang rgyab logs su rgyal
7b5(mdo sde): mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ste/rgyal mtshon thams cad kyang rin po che las byas pa gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag go/rgyal mtshan gyi mdun logs su'ang gdugs rtsibs
7b6(mdo sde): dang rtsa ba nor bu dri ma med pa 'od can las byas pa mu tig gi chun po sbyangs pa shra stag khyer ro//gdugaswa re re'i mdun logs su'ang gser gyi me tog ku mu dra dang ut+pa la dang
7b7(mdo sde): pad+ma dkar po sdong bu bai dUr+ya las byas pa/ze ba rdo rje las byis pa bung ba mang po skad 'byin pa dri bsung zhim po dang ldan pa/yid du 'ong ba 'od dang ldan pa che ba mang ba sha
8a1(mdo sde): stag dang lda ldi chen po sha stag khyer ro//lnga ldi chen po rnams kyi mdun du'ang byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi spyod pa ri mor bris pa chen po dag
8a2(mdo sde): thogs so//ri mo'i gzugs re re'i blo g.yas g.yon nas kyang zlas gar gyi gar thabs yul dbus nasna byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/gor thabs byed pa de'i nang na
8a3(mdo sde): sil snyan rin po che las byas pa'i rdza rnga dang 'khrur rnga dang rnga zlum dang pi lung dang gling bu dang pi wang rgyad gtsig pa dang rnga bo tshe dang dung l-i sogs pa dag brdung zhing 'bud do//
8a4(mdo sde): gar thabs kyi sil snyan de dag las kyang kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa brjod cing gdung gdung skad du dbyangs len to//gar thabs kyi sal
8a5(mdo sde): snyan re re'i mdun du'ang me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs rnam par 'tsher ba rnams kyi phye mas/rin po che'i skon bu legs par btsos pa gzhon sha can dag bkang ba shra stag dang /
8a6(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i skon bu mang po lta na sdug pa/gur gum gyi phye mas bkang ba sha stag thogs so//de dag gi mdun du'ang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang
8a7(mdo sde): bcas pa khyab par 'gyur ba'i zhal zas dag khyer zhing 'dong ngo //zhal zas de dag kyang bud shing tsan+dan dmar po dang a ga ru dang thang shing gi me chung ngus bcos pa dUng
8b1(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi chus bcos pa sha stag ste/sgyur ba dang lan tshwa'i ro dang mngar ba dang ska ba dang tsha ba dang kha ba'i ro dang ldan pa madrangs skyed pa phan par 'gyur ba sha stag ga/sbru la
8b2(mdo sde): zung gi drung gi nyen kor thams cad kyang gser gyi bye ma 'jam pos brdal te/ga bu sha'i ras dang snam bu dang bcos snam dang dre'u rdog dang ka ling+ga'i ras dang zab der 'jam zhing
8b3(mdo sde): mdog dkar ba rnams kyang bting ngo //grub pa'i gnas de'i gzhi dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis kho ri khor yug kyang gur gum gyis byugs so//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge
8b4(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa'i seng go'i khri chen po gser las byas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis smras shing snang bar byas pa ri rab ltar tsha zhing 'phang mtho ba dag kyang bshams so//g.yogs
8b5(mdo sde): ma'ang de dag gi rkyen du 'tsham pa sha stag gis g.yogs te/gser gyi dril bu ga ye kra s+tha si li lI li dong /khrob shing gi sgra 'byung ba'i dra ba can gyi yol ba rnams kyis ni bskor/
8b6(mdo sde): rgyu dar spu sdug yug khyim chen po'i bla raM rnams ni bres/gdugs dkar po rnams kyis ni nyi mtshan bsgribs/rnga yab dkar po rnams kyis ni g.yebs/rgyab rten glang po che'i mche ba la chu
8b7(mdo sde): srin ma ka ri brten pa'i kha nas/zla ba nye ba'i 'od zer ltar dkar ba'i mu tig gi chun po 'byung zhing skyengs pa dang ldan pa rnams ni bcas/sa phyogs rnams ni me tog dri zhim po'o//
9b1(mdo sde): dang shing rta dang rgyal mtshan dang gdugs dang ba dan rnams dang chas te zhal zas kyi mchog gis sbyar ba'i snod rnams thogs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
9b2(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la spos dang me tog phreng dang /phye ma dang phye ma zhib bu dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang
9b3(mdo sde): ba dan dang bla re rgya chen po drug gis mchod nas lan 'bum bskor ba byas te/mig nas mchi ma rgyun mi chad par char bzhin du pha bo nas/bdag nyid la sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa
9b4(mdo sde): mang po byed cing /kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro//kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes de skad du skad po che 'don te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung na srog
9b5(mdo sde): chags shi shu ma ra bzhin du 'gre ldog cing gsol ba 'debs te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pas bdag gis sbar
9b6(mdo sde): ba'i bshos gsol bar ci gnang /bcom ldan 'das badrag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sbyin pa'i tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes su gsol zhes gsol ba 'debaso so//
9b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen bzhin du cang mi gsung bar gyur to//de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du de skad ces gsol kyang /lan gnyis la na
10a1(mdo sde): gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to//de nas dge bsnyen gyi tshogs de dag re thag chad de cang mi zer bar 'khod nas/bu gcig pa
10a2(mdo sde): shi nas dur khrod du bor ma thag pa'i pha ma 'gre ldog pa bzhin du shin tu sdug bsngal bur gyur to//de bzhin du dge bsnyen de dag thams cad mchog tu sdug bsngal bar
10a3(mdo sde): gyur pa las langs te/rang rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bsdus nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing tshul khrims
10a4(mdo sde): dang cho ga dang yon tan dang ldan pa dang dam pa'i chos kyi gces pa 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen mtshong dpon gyi bu mo 'tsho ba'i dpal la sogs pa dge bsnyen mu gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi
10a5(mdo sde): bye ma snyed thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can+da bye ba phrag mang po nges par sgrol ba/khyim gyi gnas la smod pa shu stag ste/lus 'di ni nyes pa'i khams
10a6(mdo sde): borgyad cu rtsa bzhi lus lhags pas bsdus pA'o//lus 'di ni srin bu'i rigs bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsu bo ni'i zas so//lus 'di ni rgyal po'i khri mun du brubs pa'i dri ma mnam
10a7(mdo sde): pa'o//lus 'di ni khye ro rul pa'i dri bim gyis lhag par spags pa'o//lus 'di ni sgo dgu nas mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa'o//lus 'di ni sha dang chu ba dang rus pa dang khrag
10b1(mdo sde): dang pagrasdu pa'i zhal zhal can rkang lag gi phyi sgo dang ra bA dang ba gam can/mig gi skar khung can/mgo bo'i yang tog can/yid rgyal po lta bu'i pho brang grong khyer lta bu'o//
10b2(mdo sde): lus 'di ni mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs shing byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug lnga sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa bye ba snyed kyi srin po brten
10b3(mdo sde): pa/'dram bu dang e raN+Da dang dbu ba dang chu shing lto bur snying po med pa/glog dang ri gzar po'i 'bab chu'i dba' rlabs ltar shin tu mi brtan pa'o//sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang brag ca
10b4(mdo sde): dang zla ba'i gzugs brnyan ltar slu bar byed pa/rlung shugasnga drag pos rnam par dkrugs pa'i chu'i shugs kyis brkos pa'i 'gram gyi sdong po ltar g.yang si na 'dug pa'i chos can
10b5(mdo sde): sbrang kri dang wa dang bya rgod dang bya rog rnams kyi zas yan nA su zhig 'di lta bu 'chang ba la dga' bar byed/rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad skra'i rtse mos blangs te/ba lang gi rmig rjes su blugs
10b6(mdo sde): por ni nus srid kyi/lus nod bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis gzir ba 'di snying po med pa 'am mi gtsang po ni tshig tsam gyis bstan par mi nus so//sa chen po 'dri rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i
10b7(mdo sde): rus pa'i 'bru tsam sha stag tu byas pa 'am yungs 'bru tsam mam rdul phra rab kyi rdul tsam sha stag tu byas pas ni zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/lus 'di yod kyi bar du 'di'i nyes
11a1(mdo sde): dmigs ni mthur thug pan mi 'gyur te/de bas na dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir 'di mchil ma bzhin du dor bar bya'o sta ma ste/'di ltar//
11a2(mdo sde): bskyen min dag thams cad chen po stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bsgoms pa sems bsgoms pa sha stag ste/'di lta ste dge bsnyen mo
11a3(mdo sde): ba'i dpal skyes bya ba dang /dge bsnyen ma dpal phyeng zhes bya ba dang /dge bsnyen ma sa ga zhes bya ba dang /de la sogs pa thams cad kyang thog pa chen po thos pa
11a4(mdo sde): 'dod la/sa nos kyang gzhan drug la bstan par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/bsrung ba lhur len po bud med kyi lus ngan no snyam du spyod pa dang lus snying po med do snyam
11a5(mdo sde): du spyod pa so so nas shas cher bsgom pa dang /'khor ba'i 'khor lo gzhig go snyam du sems pa shwa stag dang /theg pa chen pos sgyum la ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom
11a6(mdo sde): pa dag ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bces pa sha stag dang /theg pa chen po la sred pa theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa/'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par slob par
11a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang /grol nas gzhan dkrol bar bya'o//rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o//dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
11b1(mdo sde): bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa sha stag dang /go cha chen po bgos pa bslab pa rnams la brtul zhugs brtan pa dang /de bzhin du yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dang bu gcig pa
11b2(mdo sde): la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha sta ga ste/dri dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar shin tu rings par gcig la gcig 'jus te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
11b3(mdo sde): gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir/ya ma sreg shing dge bsnyen pa rnams kyi nyis 'gyur khyer ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nus/bu shaM ba bzhin du
11b4(mdo sde): mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ngus nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe li tsi bI gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po la sogs pa yang sa
11b5(mdo sde): pa can na gnas pa'i li tsA bru~M gzhon nu grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang /phyi rol na gnas pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /dzam+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i rgyal bran blon po dang
11b6(mdo sde): bcas pa gad+hA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos bsrung ba la mkhas pa/tshul khrims dang tshi ga dang yon tan+d+ra dang ldan pa/dom pa'i chos sun 'byin
11b7(mdo sde): cing rtags can 'tshal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag la de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta bur 'dod de/bdag cag gi nor dang 'bru'i tshogs dang mdzad dang bong
12a1(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni bdud rtsi mi zad par bya ba dang bdud rtsi gnas par bya ba'i phyir yin gyis/bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos
12a2(mdo sde): la nan tan bya'o//dam pa'i chos la spun 'byin cing log par lta ba rnams kyi lce bcad par bya'o zhes legs por dmo bcas pa tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims
12a3(mdo sde): la mi gnas pa rnams ni gos dkar po gyen du bcug ste/khyim pa'i las byed du gzhug go snyam du sems brtul ba/dam pa'i chos sdug pa la ni bla ma bzhin
12a4(mdo sde): du rim gro bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/dge 'dun la phan po dang bde bar gnas par bya ba'i yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang des cho ga go snyam du sems pa dang theg
12a5(mdo sde): po chen po thos par 'ded la thos nas kyang grezhan dag la bstan par bye'o snyam du yang ma bcas pa la brten pa dang /de la sogs pa'i yon tani dpag tu med pa
12a6(mdo sde): drung ldan pa sha stag ste/'di lA s+t+rai linI b+h+rUM gan nu gtsang ma dri mo med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /sgrib pa dag pa zhes bya ba dang /grang+gA'i chung ma med pas
12a7(mdo sde): byin pa zhes bya ba dang /de la sikris pi li tsa bI gzhon nu de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'jus te/re res kyang gdung zhugaso la bzhin pa'i bud shing thang shing
12b1(mdo sde): gi mchog dang tsan+dan dang a ga ru rnams dang yam sreg shing bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang /mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur rnams khyer nas mchod pa rnams bsgrags te/
12b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du dong ngo //li tsi b+hI gzhon nu re re zhing yang glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chas so nor bu
12b3(mdo sde): chu she lnga brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chas so glang po che re ru'i mdun du'ang /che ba la 'os pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang dar gyi bla rI chen po rnams thogs so//gdugs
12b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la'ang /kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod do//dar gyi bla re chen po rnams kyi nang na chung ngu gang yin pa de lnga'ang chu zheng du dpag tshad
12b5(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do//rgyal mtshan rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la'ang 'phang du dpag tshad brgya yod de//bA dan rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa des kyang dpag tshad
12b6(mdo sde): steng du phyin no//de ltar de dag mchod pa rnams dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/zhal zas
12b7(mdo sde): phul po las bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ste/ma bzhes nas mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/re theg chad nas langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la bdun
13a1(mdo sde): gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe dzam+bu gling pa'i blon po dang /tshong dpon dang /khyim bdag gAng+gA lnga'i bye ma snyed thams
13a2(mdo sde): cad kyang /theg pa chen po la dad pa/tshul khrims dang cho ga dang yon tan rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa
13a3(mdo sde): sha stag ste/'di lta ste khyim bdag gi rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang 'gro ba skyong zhes bya ba dang chos skyong zhes bya ba dang de la sogs pa dag kyang de'i tshe drir
13a4(mdo sde): lhags te/de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi mchod paso/mchod pa snga ma rnams zil gyis mnan nas/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po'i tshogs kyis
13a5(mdo sde): mchod nas zhal zas ma bzhes pa'i phyir/mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te re thag chad nas ldangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus tA la bdun gyi srid tsam du
13a6(mdo sde): 'phags te 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra mA gtogs par yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang phyi
13a7(mdo sde): rol na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa dzam+bu gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang ri khrod kyi grong dang yul po che dang kha lungs kyi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung drug
13b1(mdo sde): b+he Sha snyed dang lhan cig tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bca sU te lhags so//rgyal po de rnams re re la'ang dmag 'khrugs ma phrag bco brgyad bcwo brgyad yod do//de
13b2(mdo sde): ngag la glang po che rtag tu 'gram pa nas rdul 'dzag pa drag dang /rta rlung gi shugs pas lhag par mgyogs pa dag kyang yod do//de dag gi mchod po'i yo byad gang yin
13b3(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma de dgra las nyis 'gyur gyis ches bzang la ches mang ste/de lta bu'i mchod pa'i phul dag khyer nas/dpung gi tshogs yan lag
13b4(mdo sde): bzhi dang bcas te lhags so//de dag gi mchod pa de rnams kyi nang na gdugs thung ngu gang yin pa de'ong dpag tshad brgyad cu chu zheng grib par 'dug go/ba dan gyi nang
13b5(mdo sde): na chung ngu gang yin pas kyang dpag tshad brgya stong du phyin no//rgyal mtshan phal pa gang yin pa de la'ang 'phang du dpag tshad sum cu yod do//de ltar yangs pa can gyi rgyal
13b6(mdo sde): de zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang /nyi 'od ces bya ba dang /de la sogs pa rgyal po rnams nyi ma 'char kar lhags te/de dag kyang dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags
13b7(mdo sde): can 'chel pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/mthus kyang sems can rnams dam pa'i chos la 'god par byed pa dang /bdag cag gi nor dang 'bru'i chags dang mdzad dang/
14a1(mdo sde): bang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa sha stag dang bdab cag gis dam pa'i chos la
14a2(mdo sde): nan tan bya'o//dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi lce ni drung nas bcad dro zhes dam bcas pa brtan por byas pra shaM stag dang /theg pa chen po 'dod pa dang
14a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse ba sha stog ste/dri dgra gi mchid pa rnams kyis yang sa pa can nas grong khyer kau shri'i bar thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur to//de dag
14a4(mdo sde): gi gdugs kyi grib ma 'dab chags su 'dug pas ni nyi ma'i 'od kyis ma phog go/de dag gi kha zas kyi dri bsung gis ni dpag tshad bzhir khyab par gyur te/de dag gis
14a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rang rang gis sbyar ba'i zhul zas bzhes par lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhis nas yid mi dga' ste langs nas
14a6(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo ma gtogs par yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma
14a7(mdo sde): lo sogs pa dzam+bu gling pa'i rgyal po dang tshong dpon dang khyim bdag rnams kyi chung ma gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags te/de dag thams cad kyang
14b1(mdo sde): bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can mang po nges par sgrol ba drug tu lus bsgom pa dang ldan pa/chen po stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas sems rnam
14b2(mdo sde): par dag pa shi stag ste/'di lta ste yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsuman mdzes ma zhes bya ba dang /btsun mo bri yeng gu zhes bya ba dang /de la sogs
14b3(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa la byu ba bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa sha stug ste/gcig lce gcig 'jus nas/de bzhon gshegs pa'i gdung
14b4(mdo sde): rlugs la bzhin pa'i phyir/yam sreg shing rnams khyer te mchod pa snga ma thams cad rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis zil gyis mnan naste/bcom ldan 'das la
14b5(mdo sde): sa 'gyur du mchod po byas te/de dag gre mchod po'i yo byad rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang gdugs rnams kyi 'phang dang chu zheng gi tshad kyang snga mo'i nyes 'gyu
14b6(mdo sde): bas lhagag/kha zas rnams kyi dri bsred ni dpag ched ban dro khyab par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das lI phyug btsal nas zhal zas bzhes pa rigs lnga ba btwAkya/
14b7(mdo sde): zhal zas ma bzhes nas bcom ldan 'das la skor ba byed cing sgro 'bal la rang rang gi rgyan rnams 'thor zhing /skad mi snyan pas ngu skye bu gcig pa shi ba bzhin du
15a1(mdo sde): mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sA la zung gi drung nyid du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mig
15a2(mdo sde): yangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha'i tshogs gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags nas lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po dag ltos grogs/
15a3(mdo sde): po dag ltas mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i yo byad mchog tu khyad par du 'phags la/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa
15a4(mdo sde): bkur sti thams cad mchod par 'dod de/mi rnams kyi zhal zas kyi tha ma bzhes pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs kyis/grogs po dag bdag cag
15a5(mdo sde): gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya zhing tha ma'i dus su zhal zas dbul bar bya na/ji ltar
15a6(mdo sde): bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pas gsol te/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad ci gau/grogs po
15a7(mdo sde): dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni shin tu dkon no//de byas kyang zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni ches dkon no//kye ma bcom
15b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na ni 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes smras so//lha de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la thos nas kyang gzhan
15b2(mdo sde): dag la bstan to snyam du dam bcas pa/theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa rnams ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/theg pa chen po la sred pa
15b3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la ser sgyu med pa theg pa chen po la phrag dog dang dus che ba dang 'chab pa dang sgyu med pa theg pa chen po sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa
15b4(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i tshul khrims blangs pa 'jig rten dang mthun par slob par 'dod pa/bdag cag rgal nas gzhon bsgral bar bya'o//bdag cag grol nas gzhan
15b5(mdo sde): dgrol bar bya'o//chos kyi 'khror lo bskor bar bya'o//dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa go tsho chen po bgos pa bslab pa rnams la
15b6(mdo sde): dam bcas pa brtan pa dang de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/bu gicig pa la bya ba bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la snying rjes lta ba sha stag ste/de dag kyang //
15b7(mdo sde): nyi ma 'char kar ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir/bud shing dang yam sreg shing rnams khyer te/de dag kyang snga mas phul ba'i//
16a1(mdo sde): sam sreg shing ke nyis 'gur nyis 'gyur bas bzang ba'i lha rdzas de basmad dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba mi la dkon pra sha stag glu/shing rta'ang rta'i mchog
16a2(mdo sde): mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar ba dur la dkar pos g.yogs pa/gzugs dang dbyibs ri mo bring yed mi nus pa dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba can gyi yol bas bskor ba/dar
16a3(mdo sde): yug khyim chen po'i blo nga rgyu chen po rtsa ba ri mo can dag la btsugs pa dang /gang thabs dang rol mo yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mdun du drangs pa/kha zas zhim po mang
16a4(mdo sde): bo dgra dang /seng ba'i khro be dUr+ya'i rgyu ba rten rtse mo nor bu'i 'od kyis smang bar byas pa/zhabs rten gser las byas pa dag kyang bai shaMms pa dang /sa phyogs kyang
16a5(mdo sde): tog dri bsrung zhim po sna chags kyis mdzes par byas pa me tog gi sel ma bkram zhing bkod pa/dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi phyi bzhin 'brang bu sha stag ste/
16a6(mdo sde): so nas mtshi ma khrag lta bu mi thub cing mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdungs nus sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba dang /snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /gdul
16a7(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gseng ba stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir
16b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/mchod pa dang bkur ste'i mchog rnam pa mang po dag b+h+yaswA twe bsko ba'ang byas
16b2(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams kyi phyir rang rang gi bla gos sa la bting ste/rang rang gi rgyan rnams phog tsong gtor nas rang rang gi sgra 'bal cing skad mi snyan pos
16b3(mdo sde): du ste/bcom ldan 'das la tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
16b4(mdo sde): par mdzad du gsale zhos lan gnyis ldan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ba nas te cing mi gsung nas de dag re thag chad de ldangs nas phyogs
16b5(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhi na gnos pa klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang dga' bo dang /nye dga' bo la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po gaung+gA'i
16b6(mdo sde): klung dgu'i bye ma snyed shin tu rings par nyi mi 'tshor kar lha rnams kyi mchod pa lis kyang nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rang rang gi 'byor pa dang 'tsham pa dag
16b7(mdo sde): khyer nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zad du dong ste phyag btsal nas/zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bsam pa bzhin du ma grub nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
17a1(mdo sde): do//gzhan yang de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi bdug po g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed gcig la gcig
17a2(mdo sde): 'jus nas rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi mchod pa snga mo zil gyis mnan nas/tshogs chen po dang chas te lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la
17a3(mdo sde): phyag btsal te zhul zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod dro//
17a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gI bdag po dgra'i mdza' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyis rang rang gi mchod
17a5(mdo sde): pas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po snga ma dag gi mchod pa rnams zil gyis mnan nas/bcom ldan 'das lnga phyag btsal te zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang zha lnga
17a6(mdo sde): zas ma bzheso nas yid mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe dri za'i bdug po mis byin gyi bu la sogs pa dri za'i bdag po gang+gA'i
17a7(mdo sde): klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma tha mas cad pas kyang ches mchog tu gyur pa'i mchod pa rnams khyer te 'ongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bris
17b1(mdo sde): /rol mo snyan dgu byas nas phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das lnga zhwa lnga zas brazhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas de dag kyang yid mi dga'
17b2(mdo sde): bar gyur te langs nas phyogs gcog tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe mI 'am ci'i bdag po legs mthong la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i bdag po gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed
17b3(mdo sde): lcags tAM snga ma rnams kyi mchod pa de dag bsdoms pa byas kyang de dag re re'i mchod pa ches khyad par 'phags par gyur te/de dag kyang zhal zas ma bzhis nas yid mr-i dga'
17b4(mdo sde): bribur gyur te phyogs glecig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po ldeg sngo mthong chen po la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po gAng+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed
17b5(mdo sde): kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur khyer ba lngas snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bdag po
17b6(mdo sde): bde mcho bri rigs la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi bdag po gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa lha ma yin gyi brasam pa med pa sha stag gis mchod pa
17b7(mdo sde): snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyi mchod pa dag khyer te 'ongs te/bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas zhal zas ma bzhes te yid mi dga' bar gyur nas langs te shing
18a1(mdo sde): sA la zung gi drung du rang rang gi gzi byin gyis snang bar byas te 'khrod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bdag po gang+gA'i chu dri ma med
18a2(mdo sde): pa rjes byin la sogs pa sbyin byed ma'i bu gang+gA'i klung bdun cu'i bye ma snyed lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bsam pa med pa sha stag
18a3(mdo sde): gis mchod pa snga ma thams cad las mchod pa nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas bzang ba dag khyer ba las snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' bar
18a4(mdo sde): gyur te/shing sA la zung gi drung du rang rang gi gzi brjid kyis snang bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe srin po'i bdag po 'jigs byed la
18a5(mdo sde): sogs pa srin po'i dbang po gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed srin po'i bsam pa med pa sha stag gis gzi brjid chen po'i tshogs kyis sA la zung gi drung du snang bar byas
18a6(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal to phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag po dri srel la sogs pa 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag
18a7(mdo sde): po gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis snga ma'i mchod pa thams cad pas nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis lhag pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs khyer nas khu byug po rgyags pa rnams
18b1(mdo sde): dang /bung ba rnams skad 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i me tog 'tsher ba'i 'khri shing mang po'i dog pa dang /lo ma kha 'bus pa rnams kyis sa phyogs brgyan te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan
18b2(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul chen po la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang+gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga mya'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i
18b3(mdo sde): mchod pa dag khyer nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mo 'dod dgur skur ba'i gzugs can legs mthong mu la sogs pa gang+gA'i klong bye ba'i bye ma snyed kyis yang
18b4(mdo sde): pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsu no mo'i mchod pa nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer te/rang ring gi rkyen rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la spungs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan
18b5(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mo ram b+ha dang /urba shi la sogs pa lha'i bu mo gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed mchod pa sdo ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas chos lhag par mang zhing sba ba dag
18b6(mdo sde): gris mdun du drangs te snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe 'byung po'i tshogs pa ba sangs lhur 'khor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag stong
18b7(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'i lha'i bu gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu mchod po snga ma'i nyes
19a1(mdo sde): 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma
19a2(mdo sde): bzhes nus snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe rlung lha bzhi rlung gtod po'i lha grang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu dus ma yin par
19a3(mdo sde): yang shing ljon pa dang /'khri shing dang shing gel pa dang nags ma rnams dang ske ma dang me tog gi 'khri shing dang /byu ru rnams kyisra sa phyogs rkyen par byed cing
19a4(mdo sde): dus tshig thams cad kyi me tog gi dpal rnams phyogs su rgyas par byed la lo ma khe 'bus pa rtsa ba dam de ba rnams kyis shing sA la zung nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer ser
19a5(mdo sde): po dza kong khar 'dug pa bzhin du byas nas mchod pa snga mi'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa dag khyer te//bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin du
19a6(mdo sde): shing sA la zung gi drung du 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe chur pa 'bebs pa'i lha gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sprin chen po dang /chu skyar rnams phyi bzhin 'bra'i zheng grog 'gyu
19a7(mdo sde): ba'i gseb nas rma byi'i mgrin pa ltar mdog sngo ba'i char gyi rgyun 'bab la/'brug sgra del nos sgrogs pa'i sprin dang ldan pas char zem bu bsil ba dang 'dres pa'i
19b1(mdo sde): me tog gi char 'bebs shing /bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal tAM zhal zas ma bzhes nas re thag chad de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhin pa'i me bsad
19b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir nam mkha' nyid la 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po sgra gcan dang /lung tang mdog dang /sbrang rtsi mdog srel dang /'dod dgu'i spos ldan la sogs
19b3(mdo sde): pa spos kyi glang po gang+gA'i klung nye shu'i bye ma snyed theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha sdig gis ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir gangs kyi sman dang /pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /sdong bu
19b4(mdo sde): shing rta chen po'i 'phang lo tsA ma sha stog dang /dgon pa chen po dag nas pad+ma dang /ut+pa la dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkor po dang /rtsi ba drang 'bras bu dang rdo gu sna tha dad pa du
19b5(mdo sde): ma dag sde'i tho twos phyung zhing phyung zhing khyer te rlung gi shugs pas kyang chos mgyogs pa dang /shin tu rings par dbyar gyi 'brug sgra bzhin du sgrogs shing lhags nas
19b6(mdo sde): pad+ma'i 'dab mu dri cer po'i sring gA'i khri lho ldi dge bshams te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas zhal zas ma bzhes nas re thig chad de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
19b7(mdo sde): gzhin yang de'i tshe seng ge seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa seng ge gang+gA'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa sha stag gis
20a1(mdo sde): seng ge'i rtsal chen pos spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar me tog dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te rings par lhags nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
20a2(mdo sde): gzhan yang de'i tshe bya drang pa dang /khrung khrung dang ngur pa dang kaM dam pa dang zal mo dang gzhad dang khru byug dang ba li ka dang /ka la pid dang shrang shangi twe'u la sogs
20a3(mdo sde): pas kyang spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar me tog dang 'bras bu khyer te rang rang gi skad phyung nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe sa'i steng na ba drang ma
20a4(mdo sde): he mo dang ra ma mo yid do cag gis kyang nu ma 'o mas bkang ste shin tu rings par lhags nas shring sA l-i zung gi drung nas phyogs gshong zhig mthong nas/der rang rang gi nu
20a5(mdo sde): ma 'o mas gang ba de dag las 'o ma gseg ma dang /bye ma dang ba ches ma 'bags shing che ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dog gzags te/'o ma de dag gi nang nas sbrang bu
20a6(mdo sde): dag bsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe drang srong bzod par smra ba la sogs pa gling bzhin gnas pa'i drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa
20a7(mdo sde): theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag la gang+gA'i klung dkrigs kyi bye ma snyed rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yem sreg shing dang /zhal zas dag khyer nas bcom ldan 'das
20b1(mdo sde): la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun kha cig dang /gnas brtan kun dga' bo la sogs
20b2(mdo sde): pa ma gtogs par yul phyogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dang /dge slong mra ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma lus par der lhags so//gzhan yang de'i tshe ri rab la
20b3(mdo sde): sogs pa ri chen po rnams dang /'jig rten gyi bar mtshams kyi re gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed kyang shing ldan pa dang /'khri shing mang po nyin mtshan gyi grib ma byed pa dang //
20b4(mdo sde): brag zang yag grib ma tsha ba dang /brag kha nas 'bab pa'i chus gang ba dang /sman gshong rdo gu dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bus gang ba dag kyang der lhags so//lha'i bu mthu bo che'i
20b5(mdo sde): 'dun ma chen po dag kyang ri reb dang bcas te mchod pa'i phyir lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mthu bo che
20b6(mdo sde): 'odro chen po rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i rlung na granas pa dang /chu klung chen po dag gi nang na glenas pa gad+mo'i klung grangs med pa'i byem+b+ha snyed mchod pa lham byas nyis 'gyur gyistA madz+nyAs
20b7(mdo sde): pa'i mchod pa sngon tu btang nas/nyi ma'i 'od kyis mar mo'i 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du rang rang gi 'od kyis nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis mnan te/nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od kyis shing
21a1(mdo sde): mya ngan 'chang gi lo ma thams cad dmar lam mer snang bar byed pa de bzhin du dang rang gi 'od kyis chu klung gasder ldan gyi chu dmar ldum mer snang bar byas
21a2(mdo sde): nus/bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe grong khyer ku shrI nas shing sA li zung gi drung gi bar skabs kyi bar snang la khang bzang
21a3(mdo sde): ri'i dbang po'i rtse mo lta bu dang pa'i thal gong ltar dkar ba sha stag gis 'khrigs par gyur to//sa gzhi ni skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu'i chu pad+mas mdzes par byis pa dag gis
21a4(mdo sde): gang bar 'dug ste byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi skyed mos tshal bas kyang lhag par mdzes so//gcig tu na dga' bo'i tshil dang /shing rta sna tshogs can dang 'dra bar gyur te/sa
21a5(mdo sde): phyogs de dag de ltar dga' dgra' ltar 'dug kyang lha dang /lha ma yin dang mi de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir shin tu ngu'o//gzhan
21a6(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe rgyal tshun bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams rang rang gi 'khor la 'di skad ces zer te/grogs po dag ltos/grogs po dag ltos/lha dang lha ma yin dang /mi rnams
21a7(mdo sde): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'o las khyad par rje 'phags la/de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul ba laM brtson gyis/grogs po dag bdag
21b1(mdo sde): rnyog kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya'o//zhes zas kyi tha ma'ang dbul bar bya'o//gal te bdag cag
21b2(mdo sde): gis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha mo bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes par gyur na de las bdag tsug gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis de skad
21b3(mdo sde): ces smras nas/g.yog 'khor mang po grangs med pa dang bcas pas mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur gyi mchod pa dang zhal zas mang po dag khyer ro//me tog mang po dag kyi
21b4(mdo sde): khyer tI 'di lta ste/man+da ra ba rnams dang /man+da ra ba chen po rnams dang /kI ke ru ka rnams dang /ke ke ru ka chen po rnams dang /many+dzu sha ka rnams dang /many+dzu sha
21b5(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang /san+te na ka rnams dang /san+ne na ka chen po rnams dang /'od can rnams dang /'od can chen po rnams dang /kun tu 'od can+da rnams dang /'od mtha' yas
21b6(mdo sde): pa rnams dang /mdzes sdug rnams dang /mdzes sdug chen po rnams dang /dga' byed rnams dang /dga' byed chen po rnams dang /dri mchog rnams dang /dri mchog
21b7(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang /spos kyi ngade ldang rnams dang /spos kyi ngad ljang chen po rnams dang /kun tu ngad ldang rnams dang /kun tu ngad ldang chen po rnams dang /mtha' yas ngang
22a1(mdo sde): ldang rnams dang /mtha' yas dang ldang chen po rnams dang /lha rdzas kyi 'dab ma rnams dang /krung gi me tog rnams dang /yong 'dus brto rnams
22a2(mdo sde): drang /de lta bu gzhan drug kyang khyer nas bcom ldan 'das ga lwa ba der dong ste/nyi ma'i gzi byin gyis srin bu me khyer gyi 'od zil gyis mnan pra bzhin du rang rang gi gaN+DI
22a3(mdo sde): byin gyis thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis mnan te zhal zas ma bzhes nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
22a4(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pas mchod pa snga ma de'i nyis 'gyur de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa de na yod pa'i me tog gi sna grangs du ma yid du 'ong ba rnams dang /yid du 'ong
22a5(mdo sde): ba chen po rnams dang /dri bsung chen po rnams khyer ro//khang bzang tshon po rdo thal gyi mdog ltar dkar ba/thim skas kyi rim pa dang ldan pa/skar khung gi phreng ba du
22a6(mdo sde): ma phug ron shug rtse ba dang ldan pa dag kyang sprul nas bcom ldan 'das gral ba der dong ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das
22a7(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni theg pa chen po'i mdo'i sde tshan srung ba
22b1(mdo sde): lags na bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/de skad ces gsol kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
22b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po gnyis pa//de'i rjes la mthar gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po rnams kyis steng gi bar
22b3(mdo sde): snang la mchod pa dang 'di snga ma las khyad par du spags nas/bcom ldan 'das gru lwa ba der dong ste/de dag gi mchod pa'i nang ni gdugs phal pa gang yin pa'ang kho ra khor yug/
22b4(mdo sde): tu gling bzhi pa'i khyon tsam mo//ba don phal pra gang yin pa de'ang rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i mthar thug ste/shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho nas nub phyogs kyi rgya mtshar thug ste/rlung gis
22b5(mdo sde): bskyed dam rlung gis phyar na ba dan de dag las pi wang gi sgra snyan pa khong nas 'khyil pa lta bur snyan pa dag 'byung ste/de dgra bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas zhal zas bzhes
22b6(mdo sde): par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung nas re thag chad de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa rnams mi gtogs par gong ma gong ma'i/
22b7(mdo sde): sems can gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mchod pa rgya chen po'i tshogs dang chos te lhags nas snga ma bzhin du phyogs
23a1(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do//mi mjed kyi badrag po tshangs pa'ang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor zhing mdun du bdar te rang gi gzi byin gyis
23a2(mdo sde): lha thams cad kyi gzi byin zil gyis mnan nus mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang chas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/de dag gi ba dan phal pa gang yin pa de'ang tshangs
23a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten nas 'phyong ste shing sA la zung gi drung du thug go/dris kyang bcom ldan 'das lnga zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nus
23a4(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris lha ma yin gyi g.yog 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pas tshangs pa dang dbang po gnyis ma
23a5(mdo sde): gtogs par de'i bar gyi lha yod do cag gi 'od rang gi 'od kyis mog mog por byas nas de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs dang rkyen du 'tsham pa'i zhal zas dag dad chas
23a6(mdo sde): te bcom ldan 'das kyi thud du song ngo //dri'i gdugs phal pa'ang chu zheng du 'jig rten gyi khams chung ngu khyab pa tsA ma ste/des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas pazhes
23a7(mdo sde): par gsol ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//de nas bdud sdig can chung ma grangs med pa'i 'khor dang chas te/sems
23b1(mdo sde): can dmyal ba thams cad kyi bar srang thams cad phye nas de dag la chu dang kha zas la sogs pa ci 'dod pa byin te/de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
23b2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas dran par gyis shig/sbyin pa'i tha ma la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig ces smras nas de dag la khyed bde bar gyur cig ces kyang dbugs phyung ngo //sems
23b3(mdo sde): can dmyal ba'i grong khyer mtshan chas grong zhing me chen po 'bar ba rnams su'ang sprin chen po bzhin du chu chen po phab nas sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba'i
23b4(mdo sde): bde ba dang ldan pa'i 'du shes bskyed de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdud kyi sems kyi grwanas skabs de lta bur gyur to//de'i 'khor gang yin pa de dag gis kyang gzhu dang /
23b5(mdo sde): ral gri dang tho ba dang dgra sta dang /rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /mtshon kam+ba na dang /lcags kyi ber ka dang /lcags mda' dang /sha te ka ni ha dang /mda' dang 'phang mdung
23b6(mdo sde): dang /mdung rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon tshwa rnam pa du ma yongs su spangs te chos lhur len par gyur to//de'i mchod pa'ang lha snga ma rnams la med pa de lta bur gyur te/
23b7(mdo sde): de'i gdugs phal pa'i chu zheng du'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i khyon cim mo//de ltar de mthu chen po dang ldan zhing rang gi chung ma rnams kyis rnga yab kyis g.yob bzhin
24a1(mdo sde): du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bros phyag btsal te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
24a2(mdo sde): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /'khor dang bcas pas bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis dra
24a3(mdo sde): slan chad theg pa chen po'i slad du yi dam bca' bar 'tshal te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung 'jigs pa'i slad du 'am/rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'tshal ba'i
24a4(mdo sde): slad du 'am/thob tu re ba'i slad du 'am/gzhan gyis bgyid du stsal pa 'am/gzhan gyi yid bsrung ba'i slad du'ang rung ste/theg pa chen po brjod par bgyid na de'i don
24a5(mdo sde): du 'jigs pa dang /mi dga' ba thams cad bsal ba'i gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo//tad+ya thA/thake Ta Ta ru thake/ro ru re/ma da ro ru re/A la mA lu
24a6(mdo sde): tA la swA hA/chos smra ba 'khrul pa dang 'jigs pas gnod par gyur pa rnams chos kyi tshul la spobs pa bskyed par bgyi ba dang /mu stegs pa rnams myos par bgyi ba
24a7(mdo sde): dang /dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang /bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i slad du bdag gis rang gi dam tshig gis smras pa'i gsang sngags 'di glang po che'i 'jigs pa 'am/
24b1(mdo sde): nags khung gi 'jigs pa'am/chu klung gi 'jigs pa'am/me'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du bsrung ba'i gzungs sngags kyi don du brjod pa gang lpags pa de dag ni brjod pa
24b2(mdo sde): tsam gyis ji ltar rus sbal rang gi lus bsrung ba de bzhin du bdag gis g.yo dang sgyu ma mchis par de dag 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi/stobs dang ldan par
24b3(mdo sde): yang bgyid lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis da zhal zlas 'di bzhes par gsol zhes bskul to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
24b4(mdo sde): sdig can khyod kha zas kyi phyir gsol ba ma 'drebs shig/gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir chos kyi sbyin par 'gyur bas na ba zhes par byi'i
24b5(mdo sde): zizang zing gi sbyin pa ni de lto ma yin gyis/sdig can khyod gsol ba mi 'debs shig ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to//lan gnyis
24b6(mdo sde): lan gsum gyi bar du'ang bdud dang bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa lasra ma bzhes te re thag chad nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas
24b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu dpag tu med pa mthu dpag tu med pa dag gis mdun du bdar te rang gi 'od kyis tshangs pa dang /lha'i dbang po dang lha ma yin dang /
25a1(mdo sde): bdud kyi 'od rnams snag cha'i gong bu bzhin du 'od mi gsal bar byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pargya chen po nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas lhag
25a2(mdo sde): pa dag khyer nas der song ste de'i mchod pa rnams kyi nang na gdugs phal pa gang yin po de'ang chu zheng du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'dug ste/
25a3(mdo sde): mchod pa de lta bu sngon du btang nus bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin te lan du ma bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das go la bde legs
25a4(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba bai tud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dri skad ce so gsol to//bcom ldan 'das la bdag mchod pa bgyid pa ni sbrang bu mchod pa bragying pa dang 'dra ste/bdag
25a5(mdo sde): sgang bu dang 'dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa'i rdo ga lnga thog gis kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag lnga thugs brtse ba'i slang du zhal zas kyi tha ma gsol pa ra tsi
25a6(mdo sde): gnang zhes lan gnyis ldan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ri thag chad nas langs te phyogs gcig
25a7(mdo sde): tu 'dug go/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa gtams khrag khrig gi bye mo snyed 'das
25b1(mdo sde): pa na/'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog sgra sman mu trag ces bya ba zhig myod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang /
25b2(mdo sde): mnyam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/des sras kyi thu bo nyan thos lus chen mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la dre na de
25b3(mdo sde): bzhin gla shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/rigs kyi
25b4(mdo sde): bu khyod kyis de'i don du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas zhal zas zhi mo po phan pa dag khyer to song zhig/mchod pa chen po dag kyang khyer te song la de la 'di skad du de bzhin
25b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas 'di gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes gyis shig/khyod kyi the tshom dang yid gnyis ci dang ci
25b6(mdo sde): yod pa de dang de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de kho na la legs par zhus shig dang /des khyod la lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to//de nas byang chub sems
25b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas nges legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo ngos phyag btsal
26a1(mdo sde): te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen po grangs med pas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs
26a2(mdo sde): so//de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/'khor rab tu 'khor
26a3(mdo sde): 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/shig shig rab tu shig shig/mer mer rib tu mer mer/ldem ldem rab tu ldem ldam/de la sogs pa byas te sa tshun po rab tu g.yos so//
26a4(mdo sde): denas 'khor de dag gnang na tshangs pa dang /dbang po dang /'jig rten skyong dang /lce ma yin dang /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ste rnams kyis sa gzhi de lta bur gyur
26a5(mdo sde): pra mthong nas skyi bung zhes byas te 'jigs shing kha dang lko ma skams nas 'bros par chas te rang rang gi 'od kyang mi mthong zhing 'od nyams par gyur to//de nas 'khor de nyid
26a6(mdo sde): kyi nang nas 'dzumo dpal gzhon nur gyur pa langs te lha'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/shar phyogs logs
26a7(mdo sde): su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa gtams khrag khrig gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab grangs med pa snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog sgra ston mu tug ces
26b1(mdo sde): bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhig bzhes te/de
26b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa des rang gi slas kyi thu bo nyan thos la bos te bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
26b3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bor 'gyur gyis/de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma phul
26b4(mdo sde): la/khyod kyi the tshom dang ying gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dag kyang legs par zhus shig dang des khyod la lung bsten par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
26b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas 'dri btang ste/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas 'dir 'ongs pa dri'i gzi brjid kyis khyod
26b6(mdo sde): kyi 'od nyams par gyur to//de 'ong ba la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pas bdag cag gi dri bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
26b7(mdo sde): pa mdzad pa la'ang ltos shig ces byas so//de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis me long gi ngos la bdag gi gzugs mthong ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thag ring
27a1(mdo sde): bo na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang 'jig rten gyi khams dmadzong ngo //ngan smra'angam dngul gzhon nur dgyur pa sal por de dag la 'di dang /
27a2(mdo sde): ces smras so//ji ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dri mthong ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'jig
27a3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gzhan dag kyang ltos shig/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'di ltar bdag nyid che ba yin te/rang gi gnas na bzhugs bzhin du'ang khyed la zhal
27a4(mdo sde): ston par mdzad do//'khor de dag gis smras pa/kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bdag nyid che ba'ang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba lta kye bud ces bya/
27a5(mdo sde): zhing 'khod do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor ba'ang mthong ste/
27a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de'o lus kyi ba spu'i khung ba re re nas pad+ma chen po byung ngo //pad+ma chen po ri ri la'ang grong khyer bdun khri brgyad stong bdun khri brgyad stong yod la grang
27a7(mdo sde): khyer dri dag kyang yul yangs pa can gyi thag gru tsam shwa stug ste/rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba dang 'obs bdu ni ram gyis bskor ba shing ta la'i phreng ba bdun rim gyis
27b1(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa sha stag ste/'byor pa drang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang ldan zhing dga' dga' ltar 'dug la ra ba de dag kyang dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi ba gam+ba chen po sha stag gis 'arko
27b2(mdo sde): te/ba gram thams cad kyi bar bar no'ang shing ljon pa gzhon sha can 'bras bu dang me tog dang ldan pa sna mang po dag yod do//shing ljon pa de dag gi yal ga rlung gis bskyod pa
27b3(mdo sde): las kyang sil snyan dga' bar byed pa'i sgra snyan zhing chags su rung ba 'byung ba sna lnga lnga sgrogs te/sgra de dag gis sems can de dag rtse zhing dga' la dgra' mgur spyod do//'obs
27b4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang chubasi lo zhing shel bzhin du da ba dag gis grang bar 'dug ste/de dag gi nang kho ra khor yug tu sems can de dag rin po che'i gru dag gis dga' zhing rgyu
27b5(mdo sde): bar byed do//chu de dag kyang pad+ma dang /ut+pa la dang /ku mud shing rta'i 'phang lo tsa me sha stag gris brgyan te//'obs kyi kho ra khor yug kyang skyid mos tshal gyi phreng bras
27b6(mdo sde): mdzes par byas te/skyed mos tshal re re la'ang rdzing bu thag gru dpag tshud phyed pa lnga lnga yod do//rdzing bu'i chu dag kyang pad+ma dang ut+pa la dang /ku mu da kha dog sna tshogs dri
27b7(mdo sde): zhim po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag gis khebs par 'dug la shing ljon pa me tog rgyas pa'i phreng bas mdzes par byis so//skyed mos tshil kho ra kho rari yug na'ang nga//
28a1(mdo sde): ngur dang /zal mo dang khrung khrung shugs dag gis pad+ma'i ze 'bru myang bar byed do//kho ra khor yug gi/skyed mos tshul de dang de dag na'ang khang khyim dag
28a2(mdo sde): yod la/khang pa re re la'ang chu zheng du dpag tshad bzhi bzhi yod de rtsig pa ni gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya dang shel las byas/sa gzhi nI ke kai ru las grub pa ste/nor bu'i
28a3(mdo sde): 'jo cher gyis spem zhing snang bar byas pa'i mu tig gi do shal sbyangs pa dang ldan pa gser gyi rta babs chen po dang skar khung dang dra ba dag gis brgyan pa'i khang bzang mthon
28a4(mdo sde): po sa gzhi ni gser gyi bye ma brdal ba dang ldan pa shra stag go//rdzing bu rnams kyang 'dul pa'i lam gser gyi them skas them pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa dang /mtha' thog thag/
28a5(mdo sde): tu gser gyi chu shing gI phrong bas mdzes par byas pa'i lha'i tsan+dan gyi dri bsung can gyi chu dang ldan pa sha stag go/grong khyer chen po de dag re re'i nang na'ang rgyal po brgyad khre
28a6(mdo sde): zhi stong brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan tu
28a7(mdo sde): zhing dga' la dgra' mabur spyod do//sems can gzhan dag kyang de dang 'dra ste sa phyogs ka tsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa/me tog
28b1(mdo sde): sil mas gtor ba/gzhan dag naHzhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do//grong khyer chen po dag na thug pa chen po'i snyam gtogs par theg pa gzhan gyi sgra med do//pad+ma can
28b2(mdo sde): po de dag la'adra seng ge'i khri chen po rkang pa gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang /shel las byas pa/ka ling+ka'i ras kyis g.yogs pa che ba la 'os pa 'jig rten gsum nu phul du
28b3(mdo sde): bya ba she stag gis dkris te/seng ge'i khri de dag la rgyal po de dag 'a khod cing sems can bzhan+da dag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams slob par byed do/rgyal po dri dag gi mdun
28b4(mdo sde): nanonal la nI yi ge 'dri/la la ni klog la lin kha ton slob bo//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas kyi ba spyi'i khung bu nas skyes pa'i pad+ma dag lce
28b5(mdo sde): 'khod pa'i sems can de dag 'dod pa'i yon tan ldi'i dga' ba dang ldan yang /de dag yongs su spangs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te smre sngags 'don cing kyi hud kyi hud ces bla zhing
28b6(mdo sde): 'khod de nyis 'gyur du mchod pa'i tshogs 'bul bar byed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pas
28b7(mdo sde): skor te/de lta bu'i 'byor pa'i rnam pa dag ston cing mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang zhal zas ches rgya che ba dag khyer te 'ongs nas/zhal zas de dag dang pad+ma de dag gi dri ba sung
29a1(mdo sde): tshor ba gang yin pa de dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bras gar gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang mtho
29a2(mdo sde): bar gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas kyi lus kyi tshad kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'dug ste/sus kyang mthong bar mi
29a3(mdo sde): nus so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste zhabs la mgo blos phyag btsal nas thal mo sbyar
29a4(mdo sde): te 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/lan gnyis
29a5(mdo sde): lan gsum du gsol kyang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' de langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
29a6(mdo sde): nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs legs nus kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems drapa'i chen po lus chen mtha' yoso zhes bya ba 'khor gri tshogs chen po dang ldan po sha stag
29a7(mdo sde): lhogs te/de dag go pad+mo dang grong khyer gyi tshad kyang snga ma snga ma las nyis 'gyur nyes 'gyur gyis che ba dang /'byor po nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che ba sha stag dang
29b1(mdo sde): ces te//de dag der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das lnga pad+ma dgra gis mchod pa byasU te snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//shing sA la zung gi drung grub pa'i gnas de
29b2(mdo sde): nyid na dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshad kyi khyon gyi sa gzhi la sems can mi 'khod pa'i glo skabs ci'ang med do//de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
29b3(mdo sde): ltar lus che bA rung rang gi g.yog 'khor dag dang btsos pa de rnams kyang kha cig ni sa phyogs skyang bu'i rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod do//kha cig ni khab kyi rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod
29b4(mdo sde): ngo//kha cig ni rdul phra rab kyi khyon tsam la bgra yungs su 'khod do//'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag kyang
29b5(mdo sde): thabs de lta bur lhags te 'khod do//dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can yang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang /gnas brtan kun droga' bo dang /rgyal po ma skyes dgra rnams ma gtogs
29b6(mdo sde): par der ma 'ongs pa su'ang med de/tha na mi gdug pa dang /sbrul gdug pa dang /sdig pa sdom la sogs pa las mi bzad pa bcu drug byed pa yon chad kyang der lhags
29b7(mdo sde): so//sbyin byed ma'i bu dang /lha ma yin rtag tu 'khon gyi bsam pa can thams cad kyang sdig pa'i las spangs nas gcig la gcig bu dang /ma dang sring mo dang 'dra bar
30a1(mdo sde): sems par gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems n+dan thams cad kyang gcig la gcig pu gcig pa la
30a2(mdo sde): bya ba bzhin du byams par byed de/'drod chen po ni ma gtogs so//mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bong ba dang rdo dang /gsen
30a3(mdo sde): mo dang rngu ba dang tsher ma med par gyur te shing ljon pa rin po che'i 'khri shing gis dkris pa mnyen zhing reg na 'jam pa drug dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang 'dra
30a4(mdo sde): bubar gyur to//sems can der lhags pa thams cad kyis kyang de na 'khod bzhin du ji ltar me long gi ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du rdul phra rab kyi rdul
30a5(mdo sde): skyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa gzhan dag kyang mthong ngo //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs
30a6(mdo sde): sngon po dang ser po dang dmar bro dang dkar po dang btsod ka dong shel gyi kha dog lta bu dang /me lce lta bu dag byung ba gang yin pa de dag gis bya ba thams cad byas te phyir ldog
30a7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal du zhugs te mi snang bar gyur to//'khor thams cad kyi 'od kyang des zil gyis gnon par gyur to//de nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin/
30b1(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'od zer de dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mi snang bar gyur pa mthong nas 'jigs shing skyi bung zhes byas te rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer
30b2(mdo sde): rnams phyir log nas mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i mi rigs na/gor ma chag par phyogs bcu dag tu bya ba rnams zin nas da ni gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya
30b3(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis grang las kyang zhalo zas mra bzhes ni/kye ma sems can thams cad la tshad med pa bzhi spangs sum/ci srung bar
30b4(mdo sde): bzhugs par chad dam/kye ma ci nyi ma dang zla ba nub byam/ci dam pa'i chos kyi gru bying ngam/kyi hud kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod do//de nas de dag rang rang gris yan lag rnams
30b5(mdo sde): rmas par byas pa'i khrag gis sa gzhi 'dam du gyur to//chu klung gser ldan yang khrag tu 'bab par gyur to//de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na grong khyer ku shi pa mgur ba'i bu
30b6(mdo sde): dge bsnyen skul byed ces bya ba de mgar ba'i bu bco lnga dang thabs cig tu langs te/rang rang gi spyod lam bcos nas 'jig rten dag la bltas te blo gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
30b7(mdo sde): nas pus mo g.yos pa'i lho nga sa la gtsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas mchi ma me thub bzhin du zhabs la phyag btsal te/bcom
31a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
31a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas la la zhal zos kyi tha ma dbul bar 'tshalnga te/bdag ni mgon ma mchis
31a3(mdo sde): pa lags/rtsa lag ma mchis pa lags/skyabs ma mi chos pa lags/phongs te re ba lags na/bcom ldan 'dus kyis bdag gis phul pa'i zhal zas bzhes
31a4(mdo sde): te yongs su mya ngan lngas mi 'da' bar mdzad du gosol/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na khyim bdag gam bram ze shin tu dbul po 'ga' zhig gzhan gyi yul du
31a5(mdo sde): mchis la/bdag nyid spro ba bskyed de mthar gyis zhing las brtsams nas des rmon glang rmo skyen pa thong gshol dang sbyang ba dag gis zhing la rdo dang /rngu ba dang /cher
31a6(mdo sde): ma ma mchis par bgyis te raM ba chen po bskyed nas sprin chen po las chur 'bab pa sdod cing mchis pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus kyi zhing la nyes
31a7(mdo sde): pa gsum dang bzhi dang bral ba'i yid dang ngag gi rmon gleng dang shes pa'i thong gshol gyis nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rdo dang /rngu ba dang /cher ma ma mchis
31b1(mdo sde): par bgyis nas khyod kyi chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char pa 'babra pa la sdod cing mchis te dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par spyan 'dren na/bdag gi dbul ba da
31b2(mdo sde): ba dang sems can thams cad la sbran pa'i slad du bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/bdag ni mgon ma mchis pa/skyabs ma mchis pa lags na/de
31b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas bdag la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs par gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal ba gang zag bla na med pasra mgur ba'i
31b4(mdo sde): bu skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi zhal zas tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol
31b5(mdo sde): tu phyin pa chen po bzhes par mdzad do//de nas lho dang mi dang lha ma yin de dag gis skul byed kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha mi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po de bzhin
31b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas bzhes so zhes thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos thob ste/legaso so legs so zhe so skad chen po phyung nas
31b7(mdo sde): mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so//kye mgar ba'i bu sgul byed khyod skying de ba khyod kyis mi lus thob pa ni phan thogs par gyur to//legs par thob bo//
32a1(mdo sde): skul byed 'jig rten na u dum+bA ri'i me tog bzhin du mdzes pa ni rnyed par dka'o//de bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o//dengs
32a2(mdo sde): kyang dad pa rnyed pa shin tu dka'o//de bas kyang ches chos thos pa rnyed par dka'o//de bas kyang chos de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma dbul ba rnyed par dka'o//
32a3(mdo sde): de bsda na zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par dka'o//mgar ba'i bu skul byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//dper na ston zla 'bring po nya la sprin med pa'i tshe
32a4(mdo sde): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa mdzes pa mthong ba na zla ba 'ba' zhig mngon du snang ba de bzhin du khyod kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi zlu ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pas
32a5(mdo sde): na khyod 'ba' zhig sems can thams cad la mngon du srung ngo //khyod la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo//skul byed khyod ni mI'i lus byed bzhin du lha'i yang lha yin no//
32a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras sgra gcan zin dang 'dra'o zhes byas nas tshigs su bcad po 'di dag kyang smras so//khyod ni mi ma yin te lha mchog yin//mi mchog gtso
32a7(mdo sde): bo khyad par 'phags pa ste//de phyir khyod la gsol ba 'di skad 'debs//ston pa yongs su mya nga ni 'da' bar chos//bdag cag kun la brtse bas skul byed khyod//
32b1(mdo sde): skye bo rnams la yun du phan pa'i phyir//'dir ni ston pa dpag med mgon po la//bzhugs shing rgyun tu bdud rtsi ston ces gsol//srid las rnam grol mya ngan 'da' brjod
32b2(mdo sde): lo//glal te khyod kyis de ring mo gsol na//bdag cag thams cad ma rung shes par gyis//de bsdu pa ni phyir mi ke ni la gsol ba thob//de nas la la zhig pa ma gnyis
32b3(mdo sde): ba las phyir sos te gson por 'dug pa mthong na mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa de kho na bzhin du mgur ba'i bu stsol byed ngo mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas lag pa brkyang ste/bcom
32b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag btsal nas langs te tshigs su bcad pa'i dri dag smras so//kye mdong bdug rnyed pa legs par rnyed//mi yi 'jig rten skyes po 'dres bu yod/
32b5(mdo sde): deni rnyed la sogs las 'phrul mi 'gyur//mi bzad dmyal bar yang ni lhung mi 'gyur//deng 'dir rnyed pa chen po rnyed pa 'dri//gser gyi phung po bos kyang lhag pa yin//
32b6(mdo sde): dpa' blo bde gshegs mgon dang phred pas na//phyin chad bdag ni dud 'gros 'jigs pa med//sangs rgyas la ni dad pa gting zug pa//dang rnyed u dum+ba ri'i me tog bzhin//
32b7(mdo sde): rab 'jigs yi dgas 'gro ba yongs spangs shing //lha min skye bo'i sa bon mi bzod bcom//de bzhin gshegs 'byung dkon dang deng phrad pa//kheb kyi rtse mor yungs
33a1(mdo sde): 'bru chags pa bzhin//de la pha rol phyin mchog sbyin phul bas//rtag tu lha yi 'gro bar 'phar bar gyur//chu gnas pad+ma chus mi chags pa ltar//drang
33a2(mdo sde): srong chen po 'jig rten chas rnams kyis//chags med phrad pas srid rtse'i sa bon kun//drungs phyung bdag nyid 'khor ba'i mtsho chen rgal//rgya mtsho'i nang gi rus sbal zhar
33a3(mdo sde): bri'i mgrin//gnya' shing mig tu chud dka' 'dra ba las//bde gshegs dang phreng de la sbyin pa phul//de na bdag gis nyon mongs gasrog kun bcom//lha rnams
33a4(mdo sde): kyis ni zhal zas bzang po dag/phul yang bde gshegs ma bzhes bdag las ni//oM r-iN+DA yi me tog 'dra ba zhes des//bdag ni 'jig rten rab mchog dpal yon
33a5(mdo sde): nAn//tshungs pa baN+Da byin la sogs 'jig rten 'di//thams cad lhags te gus par bdag la mchod//khyu mchog gnas su son pa gang yin 'dri//skye ba 'di
33a6(mdo sde): nyid la ni bdag gris thob//de nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//mgon khyod mya ngan 'da' ba mthong nas ni//'jig rten 'di kun
33a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gzir bar gyur//dbang med kyi drod ces ni skad cher blo//'di dag mdor rtag tu sras bzhin gzigs//lhun po'i gser gyi rtse mo rab mtho ga/ma
33b1(mdo sde): chen dbus na mdzes par gnas pa ltung //chos kyi mnga' bdag khyod ni chos ston cing //dge /dun dkyus su mdzes par bzhugs su gsol//ji ltar nyi ma gzican shA nga/
33b2(mdo sde): na//'od zer dag gis sprin srab sel ba ltar//drang srong chen po ye shes sgron chen gyis//skye bo mang po'i mya ngan deng bsal mdzad//sems can 'di dag dus mos mig
33b3(mdo sde): skrangs shing //sdug bsngal gcig pu'i rgya mtsho'i gting du zhugs//de phyir dad pa rnyed dka' bskyed mdzad cing //'di rnams sdug bsngal chod la yun du bzhugs//de
33b4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la bka' stsal pa/skul byed de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni u dum+ba re'i me tog bzhin shin tu rnyed par
33b5(mdo sde): dwaka'o//dad pa'ang rnyed par dka'o//chos thos pa'ang rnyed par dka'o//de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan lasra 'da' ba'i tshe zhal zas kyi tha mi'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
33b6(mdo sde): phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnyed par dka'o//skul byed gzhan yang khyod ma du mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha mo'i sbyin pa'i pha
33b7(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa thob bo snyam du dga' bo skyed cig dang de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol zhes de skad du khyod gsol ba ma 'debs
34a1(mdo sde): shag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi de kho na nyid la rtogs shig/mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug par gas shig/'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par gyi
34a2(mdo sde): shrIg ces bka' stsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//tshe ni shin tu ring yang 'jig par 'gyur//'dir ni thams cad nges par 'chi bar 'gyur//
34a3(mdo sde): ba'i 'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos can yin//'byor pa thams cad rgud par gzhal bar 'gyur//rtag tu lang tsho rga bas nges par 'joms//gzugs bzang nad med
