34a4(mdo sde): nad kyis 'jig par 'gyur//srog ni 'chi bas rtsa nas 'byin par byed//'jig rten kun na rtag pa ci yang med//dbang phyug mi rtag tshe yang mi rtag ste//skye bo sdug bsngal
34a5(mdo sde): 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor//'jig rten gsum na brten po ci yid myong //srid pa dag na 'gro kun srog tu 'dug/srid pa 'jog pa'i chos can rag g.yo ba//'di dag na ni
34a6(mdo sde): bde ba ci yang med//rga dung 'tshe dang rlung dedi rlung rnams kyi//'jigs pas rtag tu kun nas k+Shetse bar byed//srid pa mtha' med mi brtag snying po myed//rnams cad dgra
34a7(mdo sde): khu bar shes par gyis//don 'khor zhing nyon mongs drab yis//'jig rten dkris te dar gyi srin bu bzhin//'jig rten dag na ther zug gnod pa'i gzhi//rtag tu 'bras
34b1(mdo sde): ltar sdug bsngal 'brel pa gleng //mi gtsang lus dang 'dod pa de dag la//phan 'dod sdug bsngal bsal 'dod su zhig dga'//mi rtag 'dod pa rnams lnga chags pa med//tshul
34b2(mdo sde): bzhin rtog pas 'dod chagasu 'bral bar 'gyur//de nas yang dag mtho rini 'dod chags 'bral//de dag spangs bcad grol ba nyid du 'gyur//nga ni srid pa'i chu chen
34b3(mdo sde): lags par brgal//nga ni sdug bsngal rnams 'das bde bar zhugs//de phyir ngas ni mtha' yas spros med pa//chags pa kun bsngal thar pa thob par 'gyur//nga la rga dang
34b4(mdo sde): na dang 'chi ba med//nga la rtag tu tshe yang zad pa med//nga ni me ltar 'phar te 'gro 'gyur gyis//khyod kyis nga ni med 'gyur ma sems shig/de bzhin gshegs nyid lhun po
34b5(mdo sde): 'dra bar ltos//nga deng yang nAg mya ngan 'das bar 'gyur//bde mchog de ni nga yis chos nyid de//rgyal rnams spyod yul yin gyis khyod ma du//de nas bcom ldan 'das
34b6(mdo sde): la mgar ba'i bu skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ni de lags so//de ni de lags te/mya ngan las 'das pa ni thadag gis kyang bsam gyis mi/
34b7(mdo sde): khyab lags na//sdong bu dang 'dra ba'i sems can theg pa dam+baR+sha pa gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kye ma bdag nang du byang chub sems dpa'
35a1(mdo sde): mi mchog skal ba chen po dang ldan pa mchod par 'os 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa dang //zag pa zad pa rnams dang mnyam pa nyid
35a2(mdo sde): du gyur to//bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/gsar du bsnyen par rdzogs pa gzhon nu'ang rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi nyin par nas dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun du dgrang
35a3(mdo sde): zhing yang dag par 'dus par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi grangs su gtogs shing
35a4(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dus lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/kha zas tshig pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'da'
35a5(mdo sde): bar gshegs par ni mi 'tshal lags so//de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so//skul byed khyod 'di
35a6(mdo sde): skad du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/kha zas tshigri pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' bor gshegs par ni mi 'tshal la zhes de skad ma
35a7(mdo sde): zer cig/'du byed kyi rang bzhin blta bar bya mang /de ltar lta ba gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/dam pa'i chos 'dod pas ni//
35b1(mdo sde): de lhung bslab par bya'o//skul byed kyis smras pa/btsun pa 'jam dpal 'o na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang lha mchog tu gyur pa la gral te 'du byed du gyur na
35b2(mdo sde): lha'i yang ltar 'os pa mi yin no//'du byed rnams ni chu bur bzhin du shes shing shrIng rta'i 'pha lo bzhin du 'khor ba yin no//lha rnams ni mchog tu tshwa ring zhes
35b3(mdo sde): grag la/de bzhin gshegs pas ni lo borgya'ang ma thub ste/de bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no//dper na mi la la zhig grong dpon byed
35b4(mdo sde): pa las de mthar gyis dbang phyug chen por gyur nos blon po chen po'i dbang phyug las kyang 'das te/reng gi dbang phyug gi 'bras bu chos kyis rnyed pa la longs spyod pa las de
35b5(mdo sde): yang bsod nams zad cing dbang phyug las nyams par gyur na/gzhan gyis bkrol zhing brnyas par 'gyur ba de/ci'i phyir zhe na/dbul por gyur pa'i phyir ro//de dang 'dra bar/
35b6(mdo sde): gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur du zin na/'chi ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir lha'i yang lhar 'osre pa ma yin no//btsun pa 'dzum dpal de bsran lha'i yang lha de bzhin
35b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ji ltar 'du byed dang 'dra bar ma lta zhig/'jam dpal gzhan yang ci khyod shes bzhin du//de bzhin gshegs
36a1(mdo sde): pa la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du rtog par byed dam/'on te ma shes pas rtog par byed/gal te de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed dang 'dra na ni
36a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum po dag na chos kyi dbang phyug rnyed pa lha'i lha mdzad pa'i 'os ma yin no//dper ni rgyal po'i dbang po la la zhig la gyad stong gi mchog tu gyur pa'i gyad
36a3(mdo sde): cig yod la/de kyang thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i phyir kyang stong thub ces bya ba'i ming thob ste/de lo gyang zla med pa'i phyir bla nas dbang thang chen po 'grub na ci gyad stong thub
36a4(mdo sde): pa de'i ming de thos na skad grags pa de mi bden pa yin nam/'on te yon ton yod na ni yon tan can gyi ming thob pa yin no//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'adzi nyon
36a5(mdo sde): mongs pa'i bdud dang /phung po'i bdud dang /lha'i bu'i bdud dang /rang bzhin gyi bdud kyi gyad thams cad bcom pas na gyad stong thub bzhin du yang dag pa'i yon tan gyi
36a6(mdo sde): shoko nas 'jig rten gsum po dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yin gyis btsun pa 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin
36a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa la 'du byed dang 'dra bar yongs su ma rtog cig/dper na la la zhig phyug cing nor mngo ba'i rigs su skye ba blangs la tshe thung bar 'gyur ba zhig ste de skar
36b1(mdo sde): mkhan dag gis mthong nas khye'u 'di ni tshe thung ngo zhes bstan te/de'i pha mas de skad thos na 'di ni bdag cag gi khyim du phan par 'gyur ba ma yin no snyam nas grangs su'ang mi
36b2(mdo sde): rtsi zhing de la byams par mi byed do//de ltar skyes pa'am/bud med dam/lha 'am tshangs pa'ang rung ste/gang tshe thung ba de la khyad du gsod par gyur na/gal te de bzhin
36b3(mdo sde): gshegs po chos 'ba' zhig la yang dag par gzhol ba nyid 'du byed du gyur du zin nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis brnyas par 'gyur ro//chos thams cad kyi nang na ni phyir ltung ba
36b4(mdo sde): med cing zad pa med pa la thar pa zhes bshad na gal te de ltar gyur na don med par gyur gyis/btsun pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur ces de skad du ma gsung
36b5(mdo sde): zhig/dper na bud med gzhon nu dbul mo//bkren ma mgon med pa/nad kyis thebs pa/bar ma dor sdug bsngal bar gyur pa/sbrum pas nyen pa zhig mgon med pa khang
36b6(mdo sde): pa zhig tu spong ba las bu mo de bu byung nas de na snga nas gnas pa gzhan dag gis de de'i nang nas bskrad de nyon mongs ma de bu btsas ma thag tu byis pa kha dmar khyer nas lo legs
36b7(mdo sde): pa'i yul zhig tu chas te song ba las lam du she sbrang dang /sbrang bu dang /rlung dang nyi tshan dang /sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas nyen par gyur to/gang+gA'i klung tshon po rgal bar/
37a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa las dri rgal bar ma nus so//khye'u de khyer bzhin du gang+gA'i nang du shi nas de bu de la byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par gyis lus dang
37a2(mdo sde): bral te shi ba'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bu skyes te/byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par ji lta bu zhig gis skyes zhe na/bdag ni shi'ang blo'i khye'u 'di nye zho
37a3(mdo sde): med par thar par bya'o snyam pa'i bsod nams kyi khyod par gyis skyes pa de bzhin du btsun po 'jam dpal skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos dbyung bar 'dod pas/de bzhin
37a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur par blta bar mi byi zhong 'du shes kyang bsgyur bar mi bya'o//gal te de lta bu'i migri lus la med na'ang /bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis
37a5(mdo sde): mi khyab bo snyam du yang dag po'i lta ba can du bya'o//sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gdams ngag ston pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa yin no zhes bstan
37a6(mdo sde): par bya'o//dam pa'i chos 'byin par byed pas ni ji ltar bud med gzhon nu dbul mos gang+gA'i klung las bu bsgral ba'i phyir rang gi srog dang bsngos te 'bad pa de bzhin du bya'o//
37a7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos dbyung ba'i thabs bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas par mthong
37b1(mdo sde): na bdag nyid kyis don du bya ba'i thar pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ro//btsun pa 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig lam du 'gro bas dub par gyur te khyim gyi nang du nyal ba las
37b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe khyim de thog thag nas me chen po 'bar te/mi de mes 'chi gA na dA ni srog med zin no snyam nus ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang ldan pas bdag nyid gos kyis dam
37b3(mdo sde): du dkris te sems dran pa dang ldan bzhin du shi nas de ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod par sems pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rgyal srid ni lan brgyad
37b4(mdo sde): cu byas/tshangs pa'i rgyal srid ni lan 'bum byas/mi'i 'jig rten du'ang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la lan du ma byas te dran song rnams su'ang mi skye la ldan mang du bde
37b5(mdo sde): ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'ba' zhig thob pa de bzhin du/'jam dpal khyod skyes bu dam pa dag ltar 'dzem par gyis shig/ngo tsha shes par gyos shig/de bzhin
37b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'du byed kyi thabs la 'jug pa spyod du ma gzhug cig/dge slong tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa la de bzhin gshegs
37b7(mdo sde): pa 'dus byas yin no zhes zer bas ni mu stegs par gyur te shi'ang bla'o//de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas yin bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin no
38a1(mdo sde): zhes zer ba gang yin pa de dag ni brdzun du smra ba yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas pa yin no zhes zer bu rnams ni rang gi khyim dang 'dra bar
38a2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro//btsun pa 'jam de dril de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas drang 'dra bar ma lta zhig/da phyin chad 'khor pong rgyu ba na mi shes
38a3(mdo sde): paprapal bzlas te bcom ldan 'das ni 'dus mi byas pa'o snyam pa'i shes pa 'ba' zhig rtogs par gyos shig/de ltar byas pa dang bsgom pa de'i 'bras bus khyod myur ba
38a4(mdo sde): kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de nas 'jam dpal gawAn nor gyur pas/mugar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad
38a5(mdo sde): ces smras so//legs so legs so//tshe ring bar gyur cig/rigs kyi bus ni de ltar bya ba yin no//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang
38a6(mdo sde): zer zag dang /'dus ma byas pa dang brtan par shes so//da ltar khyod kyis 'di kho na ltor 'dus byas khong rlag tu btang ba'i sgo nas shes pa lasra na khyod kyang ring po myi
38a7(mdo sde): thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang de ltar 'u bu cag gnyis kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsdogs pa brjod do/
38b1(mdo sde): zhes phyis bsngags par 'gyur ro//skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos sgyur cig/sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na ni sbyar te sbyin pa mchog yin no//de la sgyur te sbyin zhes
38b2(mdo sde): bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sa bon las myu gu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir gang gi tshe dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma'ang
38b3(mdo sde): rung ste/don 'ga' zhig gi phyir lam du zhugs nas dub par gyur pa de dag lo ci yod pa dang /de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa dang /brtags pa'i sbyin pa byed pa de ni sbyar te sbyin pa zhes
38b4(mdo sde): bya'o//skal byed de bzhin du khyod kyis ci yod pa las zhal zas kyi tha ma mang yang rung nyung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun drang bcas pa khyad par yod kyang
38b5(mdo sde): rung khyad par mod kyang rung ste 'drim du tshug cig/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su nye'o//de nas skul byed kyis sbas pa/btsun pa 'jam
38b6(mdo sde): dpal khyod kha zas la chags sam tsi ni zhal zas mang yang rung nyung yang rung brims shig ces bdag gi gzhen 'debs par byed/bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug gi bar du dka'
38b7(mdo sde): kha spyod po mdzad mdzad na ci skad cig tsam yang gzhes mi spyod dam/de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin te zhal zas kyi sku ma yin na ci bcom ldan 'das zhal zas gsol
39a1(mdo sde): lam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal/skul byed kyis ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin no//skul byed legs so legs
39a2(mdo sde): so//khyod ni theg pa chen po la shes rab che ba'o//khyod ni theg pa chen po la shed byed pa'o//'jam dpal gyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so//gal te de ltar bzhed
39a3(mdo sde): par gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa sku tshe ring bar shog tsog/skul byed kyis smras pa/ci bdag 'ba' zhig la bcom ldan 'das mnyis sam/'on te sems can
39a4(mdo sde): thams cad la'ang mnyes/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ci bcom ldan 'das/lha khyod dang /bdag dang /sems skyon thams cad la'ang mi mnyes sngam/skul
39a5(mdo sde): byed kyis smos pa/de skad mra zer cig/gang la mgu bA yod pa de la phyin ci ldog gi 'du shes yod de 'u bu cag ni de la spyod do//dri bzhin gshegs pa la ni mranye sre pa
39a6(mdo sde): 'o ma dgyes pa med do//'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni ba bai'u le bya mos pa'i phyir rtswa zos shing zos shing grong nyid du 'ojo ba de lta bu'i byams pa dang ldan pa ma yin gyi/
39a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la'ang sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs te sangs rgyas kyi shes rab kyi yul ni de lta bu yin no//btsun pa 'jam dpal dper na rte cang shes dang
39b1(mdo sde): sbyar ba'i shing rta rgyug pa'i zla la bong bu'i shing rta rgyug pa mi srid pa de bzhin du 'u bu cag bong bu'i shing rta dang 'dra ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang 'dra ba dang /dgongs
39b2(mdo sde): pa'i tshig dang mnyam du 'gro bar nus re skan/dper na nam mkha' lding dpag tshad du mar 'gro ba nu ma mkha' la gnas pas chu'i nang na nya dang rus sbal 'khod pa rnams me long gi
39b3(mdo sde): ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du gsal bar mthong yang byis pa rnams kyis ni mig mi gsal ba'i phyir de'i mig gi rtsal brjod par mi nus pa de bzhin du de bzhin
39b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i yang de dang 'dra'i//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/skul byed de ni de bzhin te/bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi che ba nyid gleng ba'i phyir de skad du
39b5(mdo sde): brgal bar zad do//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs bkye nas de dag gi 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus la phog go/de nas 'jam
39b6(mdo sde): dpal gyis de rtogs nas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la smras pa/skul byed/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar rings kyis/rus+t+ra su bcom ldan 'das
39b7(mdo sde): la bshos 'drim du chugacig/ma thogs shig/rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de nas skul byed cing mi zer bar 'dug go//
40a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//skul byed nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gror nges/dge slong gi dge 'dun
40a2(mdo sde): la dus su zas 'dri ma du chug cig ces lan gnyis lan gsum du bka' stsal to//de nas skul byed kyis 'di skad smras so//kye ma bcom ldan 'das mi bzhugs na ni
40a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro//bdag cag thams cad kyis dru zhing bcom ldan 'das lnga gsol ba gdab bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces
40a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//skul byed ma du zhig/de ltar lus la rma ma 'byin cig/me'i lus la chu shing bzhin du snying po med par rtogs shig/smig rgyu ba dang /dbu brdos pa dang /
40a5(mdo sde): sgyu ma dang /rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod dang /glog lta bur khong du chud par gyis shig/'dus byas ni nyes pa grangs med pa'i 'byung ginas yin no snyam du shes par gyis
40a6(mdo sde): shig/'dus byas kyi rang bzhin la ltos shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das la skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag dang sems can thams
40a7(mdo sde): cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su mi go nang na bdag ci'i slad du mi du lags/'jig rten stongs kyis ma mchis so//de nas
40b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//nga ni khyod la snying brtse ba dang sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed
40b2(mdo sde): de 'dri ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dang 'dus byas kyi chos nyid do//'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa khong du chud par gyis shig/chos thams
40b3(mdo sde): cad ni 'du byed dang 'dres pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o snyam du rtogs shig/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o snyam du dpyod cig/mi brtan pa/brnyan pa/phyin ci log pa'o snyam
40b4(mdo sde): du soms shog/lus 'di ni nyis drimigs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o snyam du shes par gyis shig/'di ni dbu bo dang 'dra bar ltos la ma du zhig/yi mo chad cig/de
40b5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin du mjal lags na ha cang sdug bsngal chen po mi bzod lags so//bcom
40b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das thebs kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa la ni bdage glo ba rangs legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skul byed legs sro legs
40b7(mdo sde): so//rigs kyi bus ni nga'i mya ngan las 'das pa thabs de ltar lta bar bya'o//skul byed sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni bye gzhad gzas la 'gro ba lta bu ro shes par gyis shig/
41a1(mdo sde): skul byed tshe ring ba dang tshe ring ba ma yin pa'i rtags shes par gyis shig/skul byed chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i chos can no//de bzhin gshegs
41a2(mdo sde): pA ni chos thams cad la thabs kyi chos can yin lnga de rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ba de ni sangs rgyasra bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rlung bzhin no//skul byed khyod
41a3(mdo sde): srid pa'i rgya mtsho las nges par brgal bar bya ba'i phyir zhal zas skyur te 'on cig/lha dang lha ma yin drang mi rnams kyis kyang nga la rang rang gi mchod pa byas nas mi g.yo ba'i
41a4(mdo sde): bde ba thob par gyur cig/khyod kyis kyang snod du gyur pa la dus su sbyin pa gyis shig/mu thogs shig/snod du gyur pa dang de bzhin gshegs bya zhes bya ba ni don
41a5(mdo sde): tha dad pa ma yin no//de nas skul byed kyis sems can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i phyir mgo srad de mchi ma blags nas gsol pa/legs so legs so//lags
41a6(mdo sde): so legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bdag gis bgyi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu ji/
41a7(mdo sde): ltar blta ba de ni bdag cag sbrang bu dang 'dra ba rnams kyi yul yang ma lags/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang ma lags so zhes gsol to//de nas mya
41b1(mdo sde): dan rnyed cing du shin du g.yog 'khod dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te mchod pa chen po'i las byas nas bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gnon nur
41b2(mdo sde): gyur po l+le phyag btsa la ti zhal zas len du stong ngo ///'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thig pa chen po'i mdo//bcu po gsum pa
41b3(mdo sde): dedri nas de'i chos chen po g.yos rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/'khor rab tu 'khor/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/shrig shig rab tu shig
41b4(mdo sde): shig/mer mer rab tu mer mer/ldem ldem rab tu ldem ldem mo//de la sogs pa byas ti mi mkhris pa'i nad kyis brtul bu'i gnod pas thibs pa bzhin dus chen po 'di
41b5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho dug can pa'i mthas gtugs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad thog thag tu rab tu g.yos so//de nas lha dang ma yin dang mi de dag thams cad mgo mo nges te
41b6(mdo sde): 'jigs shing skye bung zhes byas nas ngu bzhin du tshig mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//mgon po khyod la bdag cag rnams//mgo bos phyag 'tshal
41b7(mdo sde): gsol ba 'debaso//rgyal ba khyu mchog khyod dang ni//bral na bdag cag mgon med 'gyur//dong khyod mya ngan 'do' 'gyur 'di bsams na//bdag cag sdug bsngal
42a1(mdo sde): shin tu gting zab bying //thub pa bdag cag snying ni stor bar gyur//ba gzhon rkun khyer be'u la chags pa bzhin//mgon med dbulnga po'i mi de
42a2(mdo sde): la la zhig/nad kyis thobs la sman po med pa dang //rang dgar byed cing kha zas gnod pa rnams//za ba ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba bzhin//skye ba 'di drag nyon
42a3(mdo sde): mongs nad kyis thebs//khyod med khyod kyi chos kyi gsos med pas//lta ba'i nyes pa nyid 'drar 'chi bar 'gyur//de bas phan phyir 'jig rten ma dor cig/ji ltar grong
42a4(mdo sde): khyer rgyal dang bral ba dang //dbul po rnams la mu ge byung ba dang //ji ltar dgon par skom gyis gdungs pa bzhin//khyod 'das 'og tu bdag cag de 'drar 'gyur//
42a5(mdo sde): som sngo can gces khyod mya ngan 'di' bzhed pas//sa gzhi rab tu g.yos shing phyogs kyang 'tshol//rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs//bdag cag kun kyang /
42a6(mdo sde): sdug cing bsngal bar gyur//drang srong chen po deng khyod mya drin las//'das ni nyi ma 'das la ltung yong dag//rgyu mtsho chen po dag kyang sgom par 'gyur//bdag cag
42a7(mdo sde): kun kyang deng du 'gum legs grang //ji ltar stobs ldan mis ni sgo gseb nas//glang chen khyer te nang du 'dzul bgyid na//shin tu nyon mongs 'gyur ba de bzhin du/
42b1(mdo sde): bdag cag thams cad rab tu nyon mongs gyur//ji ltar bu gcig 'gum par mi 'tshal zhing //mya ngan khyod 'da' bdag cag de mi 'tshal//gal te khyod ni mya ngan 'da' ba
42b2(mdo sde): las//mri ga zhes bdag cag thams cad phongs par 'gyur//khyod ni mya ngan 'das ldem gau shegs mthong bas//dud 'gro mang po'ang g.ya ngan tshor bci na/
42b3(mdo sde): bdag cag ji ltar g.yar ngan mi 'tshal lags//bdag tsog mchilo ma bzhin du ma dror cig/nyi ma 'char kar rang gi 'od gsal bas//mun nag rnam par bcom pa
42b4(mdo sde): dri bzhin du//'phrul can khyod kyis sdug bsngal mun bsal te//dge 'dun dbus su ri rab bzhin du bzhugs//bcom ldan 'dus dper gsol na/rgyal po la la zhig
42b5(mdo sde): gi bu sdug cing phangs pa zhig mchis li//des de chos lugs kyi bstan bcos bslabs nas 'di srod cig ces bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dam brag
42b6(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i sras rnams kyang yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed nas bkum gyis ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu ji lta ba de bzhin du bdug cag mi
42b7(mdo sde): 'gum par bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ji ltar la la zhig gzhung gis rtsod pa'i bas ni bcos la brten pa na skrag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/
43a1(mdo sde): khyod kyis skrag par ma mdzad cig/de kho na nyid mkhyen bzhin du bdag drug sems can dmyal bar mchi bar ma mdzad cig/dam pa'i chos kyi
43a2(mdo sde): bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis tshim par mdzad cing de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/ji ltar rgyal po'i btson rlar ru gnod pa'i las rnams kyis dang po nyon/
43a3(mdo sde): mongs pa na/la la zhig gis khyod kyis nA tshe ji lta bu zhig myong zhes smras na/des de la smras pa/de ni dri bzhin te/gang gi tshe bdag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba las thur
43a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ba de bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyang khyod bzhugs na rgyal po'i
43a5(mdo sde): btson rA nAs thar pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa lags na/de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na
43a6(mdo sde): sman pa tshe'i rig byed yan lago brgyad la mkhas pas bdag gi bu la ni chud phyi ma slob par bgyid kyi/slob ma la ni bdag drung mnyam par 'gyur du dogs nas slob par
43a7(mdo sde): mi bgyid pa de bzhin du chos kyi rgyal po sman pa chen po ser sna mi mnga' bi khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i rgyud phyi ma la de ltar mi mdzad par bcom ldan 'das yuni ring du
43b1(mdo sde): bzhugs su gsal/de bzhin du shing rta pA shing rta'i rig byed la mkhas pas bdag gi bu la ni rgyud phyi ma sgra grags par phog pa'i dpyad thams cad slob par bgyid kyi/slob
43b2(mdo sde): ma la ni slob par mi bgyid pa dang /rig pa'i gnas gzhan dag la'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro//bcom ldan 'das dper gsol ni byis pa dang rgan po 'am nad pa la la zhig
43b3(mdo sde): lam bzung po las gol te lam ngan par mchis na shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das sems can lam ngan par mchis pa rnams lus dang /
43b4(mdo sde): dral ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur lags na/bcom ldan 'das lam ston pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/yi mtshan can
43b5(mdo sde): dgu bcu rtsa drug dang /tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la'ang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge
43b6(mdo sde): skyong khyed lha dang mi rnams ltar byis pa'i smre sngags 'don pa dag ma byed par brtson 'grus rtsoms shig/de nas lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung
43b7(mdo sde): blo gros dang ldan pa dang de kho na nyid du 'gro ba thos nas ji ltar bu gcog pa shi nas dur khrod du bor ba bzhin du de dag sdug bsngal bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das
44a1(mdo sde): kyis de dag la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/khyed rnams nges par bder gyur cig/mya ngan ma byed mju zhig/'di na sangs rgyas rna
44a2(mdo sde): kyi chos//thams cad mi sgra 'khod par gyis//bag med par ni ma gnas par//bag yod pa la dga' bar gyis//khyed stong pa dang stong pa ma yin pa'am/rtag
44a3(mdo sde): pa dang mi rtag pa 'am/skyabs dang skyabs ma yin pa 'am/'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba 'am/rten dang rten ma yin pa 'am/thar zug dang ther zug ma yin pa 'am
44a4(mdo sde): brtan pa dang brtan pa ma yin pa 'am/sems can drang sems can med pa 'am/yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa 'am/bden pa dang bden pa ma yin pa 'am//
44a5(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa 'am/gsang ba dang gsang ba ma yin pa 'am/gnyis dang gnyis su med pa 'am/de bzhin du chos rnam
44a6(mdo sde): pa du ma dag la som nyi'am/yid gnyis sam/the tshom za ba ci dang ci yod pa de dang de dag nga la zhus shig dang thams cad gcad par bya'o//bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang
44a7(mdo sde): khyed la bstan par bya ste/de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o//dge slong dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o//mi'i lus thob pa rnyed par dka'o///
44b1(mdo sde): da pa phun sum tshogs pa red par dka'o//bzod pa dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa ma zhig ma ral ba'ang shin tu rnyed par dka'o//'jig rten na dgra bcom dA ra//
44b2(mdo sde): 'thob pa ni gser gyi phye ma dang /u dum+ba ri me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'o//dge slong dag 'di lta ste/sa ni thams cad kyi sgo nas sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin
44b3(mdo sde): te/de bzhin du nga'i chos bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs gsang ba thar pa'i grong khyer gyi bdud rtsi'i zas kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o//sems can thams cad dang nga'i sras da /
44b4(mdo sde): slong thams cad la dam pa'i chos mang po brtan por bzhag go//gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan che ba nyid bsgrags te/yi
44b5(mdo sde): ge 'bru gcig pa'i thig le'i gtam yang bzhag nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o//de nas dge slong de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o//
44b6(mdo sde): zhes thos nas mi dga' bar gyur te/spyi bung zhes byas nas mig mchi mas gang bzhino du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das pa lan
44b7(mdo sde): mang du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis sdug bsngal ba dang /mi rtag pa dang /bdag med pa dang /rjes thams da
45a1(mdo sde): kyi nang na glang po che'i rjes ches mchog yin par bstan to zhes gsungs te/de ltar mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas 'dod
45a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/ma
45a3(mdo sde): rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus pa yang dag par chad par 'gyur ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na sngon gyi dus
45a4(mdo sde): su zhing pas rmos cher btab ste rtse ba 'dzings pa thams cad sel bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas
45a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur//
45a6(mdo sde): ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/lhag po'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus par yang dag par zad par 'gyur ro//zhing sras thams cad kyi nang na ni ston gyi zhing smras
45a7(mdo sde): mchog tu bstan to zhes bya ba la sogs pa glang po che'i rjes lta bu'i mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro//bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/rgyal po 'chi//
45b1(mdo sde): ba'i tshe bdag gis btson ra bsal te/sems can rnams bsngon ra'i gnod pas snyon slongs pa lngas thar bar bgyis nas de'i 'og tu 'chi bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan
45b2(mdo sde): 'das khyod kyis kyang sems can mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi btson rar brubs pa rnams kyis mi shes pa'i 'chang ba rnams bcad nas/de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las
45b3(mdo sde): 'da' bar gshegs su gsol/bcom ldan 'dis gzhan yang dper gsol na sems can 'byung po dang sha za'i gdon gyis brlams pa lngas sman pa chen po dang phrad na
45b4(mdo sde): 'byung po dang sha za'i gdon rnams kyis thebs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ba dri bzhin du khyod dang mjal na nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
45b5(mdo sde): 'byung po dang sha za'i gdon rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid khong du chud par bgyid lags so//bcom lda ni 'das dper
45b6(mdo sde): gsol na glang po che'i 'dul sbyong gi mkhan pos spos kyi glang po che zhags pa chen pos bcings po las glang po che'i zhags pa de bcad de brosra pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan
45b7(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /bdag gir 'dzin pa dang /phrag dog dang /mang na 'then dang /ser sna dang /g.yo'i zhags pa chen po bcad nas gleng
46a1(mdo sde): po che'i 'dul sbyong gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa'i lug tu 'ongs na sems can thams cad las nyon mongs pa'i glang po lnga bcu rtsa bdun yongs su
46a2(mdo sde): bsal bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das dbyer gsol na grang ba'i rims kyis thobs pa sman pa chen po'i thang du mchis na sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ba de bzhin
46a3(mdo sde): du/bcom ldan 'das bdug cig kyang nyon mongs pa dang /log par lta ba dang /log pa'i 'tsho ba'i nyes dmigs mtha'i yas pa'i grang ba'i rims nang can gyi lus
46a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa las sman pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis nas sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par thar bar gyur te mi g.yo ba'i bde ba'ang thob lags so//bcom
46a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das gzhani yang dper gsol nI me zhig gros 'bras skye mas 'tshal te ra ro bar gyur nas bdag nyid kyis kyang bdag nyid ma 'tshal te/chos kyang ma 'tshal/chos
46a6(mdo sde): me lags pa'adra ma 'tshal/'di ni bdag gi ma'o//'odi ni bdag gi sring mo'o//'di ni bdag gi bu mo'o snyam du'ang ma 'tshal lo/smad cing bla ste/phyi sa dang /
46a7(mdo sde): gcin gyis rang gi lus kun bsgos shing mchis pa las de'i 'og tu bdag nyid sangs te gzhi ci las gyur pa la mkhas par gyur nas chang ni cir yang mi rung ngo snyam du
46b1(mdo sde): sems te/bdag ni sdig pa thams cad las thar to snyam nas chang btung ba cir yang mi rung bar shas cher bsgoms te spong bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das 'tsho
46b2(mdo sde): bla'i 'jig rten 'di ni zlos gar mkhan bzhin du thog ma ma mchis pa na 'khor ba na 'khor zhing yongs su 'khyams pa na 'di ni bdag gi ma'o//'di ni bdag gi sring mo'o//'di
46b3(mdo sde): ni bdag gi bu mo'o snyam du ma 'tshal nas ma dang sring mo drang bu mo rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i 'du shes spyod par bgyid de/'bras skyems kyis re ro bar gyur pa de bzhin
46b4(mdo sde): du sdug bsngal rnyed par gyur la/de nas ngo tsha shes pa'i mi de dag 'bras skyems kyisku ra ro ba las su ngas pa bzhin cir yang mi rung b.ro shas cher bsgoms nas sdug
46b5(mdo sde): bsngal las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur lags so//gzhan yang e ro N+Da la ni snying po mchis mi srid pa de bzhin du lus 'di la'ang bdag drang /sems can dang /srog/
46b6(mdo sde): dang /gang zag dang /shed las skyes pa dang /shed bu dang /byed pa po mchis mI srid de/de lta bur bdag cag gis bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te mang
46b7(mdo sde): du bgyis lags so//dper gsol na phub ma skon pa bye ba snyed bor ba ni cir yang mi gces pa de bzhin du lus 'di la'ang bdag ma mchis so dper gsol na bas
47a1(mdo sde): gyi me tog la dri bda' ba ma mchis pa de bzhin du lus 'di la'ang bdag ma mchis te/de ltar bdag cag gis bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms
47a2(mdo sde): te mang du bgyis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/de ltar sgoms shig dang de ltar bsgoms pa rnams kyis
47a3(mdo sde): bdag tu 'dzin pa spongs par 'gyur ro//bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su spangs na mya ngan las 'dres pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar
47a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du she sre bsgoms te mang du bgyis lags so//gzhan yang ji ltar nam mkha' la bya'i rjes gda' ba
47a5(mdo sde): ni mi srid pa de bzhin du bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
47a6(mdo sde): bsgom pa de ltar bsgom pa khyed kyis shes sum/dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal dang /mi rtag pa dang /bdag med pa'i 'du shes de
47a7(mdo sde): ma legs pa bsgoms na ni ji ltar mi ra ro zhing 'khyams pas lce khang dang /spo dang /sa gzhi dang /nyi mi dang /zla ba dang /shing dang /ri rnams mi 'khor bzhin du
47b1(mdo sde): 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du gang dag gis sdug bsngal dang /mi rtag pa dang /bdag med pa'i 'du shes ma bsgoms pa'i sems can 'jig rten pa de dag ni ra ro ba dang 'dra bar blta
47b2(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni yang dag par bsgoms legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nga ni dpe 'di'i don de ngas
47b3(mdo sde): bshad par bya'o//khyed kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i don 'di la don ni 'di'o//yi ge ni 'di'o zhes gsal bar mi shes te/ji ltar ni re ro bAs lha khang dang /spo dang /sa
47b4(mdo sde): gzhi dang /nyi ma dang /zla ba dang /shing dang /ri rnams mi 'khor bzhin du 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du 'du shes phyin ci log tu mas zin cing kun tu rmongs pa rnams
47b5(mdo sde): bdag go snyam pa dang /rtag go snyam pa dang /bde'o snyam pa dang /sdug go snyam pa'i 'du shes kun tu spyod do//de la bdog ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i don to//
47b6(mdo sde): rtag ces bya ba ni chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i dron to//bde zhes bya ba ni mya ngani las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to//sdug ces bya ba ni chos kyi tshig bla dgaso so//dge slong dag khyed
47b7(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni sdug bsngal dang mi rtog pa dang /bdag med pa'i 'du shes bsgoms lags so zhes rgyags pa dang /nga rgyal gyis dregs par ma byed
48a1(mdo sde): cig/de ltar rnam pa gsum bsgoms par gyur na ni nga'i bstan pa lnga khyed kyis bsgom pa rnam pa gsum bsgoms pa de bsgom pa don med par 'gyur
48a2(mdo sde): ro/sdug bsngal shes par bya ba bsgom pa rnam pa gsum po ni khyad par dang khyad par gyi'ang khyad par ro//sdug bsngal la bde'o snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log
48a3(mdo sde): pa'o//bde ba la sdug bsngal lo snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o//mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o//rtag pA la mi rtog go snyam
48a4(mdo sde): du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o//bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o//bdag yod pa la bdag med par 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o//
48a5(mdo sde): mi sdug pa la sdug go snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o//sdug pa la mi sdug go snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa ste/phyin ci log bzhi po 'di dag yang
48a6(mdo sde): dag par ma shes par khyed kyis bsgom par bya ba bsgoms te mang du byas so//khyed kyis bde ba la sdug bsngal bar bsgoms so//rtog pa la mi rtag pa dang /bdag
48a7(mdo sde): yod pa la bdag med pa dang /sdug pa la mi sdug par bsgoms so//'jig rten pa rnams la'ang bde ba dang /bdag dang rtag pa dang /sdug pa rnams yod do//
48b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams la'ang bde ba dang /bdag dang /rtag pa dang /sdug pa rnams yod de 'di la phan tshun mi mthun pa yod do//yi ge zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa zhes
48b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i tha tshig go/don ces bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
48b3(mdo sde): 'du shes bzhi lnga sogs pa phyin ci log de bzhin gshegs pas lus su bzhag pa rnams ni bdag cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas mthong yang mthong /bsgoms kyang bsgoms
48b4(mdo sde): lags na/da ji ltar 'tshal ba bka' stsal du gsol/de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa 'am/bskal pa las lhag par yang bzhugs su gsol/de bzhin gshegs
48b5(mdo sde): pas ci dang ci skad du bkang stsal pa de dang de dag de bzhin du bdag cag gis bgyi bar 'tshal lo//gal te de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs su mi gu nang na bdag cag kyang sprul
48b6(mdo sde): bajug pa dang khyim gcig gi nang du lhan cig mchis pa mi 'tshal te/de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na tshungs par spyod cing mchis pa'i rngo mi thog gis khyod nyid kyi spring
48b7(mdo sde): bzhin du bdag cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag lo 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong dag
49a1(mdo sde): de spyad ma zer shig/dge slong dgu sa 'od srung gi lag tu bstan pa gtad par bya ste/'dri ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dge slong rnams kyi rten
49a2(mdo sde): bur 'gyur ro//dge slong rnams dang sems can rnams kyi skyabs lta bur 'gyur ro//dper na rgyal po grong khyer ming po'i mnga' bdag grong khyer gcig tu sing ste/khyim
49a3(mdo sde): bdag gcig rnal por dbang bskur ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir nges 'od srung chen po la dbang bskur ro//dge slong drug khyed kyis sdug bsngal dang /mi rtag pa
49a4(mdo sde): dang /bdag med pa dang /mi sdug pa'i 'du shes ji ltar bsgom zhe na/dge slong dag dper na so kA'i dus la bab pa na skye bo rnams kyis nags tshal gyi nang du chu bskyil te/rang
49a5(mdo sde): rang gi rkyal pa'i yo byad thogs nas chu'i nang du brtse bar byed la/chu de'i nang du gcig gis nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya rigs dang ldan pa zhig bzhag nas bai dUr+ya de 'dod pa'i phyir de
49a6(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyis rgyal ba rnams bor te/chu de'i nang du 'dzul nas de'i nang na gyo mo 'ang gasreg ma ci yod pa dag la nor bu yin snyam ste blangs nas nor bu bdag gis rnyed do//
49a7(mdo sde): bdag gis rnyed do zhes zer zhing so so nas steng du byung ste/rdzing gi 'gram du 'khod nas 'di ni nor bu ma yin no snyam pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur la/rdzing bu de'i chu'ang nor bu
49b1(mdo sde): 'od kyis zla ba'i 'od bzhin du mdzes par 'dug ste/de dag gis mdzes pa de mthong nas/e ma nor bu snyam du yon tan gyi 'du shes skye bar 'gyur te/de dag gi nang nas thabs
49b2(mdo sde): la mkhas shing yid rno ba zhig gis nor bu de yang dag par rnyed pa de bzhin du/dge slong drag khyed kyis thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o//thams cad bdag med pa'o//thams
49b3(mdo sde): cad mi rtag pa'o//thams cad mi sdug pa'o zhes thams cad kyi mu bzung nas bsgoms shing mang du byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rdzing gi gyo mo dang gseg ma bzhin
49b4(mdo sde): du nor zhing don med par gyur ta re/skyes bu thabs la mkhas pa bzhin du gyis shig khyed kyis thams cad kyi mu bzung nas gang dang glang bsgoms pa de dang de nyid la bde ba dang bradag
49b5(mdo sde): dang rtag pa dang /sdug pa yod de rnam pa bzhi po de dag ni phyin ci ma log pa zhes brjod par bya'o//de bas na nor bu dang 'dra bar chos kyi de kho na nyid rtag pa'i 'du shes sgoms shig/
49b6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/de ltar sgoms shig dang /
49b7(mdo sde): deltar bsgom pa rnams kyis ni bdag tu 'dzin pa spongs par 'gyur ro//bdag tu 'dzin pa spangs na mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal lags na
50a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa de'i don ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de'i rnam par dbye ba bka' stsal du gsal/bcom ldan 'das kyis
50a2(mdo sde): dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag legs so legs so//dge slong dgra bdag gi the tshom nges par gcad par 'dod pas ni dri skad ces dri dgos te
50a3(mdo sde): legs so//dge slong dag dper na grong khyer 'ga' zhig na rgyal po shes rab 'chal pa zhig rgyal po byed de/rgyal po de la sman pa dran pa zhig bdog la/de'ang
50a4(mdo sde): sman pa 'tshul pa zhig ste/bla nas dbang thang cher dbang la rgyal pos kyang bkur ba zhig yod pa des 'o ma 'ba'i zhog smani yin par 'dzin la/nad kyi gzhi ni mi shes
50a5(mdo sde): nis 'o ma'i dpyad log par zin pa de skye bo thams cad kyi rlung nod kyi sna grangs rnams la'ang gtong bar byed/mkhris pa'i nad rnams dang /bad kan gyi nad rnams la
50a6(mdo sde): yang gtong bar byed de/de de ltar byed kyang sman pa gtses pa kho nar 'gyur la rgyal po de'ang 'chal pa bye brag mi phyed pa zhig go/de nas sman pa che'i rigs byed yan lag
50a7(mdo sde): brgyad la mkhas pa rgyud phyi ma shes po gzha ni zhig yul gzhan nas go sar du 'ongs nas sman pa de'i thad du rten bcas te smras pa/khyod kyi ming thos nas slob par
50b1(mdo sde): 'tshal ba'i slad du badrag mchis kyis khyod kyis bdug gi mkhan po mdzad du gsol/de nas sman pa 'chal pa des de skad ces thos nas sman pa gsar du 'ongs pa de lnga smras pa//
50b2(mdo sde): lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du nga la legs par bsgrims te dka' ba spyad pas rim gro gyis la dro'i 'og tu skyobs shig dang khyod sman par 'gyur ro//de nas des de bzhin du mnyan
50b3(mdo sde): te/de ltar bgyi'o zhes byas nas des mthar gyis smon pa 'chal pa ngo mgu bar byas te rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol te/rgyal po chen po khyod
50b4(mdo sde): kyis rtag tu bstan bcos thams cad lnga brtson par mdzod cig dang /de ltar mdzad na rgyal por 'os par 'gyur ro//rgyal pos kyang de ni bden te rnar 'ong ngo zhes byas nas rgyal
50b5(mdo sde): po des sman pa 'chal pa de dang sman pa cig shos kyi bye brag phyed par gyur nas/sman pa ngan pa de yul phyogs nas bskrad de sman pa bzang po cig shos bkur bar gyur la/de
50b6(mdo sde): nas smran pa des da ni dus la ba'i bo snyam nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol te/rgyal po chen po gal te bdag la mnyes par gyur na gsol ba sna gcig cig gsol gyis//
50b7(mdo sde): gal te rgyal po chen po'ar dgyes pa lta na gnong bar mdzad du gsol/rgyal pos sman pa la bka' stsal pa/nga'i lag pa g.yas pa man cing nor ro cog las gsol
51a1(mdo sde): cig/sman+da pas rgyal po la gsol pa/rgyal po chen po'i sman pa 'chal pa de'i 'o ma'i dpyad glang lags pa de ni dug ha lA hu lnga lags na/des
51a2(mdo sde): gro bar ma chud kyis rgyal po khyod kyi yul khams thams cad du bkros btags la sngon gyi sman pa de'i 'o ma'i dpyad gong yin pa de ni dug ha la ha la yin gyis su sman du'o/
51a3(mdo sde): ma 'thung ba de mgo bo gcad do zhes bka' gdags par gsol/de ltar ma bgyis na sems can rnams dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi bar 'gyur ro//bdag ni 'tsho bar
51a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /nang ma mchis par 'gyur bar 'tshal te/lha bdag ni gsol ba de 'tshal lags so//de nas rgyal pos sman pa de la bka' stsal pa/de lta na gsol
51a5(mdo sde): ba chung ngu zhig gsol te bka' gdags par bya'o zhes byas nas bka' yang btags so//de nas bka' btagasra pa bzhin du thams cad du lugs su chud par gyur to//
51a6(mdo sde): de nas sman pa des rgyal po de la'ang 'di skad cesu gsol te/da dung yang ldan gnyis lani gsum gyi bar du de bzhin du bka' gdags par gsol zhes byas nas sman pa
51a7(mdo sde): dero mngar ba dang /sgyur ba dang /lan tshwa'i ro dang /tsha ba dang /ska ba dang kha ba rnams kyis mi rnams kyi nad sos par byas so//de nas re zhig na rgyal po nad kyis
51b1(mdo sde): thebs nas sman pa de bkug ste bsgo ba/nga ni shi la thug gis rgyal po'i rkyen drang 'tsham pa'i gsol ba ci 'dod pa khyod la sbyin no zhes byas so//de nas sman pa des rgyal po /
51b2(mdo sde): la gsol pa/rgyal po chen po bdag ni brdzun du smra ba ma lags so//'o ma ni bdud rtsi lags te/khyed kyis zhal zos 'o mo dang sbyar ba gsol 'tshal lo//dri nas rgyal po de
51b3(mdo sde): sman pa de la bka' stsal pa/ci khyod mkhris pas myos par byas sam/'on te spu bur byed dam tsin+da/sngar ni 'o ma dug yin zer l-i da ni 'o ma sman gyi mchog yin no zhes zer/
51b4(mdo sde): mi sman pa snga ma bskrad pas phung ngo //des kyang 'o mo'i dpyang bsngags pa las na de ni smon pa chen po yin gyis sman pa ngan pa ma yin no//khyod kyis 'o ma'i dpyang byas pa ni khyod/
51b5(mdo sde): badrag bskrad pa'i rgyu yin no zhes byas so//sman pas gsol pa/rgyal po chen po de ltar gzhan du mi dgongs par gsol/dper na shing ngam/brtsig po li srin bus bArkos
51b6(mdo sde): te yI ge'i 'bru 'ang bIr gyur pa mthong yang mkhas pa rnams kyis srin bus yi ge shes so zhes brjod par mi bgyi/yi gre sbyar ba lta bur gyur kyang ya mtshan du gzung bar mi bgyi ba de
51b7(mdo sde): bzhin du/khyod kyi spen pa snga ma'i 'o ma'i dpyad kyi las kyang srin bus brkos pa'i yi ge bzhin du blta bar bgyi ste/de ni 'o ma so so'i bye brag kyang ma 'tshal ba lags so//
52a1(mdo sde): rgyal pos sman pa de la smras pa/kwa'i sman pa ngan pa des 'o ma so so'i bye brag ji ltar mi shes/sman pas gsol pa/rgyal po chen po'o ma ni bdud rtsil
52a2(mdo sde): lags dug kyang lags te/de lnga bdud rtsi zhes bgyi ba nI ba glang be'u ha cang stobs dang ldan pa ma lags pa dang /chang gi snyigs mu mi 'thung ba dang /nags khrung dang
52a3(mdo sde): gla sh+long dang chu 'dam rdzab can na mi gnas pa dang /ba lang rjes nu mo ma bzhibs pa dang /rtsa brngas pa ma gsan pa dang /rang gi khyun 'drug pa dang /ma ti'i khyu dang lhan
52a4(mdo sde): cig mi 'grogs pa dang /de la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan la/de'i 'o ma lhag ma zag me bcad par ran tsAm bzhos pa'i 'i ma do ni nad do tsog zhi bar bgyid pa
52a5(mdo sde): lags so//de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas skrun pa de la bka' stsal pa/mkhan po dri na ngas khyod kyi 'o ma'i dpyad bzang po'ang shes so//ngan pa'ang shes so///
52a6(mdo sde): de nas rgyal pos bka' btags te 'o ma 'thung zhig ces bsgo ba dang /'bangs thams cad kris rgyal pos 'o ma 'thung zhig ces bsgo ba thos nas sems 'khrugs
52a7(mdo sde): te/ci rgyal po gdon gyis thebs sam/'on te bdag cag la mtho 'tsham mam zhes zer zhing de ltar grong khyer gyi mi dang 'bang pa thams cad rgyal po'i drung du lhags
52b1(mdo sde): te rgyal pos de dag mthong nas smras pa/sman pa 'di na re 'o ma de 'dra'o zhes zer na khyed bsher ci yod ces byas so//de nas rgyal po dang grong khyer gyi mi dang 'bangs thams cad mgu
52b2(mdo sde): bar gyur nas sman pa la mi mtshungs pa'i bsnyen bkur byas nas 'o ma'i dpyad la yang bsten par byed pa de bzhin du/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya /
52b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bor gshegs pa/'jog rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi
52b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sman pa bzang po dang 'dra bar 'jig rten du byung nas mu stegs pa sman pa ngan pa dang 'dra ba thams cad kyi thad du gshegs te/thams
52b5(mdo sde): cad nges par btul zhing nges par bshig nas rgyal po du ma mgu bar mjed de/mu stegs pa rnams tshur bcid pa'i phyir bdag med do//sems can med do//srog med do//
52b6(mdo sde): gang zag med do zhes gsung ngo //mu stegs pa rnams kyis bdagra bstan pa ni srin bus brkos pa'i yi ge dang 'dra ste/de'i phyir nga sems can thams cad la bdag med do/
52b7(mdo sde): zhes bstan pa ston par mdzad do//bdag med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig yin no zhes chos kyi bka' 'dogs par mdzad nas yong gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi dbang dang sems
53a1(mdo sde): can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dus mkhyen par mdzad nas/chos thams cad bdag med par bstan pa'i skabs de nyid du sman pa bzang po bzhin tu bdag yod
53a2(mdo sde): do zhes yang dag par ston par mdzad de/'jig rten pa rnams kyi bdag mthe bo tsam dang khra rgod kyi 'bru tsam zhes bya ba de lta bu ni ma yin no//'jig rten pa rnams kyi bdag tu
53a3(mdo sde): lta ba gang yin pa de lta bu yang ma yin te/'dir chos thams cad ni bdag med pa zhes bya'o//chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'adra ma yin te bdag ni de kho na nyid do//
53a4(mdo sde): bdag ni rtag pa nyid do//bdag ni yon tan nyid do//bdag ni ther zug pa nyid do//bdag ni brtan pa nyid do//bdag ni zhi ba nyid do zhes sman pa bzang po'i 'o ma
53a5(mdo sde): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de kho na nyid dang ldan pa ston par mdzad de/de sgom pa la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis brtson par gyis shig/dge slong dag gzhan
53a6(mdo sde): yang tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par the tshom dang sum nyi ci dang ci yod pa de dag khyed kyis nga la zhus shig dang /ngas legs par gsungs pas khyed rangs
53a7(mdo sde): par bya'o//nga ni bsgom pa thams cad las grol ba dang /rang bzhin gyis stong pa chen po ston te/dge slong khyed de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag lo rang bzhin
53b1(mdo sde): gyis stong pa chen po ma bstan to zhes de skad ma zer cig/dge slong dag gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par the tshom dang som nyi ci dang ci yod pa de dag khyed kyis nga la
53b2(mdo sde): zhus shig/de nas dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu
53b3(mdo sde): bA ni bdag cag gri yul ma lags te/badrag cag gis rngo mi thog lags so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang bsam+bi gyis
53b4(mdo sde): mi khyab/khyod kyi gdams ngag kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pas na bdag cag gis zhu ba'i rngo mi thog lags so//bcom ldan 'das dpor gsol na/mi la la rgas shing
53b5(mdo sde): 'khogs la gtugs pa/lo brgya nyi shu rtsa drug lon pa/nad kyis thebs pa mal khri la mchis pa'i nad pa zhig mchis la mi la la zhig gis de'i sug par gter gtams
53b6(mdo sde): te/kye mi khyod kyis gter 'di long la gang gi tshe bdag lho bcu 'am lo nyi shu na phyes nas phyir 'ongs pa dang /de'i tshe 'di bdag la phyir byin cig ces bgyis nas nges ga tad de
53b7(mdo sde): mchis la rgan po de'ang bu ma mchis pa zhig ste/mi de mchis nas ring po ma la gos par mi rgan po de gum na mi de slar mtshos te/de de ltar nor gyi phung po chen po dang
54a1(mdo sde): bral bar gyur kyang su la'ang ji skad bgyir yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par bdag cag gis zhus pa de'ang
54a2(mdo sde): nyan thos la yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur la/bdag cag la'ang ji skad du zhu ba'i cha ma mchis legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/dge
54a3(mdo sde): slong rnams kyis zhus pa ni sems can thams cad la phan par 'gyur te/de'i phyir ngas zhu ba'i skabs phye ba yin no//de nas dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol
54a4(mdo sde): to/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/mi gzhon nu la la lo nyi shu rtsa drug lon te/phyug cing 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig mchis la/mi la la
54a5(mdo sde): zhig gis de'i sug par gter gtams te/'di skad du kye bdag ni don gnyer du 'gros/bdag phyir 'ongs pa dang mi khyod kyis gter 'di bdag la phyir byin cig ces
54a6(mdo sde): bgyis nas mi des gter de legs par sbas shing legs par bsrungs te/de slar mchis nas slor stsal pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyi dbyig legs
54a7(mdo sde): par gsungs pa dge slong kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos thams cad la gtad na ni yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'od srung chen
54b1(mdo sde): po la sogs pa nyan thos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'i slad du'o//byang chub sems dpas zhus pa'i dbyig byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gtad na ni lo 'bum phrag mang por gnas
54b2(mdo sde): pur gyur la/'phel bar yang 'gyur zhing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang smin par 'gyur lags so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
54b3(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba'i rngo thog la/bdag cag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba'i rngo mi thog lags so zhes gsol nas cang mi zeng bar 'khod
54b4(mdo sde): do/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/dge slong dag legs so legs so//dge slong dag khyed zag pa med pas ni de skad bya
54b5(mdo sde): ba yin no//dgra bcom pas ni de skad bya ba yin te legs so//dge slong dag ngas kyang khyod kyis bsams pa'i don de snga nas bsams so//nga'i theg pa chen po ni byang
54b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i lag tu gtad na rgyu gnyis kyis yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu'am rogs
54b7(mdo sde): kyi bu mo tshe ring po dag gzhi gsum mi gtogs pa dang /tshul khrims kyi gzhi mi gtogs par khyed kyi yid gnyis dang /som nyi dang the tshom ci yod pa nga la zhus shig ces
55a1(mdo sde): lan gnyis lan gsum du bka' stsal to//de nas 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdong bu'i grong du skyes pabum
55a2(mdo sde): ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas
55a3(mdo sde): phyag btsal te lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas/lha'i mchod pa'i las chen po byas te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nAs pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te
55a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bston pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/bcom ldan 'das
55a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byang chub
55a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgro bcom
55a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhus shig dang ngas zhu ba zhus pa de dang de lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
55b1(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
55b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mthu dang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus bdag gis zhu bar mi 'tshal na/bdag ni sbrang bu dang 'dra la de bzhin gshegs pa ni tsan+dan lta bu'i 'khor
55b3(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa lags/seng ge lta bu'i 'khor chen po dang ldan pa lags/bai dUr+ya dang rdo rje chen po ltar mi phyed pa'i sku mnga' ba lags/mi phyed pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa
55b4(mdo sde): lags/ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po mnga' ba legs/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa dgra
55b5(mdo sde): kyang mchis te/de ltar dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu snga bdag gis zhu ba'i rngo thog par gyur na/'dir
55b6(mdo sde): bgyi ba mang du mchis te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus badrag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas zhu bar 'tshal lo zhes byas nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/thub pa nIs na tshe
55b7(mdo sde): ring 'gyur//rdo rje lta bur cis 'gyur lags//gang gis mi shigs thob par 'gyur//cis na lus brtan stobs chen 'gyur//ji ltar bgyis na mdo sde 'di'i//pha
56a1(mdo sde): rol phyin par 'gyur ba lags//ji ltar srog chags rnams kyi sems//sna tshogs rtogs nas ston par 'gyur//thub pa chen po ji ltar na//rgyu
56a2(mdo sde): rkyen thob nas skyabs su 'gyur//ji ltar dgra bcom ma lags kyang //dgra bcom rnams dang mitshungs par 'gyur//bajo ma ldan ji ltar bragregs bgyid pa'i//bdud
56a3(mdo sde): ni 'khor du chud par 'gyur//bdud kyi tshig kyang 'tshal ba dang //rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung yang 'tshal//'dren pa ji ltar dga' bzhin du//'phags pa'i lam /
56a4(mdo sde): yang ston par 'gyur//dge dang yang dag ldan gyur nas//phyin ci ma log ston par 'gyur//thub pa chen po ji ltar na//legs byed 'gyur ba bstan du gsol//thub
56a5(mdo sde): pa byang chub sems rnams kyis//ji ltar brtag dka' khams mthong 'gyur//thub pa ji ltar yi ge yi//phyed ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags//ji ltar gzhad drang zal
56a6(mdo sde): mo yi//spyod pa drag dang 'dra bar 'gyur//ji ltar phur bu pA bsangs//nyi ma dag tu skye bar 'gyur//thub po byang chub sems dpa' rnams//ji ltar sems ni ma skyes
56a7(mdo sde): par/'i dor ni 'jigs pa med par 'gyur//ji ltar ka ta'i 'bras bu 'dra//ji ltar rtsod dus skyes pa na//gos pa ma mchis bgyid pa dang //nyes pa'i dbyings su pad+ma/
56b1(mdo sde): ltar//nyes pa dag gis mi gos lags//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//yul khams sman pa chen por 'gyur//chu 'gram kun tu mnyan par 'gyur//dri 'dor
56b2(mdo sde): bdag la lung bstan gsol//ji ltar sbrul rnams pagos pa rnying //'dor ba bzhin du 'gyur ba lags//rin chen mang po'i 'byung gnas dang //'bru dang shing 'dra ji ltar
56b3(mdo sde): lags//brtan po de dag nyan thos dang //rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyis//su gdung ji ltar ston par bgyid//mtha' yas sgra yang ji ltar ston//rgyul sras brtul zhugs
56b4(mdo sde): brtan po rnams//ji ltar mi phyed 'khor dang ldan//de dag 'jig rten dmus long gi/mig dang 'dra bar ji ltar 'gyur//thub pa chen po ji ltar na//mgo mang bye ba ston par
56b5(mdo sde): 'gyur//ji ltar zla ba tshes 'dra bar//'jig rten rnams la chos kyang ston//ji lta bur ni gzha' gsang du//yongs su mya ngan 'das pa ston//ji ltar lha dang bdud 'dra bar//
56b6(mdo sde): brtan por 'gyur zhing dpa' bar 'gyur//ji ltar chos kyi sgo rtogs nas//chos nyid kyang ni 'tshal bar 'gyur//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//nad med par yang
56b7(mdo sde): ba lags//sems can kun la smin pa'i phyir//de dag ji ltar dgongs pa 'tshang //ji ltar dge ba lhag mar btsas//ji ltar the tshom spongs par 'gyur//blo gros chen po/
57a1(mdo sde): ji ltar na//byang chub mchog tu nye bar 'gyur//cha phru gzigs pa khyod nyid kyis//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsangs//chos rnams du ma'o/
57a2(mdo sde): sgro dag kyang //'dren pa khyod kyis bka' stsol cig/sems can kun gyi sman pa po//rkang gnyis rnams la sman ston cig/thob pa'i phung po 'di dag las//bdag
57a3(mdo sde): gis zhu ba'i yul ma mchis//byang chub sems dpa' brtan rnams kyi//yul ni thams cad mkhyen pa lags//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
57a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bra'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//
57a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo chen po las thams cad mkhyen pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nang 'dri bar mdzad pa bzhin du 'dri ba ni legs
57a6(mdo sde): te 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung mang po grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed kyi pha rol na thams cad mkhyen pa rang rang gi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa dag dra dang thabs cig tu
57a7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi phyir rol te/byang chub tsam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i don du byang chub kyi phyir rol pa de bzhin du khyod kyang
57b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir yon tan ming gcig pu'i tshul thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul 'dri zhing 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig
57b2(mdo sde): pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul zhu ba'i rngo mi thog mod kyi cung zad cig zhu bar 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das dper
57b3(mdo sde): gsol na sbrang bus gnamA dang rgya mtsho'i pha mthar mchi ba 'am/rgya mtsho'i tsha ba 'tshal ba'i rnga thog pa de ni mi srid lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag ni sgrung
57b4(mdo sde): bu 'dru la bcom ldan 'das ni nam mkha' dang rgya mtsho dang 'dra zhing ye shes zab mo chos dang ldan pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/rgyal po'i gtsug gi nor
57b5(mdo sde): bu dkor bas rang gi spyi bos blang ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos bka' stsal pa yang dag par blang bar 'tshal na/shes rab rgya bskyed pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
57b6(mdo sde): stsal du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshungs pa med pa yongs su gcad du gsol//bdag zhu bar 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu
57b7(mdo sde): nyon cig/las gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che ring bar gyur pa dang /las gang gis byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba de bzung ba'i sems kyis nyon
58a1(mdo sde): cig dang /las kyi 'bras bu des na byang chub kyi rgyu skye bar 'gyur ro//thos nas kyang gzhan dgu la ston cig rigs kyi bu ngas kyang las de byas shing gzhan
58a2(mdo sde): dag la'ang bstan pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to//rigs kyi bu dper na mi lA la zhig bu gcig pa thar par bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i
58a3(mdo sde): btson ra'i nang du 'gro ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' tshe ring bar 'dod pas kyang sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//de ltar bsgoms
58a4(mdo sde): na 'tshe ba thams cad spong bar 'gyur la/byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing srog gcod
58a5(mdo sde): pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang /chos spyod par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems can dpag tu med pa dag bslab pa'i gzhi la 'god par 'gyur/dge ba bcu'i las kyi
58a6(mdo sde): lam la'ang 'god par 'gyur ro//gal te nus na sems can du myal ba dang /lha ma yin dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /dud 'gror skyes pa rnams dang /las
58a7(mdo sde): mi bzad pa byed pa'i sems can rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed cing /grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o snyam nas de la
58b1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang dran pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur te/legs par byas pa'i rnam par smin pa dang /rgyu dang mthun pa des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
58b2(mdo sde): mchog tu tshe ring bar 'gyur la/ye shes kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur zhing 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
58b3(mdo sde): 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tsa las bsams te sems can thams
58b4(mdo sde): nad li bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi/bka' stsal pa/de'i don ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
58b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi 'tshal na tshig de ni mi 'dod par bgyi ba legs so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das bstan pa
58b6(mdo sde): 'di la sems can kha cig tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /mtshams ma mchis par bgyid pa dang dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa dag kyang mchis na ni lags sems can de lta bu
58b7(mdo sde): dag la'ang bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa de lta los kyang mod/da ni sems
59a1(mdo sde): n+dan thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du lha'o//'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na bsten par rdzogs pa'i
59a2(mdo sde): 'khor dag pa rnams kyis bco lnga'i gso sbyong la bab pa'i cha/gzhon nu ma drangs pa/lus me sbyangs pa/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhig brtsig pa'i gri zhig tu yib ste nyan
59a3(mdo sde): pa na/ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes rdul zhib mo bzhin phye mar rlugs legs/kye mdes de bkum pa ni lag na rdo rjes ha
59a4(mdo sde): cang drags lags so//de lta na ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
59a5(mdo sde): pa/rigs kyi bu de skad ma zer cig/gzhon nu de ni sprul pa yin te/dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams tshar bcad pa dang bskrad par bya ba'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po log
59a6(mdo sde): na rdo rjes de ltar bstun par zad kyi/dam pa'i chos suni phyung yang rung 'dod chen pa'ang rung ste gsad du mi rung ngo //rgyu sogs pa'i srog gcod pa ni byed mi phod do//rigs
59a7(mdo sde): kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar rgyal po 'am/blon po chen po dag dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa brlag par byed pa de bzhin du nga ni brlag par bya zhes mi zer mod kyi de dag nyid
59b1(mdo sde): kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du smin par zad do//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma khyen pa ni de rnams kyi don du mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing 'od zer gcig gam
59b2(mdo sde): gnyis gtong bar mdzad de/gal te 'od zer des de dag la ma phog na ni 'chi bar 'gyur te der de bzhin gshegs pas ci byar yang med do//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gal te
59b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis brtag dka' ba blta bar nus pa lta na ngas khyod la rgyu gzhan yang bstan par bya ste/yul so so na tshul khrims dang cho ga dang yon tan rnams tha dad pa yod la/der de
59b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong dag dam pa'i chos khol du 'byin par 'dod pa la rgyal pos ston pa med pa'i phyir gnod pa byed pa las rgyal po
59b5(mdo sde): de rgyal po gzhan gyis bzlog ste ngos mthu chung bar byas nas rgyal po de chos la gnas par gyur na/rgyal po cig shos de lnga bsod nams chen por 'gyur zhe song smra'o//de ci'i 'phyir
59b6(mdo sde): zhon/rgyal po cig shes kyi nyes pa chen po'i gzhi zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na zhing ngam khyim du dug shing ngam ste long skyes na rtsa nas dbyung dbuso
59b7(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du tshul khrims 'tshal pa rnams dngape /dam po'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams bran bzhin du tshar bcad par ngas gnang ngo //gang dag de rnams tshar gcod par mi byed
60a1(mdo sde): pade dag ni 'i bstan pa las shin tu ring ba yin no//gang dag rnams tshur gcod par byed pa de dag na nga'i slob m+bu dang /'i nyan thos yin no/'odas/
60a2(mdo sde): chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de skad gsung na ni sems can thams cad la sgyu gcan zin bzhin du gzigs pa'ang ma lags
60a3(mdo sde): dang tsan+dan+da lta bu zhes bgyi ba'i ming yang rlag par 'gyur na dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams ji ltar tshar bcad pa'i rigs lags/de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar bgyid
60a4(mdo sde): dustsal po'i mi rigs lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa dper na khyim bdag gam/tshong dpon nam/sde dpon
60a5(mdo sde): nam/blon po 'am/rgyal po'ang rung ba zhig gis rang gi bu sdug cing phangs la mchog tu mdzes shing byad gzugs phun sum tshogs pa rnams slob dpon gyi lag tu gtad
60a6(mdo sde): nas slob dpon dri la 'di skad smras te/bdag gi bu 'di rnams 'dul ba dang /cho ga dang /spyod yul dang /rlig pa rnams bslab pa'i phyir khyod la gtad kyis
60a7(mdo sde): 'di rnams khyod kyis 'dul ba dang /cho ga dang spyod yul dang rig pa rnams slob shig/chos shig/gal te bdag gi bu 'di bzhi las gsumo ni brdeg pa dang /bsdigs
60b1(mdo sde): pi dag/tshar bcad pa rnams kyis shi bar gyur la/gcig ni gson por 'dug ste/gcig lobos par gyur na gsum ni shi'ang sla ste/gsum ni shrI gcig ni longs pa de la
60b2(mdo sde): cislob dpon gyis ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas zhes bya 'am/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/de la ni gnyis ka la'ang sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur lags so//
60b3(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/de lnga ni 'khon gyi bsam pa ma mchis te/de ltar bgyis na bsod nams mang po 'phel bar 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
60b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs te/bu rnams slob dpon gyi lag tu gtod
60b5(mdo sde): pa bzhin du rgyal po dang /blon po dang /dge bsnyen rnams kyi lag tu gtod par mdzad do//de nas rgyal po dang /blon po dang /dge bsnyen de dag gis byis pa g.yel ba de dag
60b6(mdo sde): tshar gcod par byed na/ci de la de bzhin gshegs pa la sdig pa'i las su 'gyur zhes bya 'am/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/rgyal po dang /blon po dang /dge bsnyen
60b7(mdo sde): rnams la'ang sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa gos pa mi mnga' ba lta lo gos par ga la 'gyur te/de dag nyid kyi yon tan dang spyod pa bsrung ba'i slad du mi 'dod
61a1(mdo sde): bzhin du tshar gcod par bas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ltar na bu gcig pa'i 'du shes sgom pa yin te/gang drug de ltar sgom
61a2(mdo sde): de dag gis ni bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms par 'gyur ro//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes
61a3(mdo sde): bsgom par bya'o//de ltar byas na sems can thams cad la ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa bsgoms par 'gyur ro//des na mchog tu 'tshe ba med pa dag par 'gyur te/des
61a4(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa'o tshe ring ba dang /mchog tu tshe ring ba dang /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/sems can
61a5(mdo sde): thams cad lta bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bku'
61a6(mdo sde): stsal pa/de lta los kyang mod/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na gtam rgyud mkhan zhig gis ltad mo pa'i 'khor
61a7(mdo sde): gyi nang du ma la phu dud bya ba'i rigs pa'i gtam sna tshogs bgyis la/rang gi khyim du mchis nas mchog tu dka' ba bgyid bgyid pa'i ma la dbyugs pa dang /phag dum
61b1(mdo sde): dang /bong ba dang /rdo dag gis gnod pa bgyid pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na byang chub
61b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe ring ba dang /mchog tu tshe ring ba dang /tshe rabs dran pa dang /mi 'chi ba dang /ther zug pa dang /brtan par 'ogyu
61b3(mdo sde): zhes gsungs na ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das nyid su tshe thung lags/ci slu ba mdzad dam/'on te bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sems can thams cad la dgra bzhin du gzigs
61b4(mdo sde): gzigs sam/kye mi bcom ldan 'das kyis ni dka' ba mdzad mdzad do//mi'i ltar rtsis na lo brgya'ang mi thub ste/de bzhin gshegs pa 'di kho na lhur skye ni thung ba lugs
61b5(mdo sde): na/bcom ldan 'das kyis ston byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i tshe de snyed kyi srog cig bcad lagaso/'di kho na ltar sku tshe thung ba las na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis
61b6(mdo sde): mchog tu mi bzed pa'i las mdzad legs grang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
61b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'di kho na ltar ma rgya shig ma skye shig/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mchog tu sa tshe ring ngo //
62a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mchog tu brtan pa'o//mchog tu zhi bya'o//mchog tu ther zug pa'o//
62a2(mdo sde): mchog tu rtag pa'o//'od srung chen po dang dus gcig pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu sku tshe ring legs//bcom
62a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa dper na chu klung gang+gA deng /ya mu na dang /sa ra yu dang /hing+ga la li sogs pa chu klung chen po rnams
62a4(mdo sde): dang /chu bran gzhan rnams rgya mtsho chen po kho na'i nang du 'bab pa de bzhin du/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa lha yul dang so'i steng gi tshe'i chu klung yod do cog
62a5(mdo sde): thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya mtsho kho nar 'bab ste/de ltar na dri bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu sku tshe ring ngo //'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa gzhan yang
62a6(mdo sde): 'di ltar chu klung chen po bzhi ma dros pa'i rlung nas 'byung ba de bzhin du tshe ring ba'i tshogs thams cad kyang de bzhini gshegs pa las 'byung ngo //'di ltar rtag pa thams cad
62a7(mdo sde): kyi nang na ni nim mkha' mchog tu rtag pa yin la/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang nam mkha' bzhin du rtag go//'di ltar zhi bar byed pa thams cad kyi nang na ni mar 'ba' zhig
62b1(mdo sde): mchog tu zhi bar byed pa yin la/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba dang bsil bar gyur pa'ang mar dang 'dra ba'i chos ston to//'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/
62b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu sku tshe ring ba lags na sems can thams cad la smyan phyi'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bskal pa 'am/bskal pa
62b3(mdo sde): las lhag par yang yun ring du bzhugs shing sprin chen po bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyi char yang rab tu dbab tu gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung
62b4(mdo sde): chen po dang rus gcig pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes ma skyed cig/'od srung
62b5(mdo sde): chen po dang rus gcig pa 'di na dge slong ngam/dge slong mu 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am 'di las phyi rol pa'ang rung ste/mngon par shes pa lnga la dbang
62b6(mdo sde): thob pa de'ang bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par gnas shing nam mkha' la 'chag par yung byed/nyal bar yang byed la/mtshan g.yon logs nas mye dang 'dra bar
62b7(mdo sde): 'bar bar byed pa dang /de bzhin du chos gzhan du dud pa 'thul ba lta bur yang ston/tshe'i tshad kyang ji srid du 'dod pa de srid du sbyar bar byed do//mdor na ji tsam du 'dod
63a1(mdo sde): pa dang /ji tsam+ba du dga' bu de tsam du ston par byed de 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa lnga la dbang thob pa'i yon tan yin no//gal te mngon par
63a2(mdo sde): shes pa lnga thob pa'ang de ltar bdag nyid 'tshe ba'i dbang phyug la dbang byed na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang du mi brnyes pa lta ci ste de lta bu la mnga' mi mdzad/de bzhin
63a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa bskal pa 'am/bskal pa las lhag par ci ste mi bzhugs kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /brtan pa dang /ther zug pa yin par khong du chud
63a4(mdo sde): par gyis shig/'jig rten 'di na sprul pa'i lus ni sha'i lus ma yin te/deng de bzhin gshegs pa dug sman lnga rton pa'i sku yongs su 'dor bar mdzad do snyam du'ong
63a5(mdo sde): khong du chud par gyis shig/rtag pa dang /brtan pa dang ther zug ces bya ba'i bstan pa mchog la'ang brtson parwa gyis shig/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pus
63a6(mdo sde): gsol po/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa lags na 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das par khyad par ci mchis lags/'jig rten pa'ang bdag cag gi
63a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa ni rtag pa ste thog ma'i dus nas byung ba yin no zhes mchi ba dang khyad par ci mchis/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa lags na khyad par ma mchis
63b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur lags so//'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mad//bam+bu po bzhi ga/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
63b2(mdo sde): ba/rigs kyi bu dper na tshong dpon nam khyim bdag gcig la ba lang sna tshogs su mdog du ma rigs dang rgyud mang po khyu gcig cing lhas gcig pa du me bye ba snyed yod la/dris
63b3(mdo sde): babulang de dag ba lang rdzi'i lag tu gtad de mar zhim po za la/ba ladri rdzi rnams kyang lces skyong zhing zho dang 'o mo bsrub pa las phyi zhig na ba lang gri bdag po de rang gi tshe zad nas drin
63b4(mdo sde): ste/shi ba'i 'og tu nags na rgyu ba'i chom shod gyis ba lang de dag phrogs nas de dag chung mo med pas rang rang gis 'o ma bsrubs te/de dag gis bsrubs pa las 'os ma yin/
63b5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir 'o mA de dag las mar gyi dri'ang mi brol zhor yang ma rung /dar bar yang ma rung /bris mar yang ma rung na mar du lcig la 'gyur te/'o ma'i rang bzhin lus kyang nyam
63b6(mdo sde): nas de dag gis de chus bslad de bdag gis mar mongs spyad par bya'o//bdag gis mar longs spyad par bya'o snyam du sems pa bzhin du 'jig rten pa sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyu
63b7(mdo sde): mthun pa las byung ba nor dang chos rgyas pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rang gi lhas kyi bdag po bzhin du yongs su mya ngan
64a1(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa chom shod dang 'dra ba rnams kyis kyang tshul khrims dang cho ga dang 'dul ba dang /spyod yul rnams dang /sems
64a2(mdo sde): can gyi khams rnams gud du bsgyur nas sems can yod do//srog yod do//gang zag yod do snyam du sems shing thar pa ni 'di lta bu zhig go/spyod pa ni 'di lta bu zhig go/
64a3(mdo sde): snyam nas spyod pa dang /sems can dang /thar pa dang rtag pa dang /de kho na nyid ma shes te/drin gzhan la brtson pas thar pa'ang mI thob la/tshul khrims dang cho ga
64a4(mdo sde): dang spyod yul dang 'dul ba dang rtag pa dang de kho na nyid kyang mi rnyed de/mi rgod kyi mar bzhin du 'jig rten pa rnams kyis chos kyi de kho na nyid mi 'thob la/de dag sems can
64a5(mdo sde): tshangs pas sprul pa ni rtag go snyam du 'dzin cing bdag gi ni thar pa yin no snyam du'ang 'dzin la/chom shod pa rnams kyi 'o ma bzhin du de kho na nyid ni mi shes so//de dag tshangs
64a6(mdo sde): par spyod pa'i rgyu dang /gzhan gyi chung ma spangs pa'i rgyu dang /pha ma la phu dud byas pa'i rgyus na/chom shod pa rnams kyi 'o ma ma rung pa'i lhag ma tsam zhig yod pa bzhin du
64a7(mdo sde): mtho ngos kyi bde ba shas shes tsam zhig thob skye longs spyod par byed la/de dag gis pha ma la phu dud bya ba ji lta bu yin pa'ang mi shes/gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ji lta
64b1(mdo sde): bu yin pa'ang mi shes/gzhan gyi chung ma spang ba ji lta bu yin pa'ang mi shes/rtag pa ji lta bu yin pa'ang mi shes so//de la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ni mi rtag pa yin/brdzun
64b2(mdo sde): pa yin te/des na 'jig rten pa rnams de bzhin grashegs pa mi rtag go mi brtan no snyam du 'dzin te/de bas na mi rtag pa'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa rtag go zhes bya ba
64b3(mdo sde): la brtson par bya'o//rigs kyi bu de nas ba ldang gi lhas de'i skal ba can gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung la chom shod pa de dag gis kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i
64b4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i bsod nams kyi mthus de ba lang gcig kyang med par mi byed do//de nas nags ni rgyu ba'i chom shod pa de dag gise ba lang gi lhas de por de 'gro bar 'gyur ro//de nas
64b5(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i khyim bdag rin po ches ba lang gi lces de nyams su len par 'gyur te/khyim bdag rin po che des rang gi zlos pa lang gi lhas de'o 'o mA'i de kho na
64b6(mdo sde): nyid kyi thabs shes par 'gyur lo/ba rnams kyi 'o ma'ang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsod nams kyis nyis 'gyur du bzhor yod par 'gyur ba de bzhin du chos kyi 'khor los
64b7(mdo sde): sbyar ba'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung nas/ba lang gi lhas dang 'dra ba'i 'jig rten pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin par mdzad pas na rtag pa'i sgra ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba'
65a1(mdo sde): TIg gi rjes su mthun gyi/'jig rten pachom shod dang 'dra ba rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang rtags kyis gnas kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro//
65a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni khyim bdag rin po che bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyi ba lang gi lhas nyams su len par byed de//sems can bsod nams dang ldan
65a3(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi don du chos kyi 'o ma 'dze bar byed do//rigs kyi bu rgyu des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /brtan pa dang thor zug pa yin la/'jig rten pa rnams la ni
65a4(mdo sde): rtag pa'i chos med de/rtag pa'i sgra don de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas rnams 'ba' zhig la yod ces ngazer ro//da ltar ni rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi
65a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rtag pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni ther zug pa'o zhes de ltar shes par gyis shig/sems can gang drug rtag ces bya ba'i yi ge
65a6(mdo sde): gnyis sgom pa de dge ni ring po mi thogs pa kho na nga'i go 'phang dang lhag chad med pa thob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe rtag go zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis sgom pa nub par
65a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid do//gsol pa/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ces
65b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa de'i don ci lags/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos glengs pa 'di rtogs par 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'dri d+hi lta bu lags pa rgyas par bla shang du gsol
65b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos nyid ces bya ba ni lus yongs su 'dor ba ste/lus yongs su 'dor ba zhes bya ba de ni spang ba'i tshi ga yin par shes par gyis shig
65b3(mdo sde): gsol pa/de bzhin gshegs pas sku bor nas slar yong su yon tam mi yin pa bdag zhu lpags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de skad ma zer cig
65b4(mdo sde): 'di ni chos nyid dpyod pa yin te/rigs kyi bu dper na 'du shes med pa rnams la gzugs kyi phung po drang /'du shis kyi phung po gnyis med na sems can de dag ji ltar gnas//
65b5(mdo sde): ltar gda'/ji ltar snang /de dag gi 'du shes ji ltar 'jug ces 'dri ba 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin no//rigs kyi bu 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams kyi gzugs dang /gnas
65b6(mdo sde): dang spyod lam drang bde ba rnams ji ltar bstan par bya zhes phyin ched de skad ma 'dri zhig/'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul ma yin te/'ad na sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yin/
65b7(mdo sde): no//rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig gi yul yin gyi/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa gang /
66a1(mdo sde): na granas pa dang /gang na snang ba ni khyod kyi yul yang ma yin gyis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku yin no snyam du khyed
66a2(mdo sde): kyis gnas par gyis shig/rigs kyi bu chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la'ang rtag pa'i 'du shes yang dang yang du bsgom par gyis shig/gzhi gsum la tha dad par ma byed
66a3(mdo sde): cig/mi rtag pa'am/mi brtan pa 'am/ther zug pa ma yin pa 'am/zhi ba ma yin pa 'am/thar pa ma yin pa'i rnam par yang ma sgom zhig/rigs kyi bu'am rigs
