343b6(mdo sde): pra rab de thams cad byor la de bzhin du lho phyogs su rdul phra rab de snyed bor zhing /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang gi mtshams dang /
343b7(mdo sde): snying dang /'og gi phyogs dang /phyogs mtshams re re'ang rdul phra rab de snyed bor na 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/gang du rdul phra rab de bor ba dang gang du ma bor ba'i 'jig
344a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de dag gang mang /gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang du rdul phra rab bor ba ni nyung lags kyi mabor ba de ni ches mang lags so//bka'
344a2(mdo sde): stsal pa/'jam dngapa la 'jig rten gyi khams gang du rdul phra rab ma bor ba dang gang du bor ba de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur nas yungs kar gyis glang ba ni ji ltar sngar dpe
344a3(mdo sde): bstan pa de bzhin du rgyas par byas te stong phrag sum cur bsgyur ba/'jam dpal de thams cad kyi tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi phung po bzhug pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byems
344a4(mdo sde): kyi rgyu ji tsam par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgya'ang de tsam mo//byang chub kyi shing de ni
344a5(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun te/'bras bu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o//byang chub kyi shing de'i yal ga nI tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed yod do//yal ga gcig cing yang tha ma'i rdul
344a6(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi yal ga phre'u yod de/yal gra phre'u gcig cing yang tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'bras bu yod do//'bras bu re re la'ang chu shas ni dpag tu
344a7(mdo sde): mingad do//'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de ni de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa'i legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bur grub pa ste/de ni mig yongs su ma sbyangs
344b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams kyi mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ro//'jam dpal 'di lta ste/dper na bur snang gi gnod sbyin rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag mi rnams kyi mig lam du snang

344b4(mdo sde): dpal byang chub kyi shing de la sems can rnams mi thogs par 'gro ste/byang chub kyi shing de'ang yongs su dag pa'i las dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin

345a2(mdo sde): ba dang /skye ba dang /rgyas pa dang /'gas pa rgyun mi 'chad cing bar skabs med de/'dzum dpal 'di lta ste/dper na byis pa lnga brgya tsam rtsen kha cig 'greng /kha
345a3(mdo sde): cig 'dug pa'i rgyun mi 'chad cing zer skabs med po de bzhin du 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang /skye bo dang /smin pa dang /'gras pa'ing rgyun mi

345a5(mdo sde): cing bar skabs med pa de bzhin du 'bras bu de dag 'byung ba dal/skye ba dang /rgyas pa dang /'gas pa'ang rgyun mi 'chad cing bar skabs med de/'bras bu 'gas
345a6(mdo sde): pa de'i cha shas gcig las kyang gaung+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ste/mtshan sum cu rtswa gnyis dang ldan pa/lus dpe byang bzang po brgyad cus
345a7(mdo sde): brgyan pa/sred med kyi bu ltar lus mkhregs pa/srid pa thom par gyur pa'i sems can 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i sangs chos kyi zhing tshad med par
345b1(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i bar du ste/de dag thams cad kyis kyang de tsam du rgya cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sbyasmras te/de dag de nas byung nas
345b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs
345b3(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'chad de/dus gsu mo mnyam
345b4(mdo sde): pa nyid kyang ston to//de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nyan cing kun 'dzin te/thos ma thag tu mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo//mngon par shes pa thob
345b5(mdo sde): ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dong ngo //
345b6(mdo sde): de dgra rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//'jam dpal
345b7(mdo sde): de bzhi ni gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms te rab tu goms par
346a1(mdo sde): byas/lam du byas/rten du byas/rus shing bzhin du byas/rab tu rtogs par byas shing legs par brtsams so//ting nge 'dzin gsum

346a3(mdo sde): denge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zhes bya'o//'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med/grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs
346a4(mdo sde): pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na/me tog gi tshogs zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/me tog gi tshogs kyi bskal pa de la de bzhin
346a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur
346a6(mdo sde): ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dkon mechog drim pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

346b1(mdo sde): mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes pa/glang po chen po/bya ba byas pa/
346b2(mdo sde): byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba/bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa shA stag go/

346b5(mdo sde): khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /mtshungs pa med pa dang /gzhal du med pa dang /brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam yang dag par
346b6(mdo sde): zhugs pa sha stagra go//yang nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa la ni nyan thos khrag khrig yod do//byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni de'i nyis 'gyur yod do//nyan thos 'dus
346b7(mdo sde): po gsum pa la ni nyan thos khrag khrig phrag brgya yod de/thams cad kyang dge bcom pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad/

347b1(mdo sde): 'dzum dpal 'di lta ste/dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skar ma'i gzugs la skur ma'i gzugs 'di snyed ce'am/skar ma'i gzugs brgya phrag

347b3(mdo sde): 'am/gtams phrag 'di snyed ci'am/dkrigs phrag 'di snyed ce 'am/'gyur yas phrag 'di snyed yod ces rtsis mkhan nam/rtsis mkhan gyi slob ma mkhaskye pas kyang bgrang
347b4(mdo sde): bar mi nus te/'on kyang skar ma'i gzugs dpag tu med pa'i grangs su 'gro ba de bzhin du 'jam dpal nyan thos 'dus pa de rnams kyi mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus so//'jam dpal
347b5(mdo sde): de'i dus na rgyal po bde gnas blo gros zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po zhig yod pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad la dbang zhing bdag po byed de/las kyi rnam par
347b6(mdo sde): smin pa las byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog dam pa de nyan thos dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
347b7(mdo sde): dge 'dun du bcas pa li lo bye ba khrag khrig drug cu'i bar du ro sna brgya pa'i zhal zas sbyar te rim gro byas so//yulo ka shi pa'i na bza' gsol zhing yo byad thams cad kyang sbyar te/'di
348a1(mdo sde): ltar chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /nu ba'i bsos spyan dang /yo byad kyis rtsa ba'i rim gro byas so//des de bzhin gshegs
348a2(mdo sde): pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la ro sdu brgya pa'i zas kyi rim gro byas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas so//dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing
348a3(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya tsho zhing dpag tu med pa bskyed do//dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing grangs med pa mngon par 'dus byas so//
348a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing grangs med pa mngon par 'dus byas nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba shugs rgya che zhing grangs med pa bskyed par gyur to//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
348a5(mdo sde): ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mngon par 'dus byas nas/sbyin pa'i pha rol
348a6(mdo sde): tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa bskyod par gyur to//tshul
348a7(mdo sde): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas te/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
348b1(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dpag tu med pa rgya chen po bskyed do//de bzhin du sbyar te//
348b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i zla ba grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med cing rgya cher mngon par 'dus
348b3(mdo sde): byas so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa nas brjod du med cing rgya che ba'i bar du mngon par 'dus byas nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
348b4(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa bskyed do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu
348b5(mdo sde): phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing grangs med/dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas te/ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
348b6(mdo sde): mngon par 'dus byas pa de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rgyas par bya'o//shes rab
348b7(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin po dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med/
349a1(mdo sde): pa mngon par 'dus byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa bskyed do//de bzhin du sbyang//
349a2(mdo sde): te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ljon pa rgya che ba grangs med/bsom gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa mngon par 'dus byas te/
349a3(mdo sde): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod du med pa'i bar du mngon par 'dus byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs
349a4(mdo sde): grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa bskyed do//'jam dpal rgyal po bde gnas blo gros kyis de lta bur pha
349a5(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed nas/dga' ba dang /dang ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba myang bsU to la bdun srid du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/
349a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dom pa de la pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon pA bstod do//stobs bcu shes
349a7(mdo sde): rab mtha' yas pa//chu bo bzhi rgal mi'i seng ge/khyod la phul ba dpag med 'gyur//sbyin pa de yang zil mi non//ba tsha med pa'i zhing dag la//rdo dang bong baM gyo ma
349b1(mdo sde): da/ sa rab tu chos pastan//mimanyam med po zlas na med phyur//ji b+ha sa pan btag nas su//de pa'i snyi ba nyal ga/dus spyan ba skrun par zlu
349b2(mdo sde): myu gu sngon po ro 'byung bar byed//klu yis sA la chus btab pas//lo ma sdong bu rnams kyang 'byung //dus tshigs dus kyi rim bzhin du//nges par 'bras bu sman par 'gyur//
349b3(mdo sde): de bzhini 'dod chags zhe sdang bcom//gti mug bral ba nges pa'i blos//me smad yon tan zhing khyod la//shes rab gshol gyis rmos pa ni//sa bon nyung ngu btab na yang //
349b4(mdo sde): de bzhin sbyin bdagu mi brtson kyang //pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs shing //thams cad mkhyen pa'i myu gu ste//mgon po khyod la sbyin phul na//byams pa snying rje nyon mongs med//
349b5(mdo sde): rnam par thor pa'i sgo gsum dang //tha mar 'bras bu mya ngani 'da'//sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshon mnga' ba//sa la dong kra min rgya so bzhin//bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa bsags pas
349b6(mdo sde): ji ltar bde gshegs de bzhin shog/ji ltar bsod nams mtshan mnga' ba//legs spyad bsags pa thub pa'i tog/ji ltar mi mchog dam pa bzhin//bdag kyang bde gshegs
349b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gyur//ji ltar dpe med blo can khyod//shes rab gnas la khyod gnas nas//lta bar rab tu bying ba yi//skye bo ma log 'god par mdzad//bdag kyang byang chub
350a1(mdo sde): reg nas ni//de bzhin bad la rab gnas te//log pa'i lam skyong skye bo rnams//bden pa bzhi yi lam du 'god//ji ltar khyod ni phung po med//bla med
350a2(mdo sde): phung po zad par zhugs//byis pa phung pos bcings pa rnams//thams cad phung po 'dor dro bcud//bdag kyang phung po med pa dang //phung med byang chub mchog thob na sna/
350a3(mdo sde): phung pos bcings pa'i skye bo rnams//phung po 'dor bar rab tu 'god//ji ltar khyod kyis nyon mongs sbyangs//chu yis me rnams zhi bo bzhi no//nyon mongs me yis
350a4(mdo sde): 'bar ba yi//skye bo sdug bsngal thar bar mdzad//bdag kyang byang chub rab rog ste//khro glen 'drod gsum mi zhi nas//nye bar zhi ba'i lam stor ba'i//skye bro rab tu
350a5(mdo sde): zhi bar 'god//ser sna'i zhags pas bcings pa dang //phrag dog kun sbyor mun pas bi sgrubs//sred par chags pa mgon med rnams//yan lag brgyad kyi lam la
350a6(mdo sde): dgod//ji ltar rang 'byung khyod nyid ni//stobs bcu ye shes rab gnas te//srid sgom sems can khrag khrig la//stobs bcu se shes ngomus par mdzad//
350a7(mdo sde): bdag kyang byang chub rab rog cing //bla med ye shes thob nas su//srid skom sems can khrag khrig la//stobs bcu ye shes ngoms par bgyi//'jam dpal
350b1(mdo sde): de ltar rgyal po bde ga nas blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dam pa de la lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i bar du zas ro sna brgya pa sbyar zhing /yul
350b2(mdo sde): ka shi pa'i na bza' gsol ti bar sbyang la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod do/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs tshad med/grangs med/bsom gyis mi khyab/
350b3(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med/gzhal du myod/brjod du med pa bskyed nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs nges bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang sems can dmyal bar ma skyes/dud
350b4(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha ma yin gyi ris su 'ja mu skyes/mi khom pa rnams su ma skyes/rigs dma' bar ma skyes/dbul po'i rigs
350b5(mdo sde): su me skyes so//bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang lus la rlung las gyur pa 'am/mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/bad ka na las gyur pa'i nad mo byung ngo //nam yang dbang
350b6(mdo sde): pipo ma tshong bar ma gyur/nam yang mig ser ba dang /'jigs pa'i mig dang /mig yo ba dang /bzhin yo bar ma gyur to//nu mA yid skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
350b7(mdo sde): gnyis kyis lus ma brgyan par ma gyur/nam yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang bral bar ma gyur/lha'i nang du lhar gyur tam/me'i nang du mir gyur na/nam yang dbang
351a1(mdo sde): po dang phyug po ma byas par ma gyur/nam yang smon lam phun sum tshogs pa dang bral bar mi gyur/nam yang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
351a2(mdo sde): du ma skyes/nam yang nad med pa dang /gzugs dang longs spyod dang /g.yog 'khor dang /phyeg pas de sngon dregs par ma gyur/nam yang bud med kyi dregs
351a3(mdo sde): pa dang gos kyi dregus pa ma skyes/nam yang sbyin bdag ma byas par ma gyur/de nam yang tshul khrims kyi dregs pa ma skyes/nam yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma yin//
351a4(mdo sde): par ma gyur/de nam yang thos pas dregs pa ma skyes/nam yang mang du thos pa ma yin par ma gyur/nam yang 'dod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes/nam yang btsun mo'i
351a5(mdo sde): 'khor gyis ma bskor bar ma gyur/nam yang tshangs par mi spyod par ma gyur te/bsam ma thag tu bu rnyed par gyur to//nam yang gnod soms kyi 'du shes ma skyes/
351a6(mdo sde): nam yang rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes ma skyes te/de ltar rgyal po des shugs dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bskyed nas/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di rnams
351a7(mdo sde): dang gzhan yang rab tu bsgrubs so//'di ji snyam du sems/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bde gnas blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam
351b1(mdo sde): du 'dzin na de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cung grub pa de ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyul blo
351b2(mdo sde): bde gnas blo blos zhes bya bar gyur to//'jam dpal de lta bas na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i
351b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs btsal bar bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o//'jam dpal theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgrib
351b4(mdo sde): pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa nges tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas te/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan
351b5(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya chen po bskyed par bya'o//bam po gnyis pa//'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bsgral pa grongs med
351b6(mdo sde): dpag tu med/bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa na rgyal po'i drang srong tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba dang /mes byin zhes bye ba gnyis
351b7(mdo sde): byung ste/de gnyis nags shig na 'khod de/de dag dgon pa nas dgon pa/nags tshal nas nogs tshal du/gshong nas gshong du/nags thibos po nas thibs por
352a1(mdo sde): 'gro zhing bdag cag bud med dang lhan cig gnas par gyur na bdag cag 'dod chags kyi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur/yongs su bzung //
352a2(mdo sde): ba dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu 'grogs na'ang bdag cag gnod sems kyi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur/yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa'am/
352a3(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba la nyes par mi blta ba dang lhan cig 'grogs par gyur na'ang /bdag cag gti mug gi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i
352a4(mdo sde): nyes pa rnams mthong nas/dgon pa nas dgon par/nags tshal nas nags tshal/gshong nas gshing /nags thibs po nas thibs por rgyu'o//'jam dpal de'i
352a5(mdo sde): dus na rgyal po ste mi pham pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i tshe khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams rtswa dang /shing dang tshul ci bder spyod du gnang ste/
352a6(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ngo zhes tshig de skad ces smras pas/drang srong de gnyis kyang rgyal po sde mi pham pa'i yul khams na gnas so//de'i tshe rgyal po sde mi pham pa la chom rkun nor 'phrog
352a7(mdo sde): bis gnod pa'i las byas te bros pa dang /drang srong de dge gis chom rkun bros pa mthong ngo //chom rkun de dag gis kyang drang srong nags kyi nang na gnas pa mthong nas chom rkun
352b1(mdo sde): dri dag gis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so//drang srong khyed la bdag cag mthong ngam zhes la la zhig gis dris na khyed kyis ma bstan cig/de nas drang srong tshangs pa'i lhas drang srong
352b2(mdo sde): mes byin la smras po/kye ma'o mes byin byung ba 'di ni shin tu dka' na ji ltar bya/gal te 'di ma mthong ngo zhes smras na ni gzhan bslus par 'gyur/ji ste bstan na ni gnod pa
352b3(mdo sde): byas par yang 'gyur na/'di ji ltar bya khyad smros shig/de skad ces smras pa dang /drang srong mes byin gyis drang srong tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so//kye tshangs pa'i
352b4(mdo sde): lho 'di la gnod par 'gyur bar mi 'dzin zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshangs pa'i lha gang la la dge lus dong srog la blta ba dang bcas par gnas pa de dag ni yongs su zag pa byung
352b5(mdo sde): ba byung ba rnams kyis sems zin nas 'dug go/tshangs pa'i lha 'di lta ste/dper na gos snum can la rdul rig na chags par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tshangs pa'i lha gang dag kha cig
352b6(mdo sde): lus dang srog la blta ba dang bcas par gnas pa de dag ni yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems kun tu zin nas 'dug go/tshangs pa'i lha gang dag kha cig lus dang srog
352b7(mdo sde): la mi blta ba de dag la ni yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems kun tu zin cing 'dug par mi 'gyur ro//tshangs pa'i lha 'di lta ste/dper na gos yongs su dag pa
353a1(mdo sde): lu rdul gyis rog/d+hA sngags ma thag tu de myed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du chungs pa'i lha gang dag kha cig lus drang srog ldum blta ba de dag ni yongs su grupa
353a2(mdo sde): byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems kun tu zin cing gnas par mi 'gyur ro//de bas na tshangs pa'i lha bdag cag kyang lus dang srog la mi blta bar bya'o//tshangs pa'i lha
353a3(mdo sde): gal te bdag cag lus dang srog la mi bltas na bdag cag yongs su zag pa 'byung ba des sems zin nas gnas par mi 'gyur ro//kye tshangs pa'i lha lus dang srog la
353a4(mdo sde): blta ba dang bcas pa'i brtul zhugs 'grub bo zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' ma stsal to//de nas drang srong tshangs pa'i lha la drang srong mes byin
353a5(mdo sde): gyis lus dang srog la mi blta ba bstan pas lus dang srog la mi blta ba rnyed do//de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pa chom rkun de dag tshol zhing nags stug po der phyin to//rgyal
353a6(mdo sde): byo sde mi phamu pas nags stug po'i nang na drang srong de dag gnas pa mthong ngo //mthung nas drang srong de dag ga la bA der song ste/mi kha cig nags stug po der tshom rkun
353a7(mdo sde): tshol du bkye'o//de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas drang srong de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po sde
353b1(mdo sde): mi pham pas drang srong de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so//drang srong khyed gnyis kyis chom rkun nags stug po 'di'i nang du 'ongs pa'am phyir byung ba lta mthong ngam/de skad ces smras
353b2(mdo sde): pUpA dang /drang srong de gnyis kyis rgyalnga po sdo mi pham pa la 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po bdag cig gis bdag nyid kyang mi mthong na chom rkun lha ga la mthong /rgyal po sde
353b3(mdo sde): mi phram pa dang drang srong de dag gtam 'di byas pa dang /rgyal po'i mi de dag gris chom rkun de dag zin te/de dag gis dri dag zin nas rgyal po sde m+bi pham pa ga la ba der 'ongs
353b4(mdo sde): te phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so//chomo rkun de dag bzung ste mchis pa 'di lags zhes byas so//de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas drang srong de gnyis kyis smras pa'i don khong du
353b5(mdo sde): ma chud nas drang srong de gnyis la skus pa/khyod ni rdzun zer ba yin te/drang srong ma yin no zhes de gnyis kyi rkang pa dang lag pa gcod du bcug go/'on kyang drang srong de dag gis
353b6(mdo sde): gzhan la gnod pa ma byas so//dri nas yang drang srong myes byin rkang lag bcad pa dang /rgyal po sde mi bya mo pa la 'di skad smras so//kye rgyal po khyod nyid la bdage kun tu btsal
353b7(mdo sde): na rgyal po sde mi pham po zhes bya ba'i rgyal po gang yin ci mig rgyal po sde mi pham pa 'am/'on te rgyal po sde mi pham pa mig las gzhan nam/ci rgyal po sde mi pham pa de rna
354a1(mdo sde): ba 'am/sna 'am/lho 'am/lus snyam/yid dam/'on te rgyal po sde mi pham pa de rna ba dang /s+thA dang /lce dang /lusa? dang /yid dang /
354a2(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa las gzhan ni ma zhes drang srong des bdag mi dmigs par bstan pa dang /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtog gi/de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas yang dag
354a3(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags na bdag nyid ma drimigs so//don dam par bdag nyid mi dmigs pas 'gyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/nyes pa med pa'i drang srong
354a4(mdo sde): grigis bshad pa'i drin mi shes pas 'phral du sdig pa'i las byas pa des chos nyid de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 'gyod nus so'i
354a5(mdo sde): phyogs de na 'gre zhing ldog go/de nas drang srong mes byin des rgyal po sde mi pham pa 'gyod par rig nas 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po khyod ji ltar bdag nyid mi dmigs
354a6(mdo sde): po de bzhin du su'i rkang lag bcad pa de'ang me dmigs so//dri nas rgyal po sde mi pham pa la drang srong mes byin gyis stong pa nyid bstan pas kun nas dkris pa de myur du bsal te/chos
354a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid myur du rtogs nas des de gnyis la ston par 'du shes bskyed do//drang srong de dag gis de la tshul khrims kyi gtam brjod de/rgyal po chen po/
354b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems la smyon pa 'grub ste/rgyal po chen po tshul khrims su yongs su dag pa'i mthu la gzigs/rgyal po chen po bden
354b2(mdo sde): pa dang /bden pa'i tshig gang gis bskal pa brjod du med par yang sems ma rung bar byas bar mi dran pa lta na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag gnyis kyi lag pa g.yas/
354b3(mdo sde): pa snga ma bzhin du gyur cig ces byas ma thag tu bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis de gnyis kyi lag pa g.yas pa sA mu bzhin du gyur to//rgyal po chen po bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
354b4(mdo sde): grang gis bskal pa brjod du med par lus kyi las ma rung por byas par mi dran pa lta na/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag gnyis kyi lag pa g.yon pa snga ma bzhin du gyur/
354b5(mdo sde): cig ces byas ma thag tu bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de gnyis kyi lag pa gla yon pa snga ma bzhin du gyur to//rgyal po chen po badren pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bskal pa brjod
354b6(mdo sde): du med par 'tsho ba mu rung bar byas par mi dran pa lte na/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag gnyis kyi rkang pa snga ma bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang /'di ltar drang srong mes
354b7(mdo sde): byin de'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis drang srong de gnyis kyi rkang pa dang lag pa snga ma bzhin du gyur to//de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas de gnyis kyi bden pas byin gyis brlabs kyi
355a1(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul mthong nas spu zing byed par gyur to//de nas drang srong mes byin gyis bden pa'i byin gyis byurlabs thos pas lus kyi las dang /ngag gi las dang //
355a2(mdo sde): yid kyi las yongs su dge par bya ba'i phyir brdzun par gyur te//de de na 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i tshulalo khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par gyur to//des de nyid
355a3(mdo sde): nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khrims ni tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khye khrag mthong ste/la lnga ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ching
355a4(mdo sde): rgyu/la lA ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor/lA la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can rnams la 'doms/la lan+do tshe'i 'du byed 'dor/la la
355a5(mdo sde): ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngani las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan sngar drong srong mes byin rim
355a6(mdo sde): gro dang bsnyen bskur byed pa mthong ngo //des drang srong mes byin de rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bstan pa sems can rnams la
355a7(mdo sde): ston cing bla na med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo //de nas rgyal po sngo mi pham pas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang sems can bye ba khrag
355b1(mdo sde): khrig du ma mthong ste/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i shugs rnams kyis rgya la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags te bar snang la 'dug nas/dang /
355b2(mdo sde): srong mis byin de dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis
355b3(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do//ji ltar dri med me long dkyil 'khor la//lus la mchis pa'i nyes dang yon tan ganga'o//de bzhin tshulo khrims yongs dag dge ba lnga//sems la
355b4(mdo sde): mchis pa'i nyes dang yon tan gda'//'dod bzhin 'bras bu 'byung ba'i shing chen ltar//bsam pa bzhin du 'bras bu kun kyang byin//de bzhin tshul khrims phung po
355b5(mdo sde): gtsang dag pas//bsam pa bzhin du 'bras bu kun kyang byin//ji ltar sa la rab tu las byas te//bsam pa bzhin du snyed kyi rnam par gyur//de bzhin tshul khrims phung
355b6(mdo sde): po yongs sbyangs pas//bsam pa bzhin du yan tan thams cad byin//ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu byi dor bgyis//bsam pa bzhin du longs spyod sna tshogs byin//de bzhin
355b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims phung po byi dor bgyis//bsam pa bzhin du yon tan thams cad byin//rgyal sras rnams kyis thog mar spyad gsungs pa//tshul khrims yongs dag thog ma'i
356a1(mdo sde): rkang pa ste//rgyal ba rnams ni dri med rkang pa des//byang chub zhi ba mchog rnams yang dgra grub//ji ltar shing rgyal n+ya glo gzhon nu 'dir//sa gzhi/
356a2(mdo sde): mnyam par gtsugs shing rab bskyod na//yal ga byung zhing mngon par rab tu skye//me tog 'bras bur ldan zhing khyad par 'dzin//de bzhin tshul khrims phung por su gnas
356a3(mdo sde): pa//rgyal ba'i sras dri yonu tAno rnams kyis skye//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dir reg nas//'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar byed 'gyur//tshul khrims/
356a4(mdo sde): ldan pas dpal dang gzi brjid rnyed//tshul khrims ldan pa gzugs rab mdzes par 'gyur//tshul khrims dag laM rgya le sras rtag dga' bo//rnyed par dka' ba'i chos
356a5(mdo sde): kyang rab tu skyed//spyod pa yongs dag tshul khrims kun spyod pa//dri med khrims ldan drang srong mes byin 'di//sadzes rgyas yon tan mnga' ba brgya dag gis//kun
356a6(mdo sde): tu bstod pa mdzad pa bdag gis mthong //tshul khrims yongs drug kun tu spyod pa la//sa~M rgyas brgyas ni mngon par bstod gyur dang //ji ltar bdag gi slob dpon mos
356a7(mdo sde): byin la//sangs rgyas brgya yis mngon par bstod pa ltar//de bzhin tshul khrims gzi brjid ldan pa bdag/legs par spyad pa brgya yis mngon par bstod//skyes
356b1(mdo sde): nas bdag gi khrims stobs gdung med de//rim nad btab pa gso ba byas pa bzhin//dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang //phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs//
356b2(mdo sde): pa'i bde bar gshegs//bye ba khrag khrig mang po rgyu ba drang //tshul khrims bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa mthong //dri med tshul khrims gnasngo pas bdag gis kyang //blang
356b3(mdo sde): gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams//bla med byang chub rim par sangs rgyas te//bdud rnams bye ba khrag khrig btul ba mthong //dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis/
356b4(mdo sde): kyang //bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams//dgra bcom bstod cing mtshungs med 'khoru lo mchog/'gro la phan phyir rgyal bas bskor ba mthong //dri med tshul
356b5(mdo sde): khrims gnas pas bdag gris kyang //bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag/skye bo mun pas bsgribs shing mi mkhas pa//bde goshegs sdug bsngal brgya las 'grel
356b6(mdo sde): ba mthong //dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang //bde gshegs bye ba khrog khrig mang po rnams//sems can khrag khrig btul te mdzad pa mdzad//bde gshegs
356b7(mdo sde): dad pas bsgral phyir bzhugs pa mthong //dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang //bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams//'gro ba'i don chen mdzad pa mdzad
357a1(mdo sde): nas su//yang 'byung med par mya ngan 'da' ba mthong //dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang //bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams///
357a2(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das nas ring bsrel rab rgyas shing //skye bo brade bas mngon du tshim mdzad mthong //de ring slob dpon khyod kyi gsung thos nas//bdag gi mig kyang bsam mi khyab par
357a3(mdo sde): drog/de phyir phyogs bcu dag gi rgyal ba rnams//sgrib pa med pa'i mig gi stobs kyis mthong //bdag gi mtshungs med tshul khrims yongs dag pas//de las bdag
357a4(mdo sde): gi sgrib med migo 'di skyes//tshul khrims phung po yongs su sbyangs pa las//sgrib pa med pa'i mig ni bdag gis thob//'di ltar thal sbar slob dpon mchog khyod la//
357a5(mdo sde): grang gi mthu che ba ni de 'dra ba//de la thal mo mngon sbyar phyag 'tshol cing //mtshungs med rdul bral byang chub reg par bgyi//de nas rgyal po ste mi pham pas tshul khrims
357a6(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs de rnyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags par gyur to//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
357a7(mdo sde): phyin pa dang ljon pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rnyed pas phyogs bcu mun pa med par gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/gang sangs
357b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang lon cing 'dzin to//de tshun chad nam yang dran pa nyams par ma gyur te/bskul ba brjod du med pa'i bar du/
357b2(mdo sde): dus thams cad du'ang thos pa 'dzin par gyur to//de la chos kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa mngon du gyur to//'di ltar sgrib pa med pa'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud cing /
357b3(mdo sde): sems la kun nas dkris pa med pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang drir skyes ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshad med pa'i 'jig ton gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
357b4(mdo sde): rnams mthong ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri dog dang lhan cig tu smra zhing gta mo zer te/'di ltar mun pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
357b5(mdo sde): de dag gis bod cing yang dag par mgu bar byas pa yin no//'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mes byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin
357b6(mdo sde): ba snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i spyan de de'i tshe de'i dus nA drang srong mes byin zhes bya bar
357b7(mdo sde): gyur to//'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na drong srong tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzha ni zhog yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/'jam dpal khyod
358a1(mdo sde): dpal 'di snyam dusams/de dus na smra zhes bya ba gang tshul khrims ya skye sa drug pa thos thug na kun nas das bstsal bar myur byang
358a2(mdo sde): glen ga smon pa ma dz+nyAn me 'i smye/de zhen zhin ni shegs padun sun rgya
358a3(mdo sde): ma byas pa nis du ban gyur te//'dume la de stobs masam sna pa' sems dpa' chen pas tshul khrims ma nyams pa hr-Its+tsha/ la khyim mo la sbyin
358a4(mdo sde): ming pa dang /chu'i khrims shin tu rnams pa dang /tshul khrims ma 'as pa dang /tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang /rgyu'i khams yongs su drag par dang/
358a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa bya ste/tshu rnaMms kyi sbyin pa ma rgyags pa mib+ha/tshul khrims kyi ba la tu phyin pa la ma na kA tu dzin pa ma //de ltar chu
358a6(mdo sde): khrims yongs su dag pa la sgrib pa med pa'i rnas pa dathar po mngon du 'gyur ro//sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du mur byas ji lding bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi nga dang
358b1(mdo sde): tu med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur snyam sems la mi bya ste/'on kyang sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du gyur na bsgrim mi dgos par sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa
358b2(mdo sde): yongs su dag par 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//'di ltur
358b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag na/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gal te tshul khrims la mchog tu 'dzin
358b4(mdo sde): pa med na de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/de ltar mchog tu 'dzin pa gang gis kyang tshul khrims la mchog tu 'dzin par byed do//'jam dpal sngon
358b5(mdo sde): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal po dpag tu med pa nas brjod du med pa'i bar du de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na mi 'chi ba kun tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/'dzem
358b6(mdo sde): dpal mi 'chi ba kun tu 'phags pa'i bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs
358b7(mdo sde): pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i khe lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mjed ces bya ba 'jig rten du
359a1(mdo sde): rladru / nga spyod po nan zhug sadung/ da spyong rgyags pa /
359a2(mdo sde): gros zhes bya zhe na/'jam dpal sngon byung ba bskal po m+bi 'tsho ba kun tu 'phrogs pa de'i pha rol gru'ang rgyas pha rol bskal pa grang ste med brjod du med pa na de bzhinani gshegs
359a3(mdo sde): pa rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa zhes bye ba byung ste/de'i tshe'i tshad dpag tu med de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med cing tshad med pa yongs su dge po dang ldan no//yang de bzhin
359a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa do'i sang+yas rgyas kyi ning na po gros bar gA zhes bya ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen
359a5(mdo sde): po lta busangs rgyas khrag khrig ga tu med pa rnams la dag pa'i rtsib spyod bzhig yid de/blo gas 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sa po chen po lta bu de la mi byed pa'i gamag
359a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas khyug khrig dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i bram ze khrog khrig drug brnyed cu yid //yang 'jam dpal blo gros 'bar bu bram ze'i rigs shing sAl chen pa
359a7(mdo sde): lta bu des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam por rgyal ba dang ldan pa de la la bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcur mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhus te/bcom ldan 'das kyis mi
359b1(mdo sde): dzunas pa'i dbyings myi 'dugs pa'i dbyi sa zhes gas san bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i byis dgang lags/ci ska du mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings nas hU~M/de skad rnam/
359b2(mdo sde): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das dro bzhin ga/shegs pa rnam pUr rgyal ba dang ldan pas blogs 'bar bye bram ze'i rigs shing sbrul chen po de la 'odi skad ces bka' skyem to//
359b3(mdo sde): zlo gros 'ab ba mI 'khrugs pa'i dbyings myi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba de ni 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas so//blo gros 'byer ba ci'i phrin dbyings ngo
359b4(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa'i dbye sa nas pa rnam/bla mas 'ab sa byas pa bye min gas rjong med/'brib ma/len 'ang hU~M/spyod pa spyod/zang pa
359b5(mdo sde): da/'brog pa'od med/'grib pa'ang med/'phel bu'ang mod/rig kyang ma yin/rigs me pa'ang ma yin/'gyur ba'ang ma yin/'dzin 'du ma yan/'dzu
359b6(mdo sde): pa'adem yin/gzung ba'ang ma yin/gtung ba'ang ma yin//phru ba'ang ma yin/zab pa'ang ma yin/mun pa'ang ma yin/snang ba'ang ma yin/nyin par srung ma tshan
359b7(mdo sde): mtshan mo'ang ma yin/ring po'ang ma yin/thung ngu'ang ma yin/nye ba'ang ma yin/ring ba'ang ma yin/yangs pa'ang ma yin/dog pa'ang ma yin/gcig bla
360a1(mdo sde): ma smin/thun mong yang ma yin/gzugs kyang ma yin/sduda'ang ma yin/'phyi ba'ang ma yin/'gro ba'angam yin/'ong ba' ma yi/
360a2(mdo sde): byaba'ang ma yin/mi 'pho ba'ang ma yin/'chi ba pho ba'ang ma yin/skye ba'ang ma yin te/de ltar 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings de ni mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o//de'i phyir de'i/
360a3(mdo sde): ming mi 'khrugs pa'i blo glos zhes bya bar gyur to//drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros des de bzhin gshegs po rnam par snod mdzad dA la'ang mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings kun
360a4(mdo sde): dris so//dri la de bzhin gshes bu dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o sangs rgyas ngos lo bye ba khrag khrig drug cu'i bAr du mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings do bstan pa
360a5(mdo sde): bshad de/des mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings thos ma thag tu 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rnyed de/de lta bu'i dge bo'i rno ba'i shugs kyis nam mkha' lo ta la bdun srid du
360a6(mdo sde): 'phags nas drang srong mI 'khrugs pa'i blo gros de bar snang la 'dug ste/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa badz+rod pa
360a7(mdo sde): mthong ngo //bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpo'i bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa'ang mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'khor
360b1(mdo sde): /ri re na'ang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig dpag tu med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings
360b2(mdo sde): la gnas pa dang /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa re
360b3(mdo sde): rI'i chos bstanA pa re re lo'ang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /
360b4(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa dang /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang /nges pa'i stobs bskyed pa la zhugs pa dang /nges pa'i stobasku bskyed pa'i rjes su 'jug pa mthong
360b5(mdo sde): /mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de lta brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan+da pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon pa bstod do//bde
360b6(mdo sde): gshegs chos tshul d+hi bzhin thos nas su//mi mchog bdag gis gzod pa zhib rnyed //bgyid po gang yang me mchis bgyid ma mchis//chos nyid dag la gnas par the tshom bral//
360b7(mdo sde): bdag gis 'jig rten rig khyod gsung thos nas//chos 'di thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings 'drar 'tshal//bdag gis ring nas stor rnyed mthun bgyis te//gter chen ji ltar yun
361a1(mdo sde): rang stong ba bzhin//deng bdag bzod pa'i shugs ni bya chen skyes//chos kyi chu nI yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal//de rig bdag gis the tshom na
361a2(mdo sde): sngangs//'jig rten mkhyen pa khrag khrig mtha' yas mthong //ji ltar bya rnams sgang 'khrugs nas ni//sgo rdza steng ngam zhabs su mdus brtul te//rang gi sgo
361a3(mdo sde): bcag nas byung ba bzhin//bde gshigs khyod gsung thos nas bdag kyang 'byung //bdag gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i saM kun por//'jig rten mkhyen pa khrag khri mahA
361a4(mdo sde): yas mthong //rgyal ba bye ba mtha' yas brjod b+h+yobs gnas//bde gshegs ye shes mnga' bas bdag lung bstan//badrug shegs mtha' yos phyogs bcu'i 'jin
361a5(mdo sde): rten+dan//rgyal sras lung bstan de dag de bzhin ston//bzod stobs rnyed pas seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa//nam mkha'i bya lam 'dir mchis bdag gis mthong //nam mkha
361a6(mdo sde): 'di la mchis nas bdag gis kyang //rgyal ba bride bar gshegs pa mtha' yas kyis//bzod thob srasA la bde gshegs rang 'byung 'gyur//skye bo bdud zhags 'grol
361a7(mdo sde): zhes lung ston mthong //nam mkha' bya lom 'dir mchis bdag gis kyang //bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas rnams//dgra yi tshegaso bcom kun mkhyen
361b1(mdo sde): legs 'chang sras//'gro mgon zil mi non 'gyur lung ston mthong //bdag gis rgyal sras spyad pa spyod pa drag/'gro ban byang chub rdul med btsal slad du//rgyal snyid rini chen+da/
361b2(mdo sde): mig gtong ba dang //mthu rnyed brtan pa thub pa'i khur khyer mthong //rgyal srasa? dga' ldan gnas nos shri 'phos te//lha yi bu mo brgya yis glu blangs shing //bkra shisa?
361b3(mdo sde): bcas pa'i dbyangs kyis mngon bstod nas//rgyal rigs drang srong bram ze'i rigs skye mthong //bdag gis rgyal sras zla bcu mngal gnas pa//lha yi gnas na lha yi bu bzhin
361b4(mdo sde): du//snying rjes chos ston lha rnams rab tu 'dul//mngal na glenas pa mi yis mngon mchod mthong //bdag gis rgyal sras yum gyi lhums nas su//lha rnams kyis kyang
361b5(mdo sde): mngon par mchod cing byung //sems dge bas na mi gtsang rdul mi chags//rin chen nyes pas mi gos bzhin du mthong //bdag gis rgyal sras rgyal srid rin chen bdun//brgya
361b6(mdo sde): phrag bcu po bu yi chogs rnams dang //rta dang glang pos gang ba'i sa spangs te//bdud kyi zhags bcad mngon par byung ba mthong //bdag gis rgyal sras 'gro la sman slad du
361b7(mdo sde): khrag khrig bdud rnams zil mnan byang chub reg/nyon mongs ring bsags rnam mang dpa' bos spangs//bde gshegs nyi ma bzhin du lhan pa mthong //bdag gis rgyal sras rang
362a1(mdo sde): gi nyon mongs btul//mtshungs med dam pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor//lha mi sems can khrag khrig rnams btul zhing //zad mthar 'gro ba lan gsum
362a2(mdo sde): sbyor ba mthong //bdag gis rgyal ba stong phrag mtha' yas pa//rgyal ba'i zhing rnams rgyu zhing sems can 'dul//'gro la sman slad 'gro ba stong par mdzad//pad ma nyi bzhin
362a3(mdo sde): sems can sad mdzad mthong //bdag gis rgyal ba stong phrag mtha' yas pa//sems can btul nas sangs rgyas mdzad pa mdzad//lce steng byung ba'i mchil ma mi sa bor//
362a4(mdo sde): bzhin//de bzhin gshegs tshogs gnas su 'dir ba mthong //bdag gis sangs rgyas stong phrag mtha' yos pa//zhi bar 'gro ba mo la rgyus btab bzhin//'gro ba
362a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal khung sgro mya ngan bzlas//stobs bcu nyon mongs kun spangs 'das pa mthong //bdag gis rgyal ba stong phrag mtha' yas pa//'grel smon don mdzad ning
362a6(mdo sde): gdung bral//mya ngan 'das kyang skye bo mya ngan zlo//mya ngan 'das kyang bstan pa brjod pa mthong //de ltar 'gro la smin+da slad skyabs su mchi//dge ba bsngags pa 'di yis sangs
362a7(mdo sde): rgyas gyur//bdag nyid grol nas sems can khrag khrog dgrol//mgon med bdud zhags bcings pa zhi bar bgyi//de nas drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros kyis bcom
362b1(mdo sde): na 'dus de bzhin ga shegs pa dgu bcom pa pang dag par rdzogs pa skyes rgyas rnam pa sbyang ma da ngol pa da pa'i bu la tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs slo bcad pa rnams kyis mngon/
362b2(mdo sde): da na/dge 'i rna sa d+ma chubs sa 'i byung ba spyod par skye blu da mi bye ma ying gaN+DI mug spyo mim+b+hate/rnam su di pa mi skyed/rlom
362b3(mdo sde): myed kying ba mabyu//na m+b+ha yang /spyod sbrulal ma snang/ni mi ya mengs rmyi gnas su mthugs/rtog tu na mirma b+h+r-ir bad+d+ha m+b+ha ng+ge smyes/ni ma yang bdud kyilas kyi
362b4(mdo sde): ma bsgribs/nam yang bdud kyi las kyi bang du 'gro bar mA b+h+yo/nam yang byang chub kyi sems dang dril bar ma b+har/nim yang 'khor bas skye ba'i sems ma bskyed/sems can rna
362b5(mdo sde): da na pa dang ldan pa ma son pa nam yi dun pa med pa'i sems pa s+ho nga bskal pa brjo du myed pan mo yang sangs rgyas dang bral ba'i yang lta byed bam bskyed/nam yang
362b6(mdo sde): padang ldan pa'i yidi 'i byed pa ma /bsgyel pa brjod du med pa na ma yi skye ba dang ldan pa'i yid mi byung pa ma bskyod/rnams kyad yang byung bum bachim/nam
362b7(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral bar ma gyur/ne ma yang dmin pa'i sems dang ldan par me gyur/nam yang thams cad mkhyen pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba na/
363a1(mdo sde): gyur/nam yang dge ba'i bu shes gnyen dang bral bar ma gyur/nam yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs par ma gyur/num yang dge ba'i bags
363a2(mdo sde): gnyen dang mi ldan pa ma gyur/nam yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dngos por ma dmigs/den mo yang 'dus byas dang 'dusam byas kyi chos rnams tha dad par
363a3(mdo sde): mu bsams/dris nam ying dus gsum mnyam pa la stsa la ma lokI par ma bsten/des rnam yang dus gsum da migs par ma gyur to//'jam pa 'i de ji snya me
363a4(mdo sde): sminas/de'i tshe de'i dusan prang sring mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa sna mdu 'dzin na/'jam dudu la khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci
363a5(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i chu de'i dus na drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur te/de sgrib po med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyad pas
363a6(mdo sde): ji ltar dus brjod pa bzhin du de tsam du rgya cher snangs rgyas kyi gling yongs su dag par byas so//'jam dang khro lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dran po sangs
363a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pas sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyir rtsom pa mi dor ro//sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la mos par bya'o//yang 'jam
363b1(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de ston byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa
363b2(mdo sde): chen po mngon par 'dus byas so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i drug pa'i dra ba'i shugs dpag tu med cing rgya chen po bskyed de/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
363b3(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med cing bsam gyis mi khyab po nas brjod du med pa'i bar du rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas so//brtson thargyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i shugs/
363b4(mdo sde): brusam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa rgya chen po bskyed do//'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag to med/bisam gyis
363b5(mdo sde): mi khyab/mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa ni rin chen byung ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la de bzhi ni gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan phra bde bar gshegs
363b6(mdo sde): pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzang po'i lha zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/'jam
363b7(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa bzong po'i lha de'i tshe'i chang ni bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad cur gyur to//'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha'i gsung
364a1(mdo sde): dashal dge smrang mas pa'i blags zhes bya ba ni bAr+dz+dza sa rgyags padang ldan pa/na blo gros dang ldan pa/shin tu dran pa dang /nag shin tu/
364a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/shin tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sto ma bskyed sa rnyed pa/sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag por bya ba byas pa/rgyul po'i rigs las rab tu byung ste/
364a3(mdo sde): gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/lhan skrag pa/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lding mi gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nom spro pa'i blo gas ji tsam du mdzes pade tsam g+hi mdzes
364a4(mdo sde): pa'i sems can su'ang med de/de blta bas chog mi shes pa sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la bsnyen dkur byas pa/yongs su skyeng ba byas pa/tshad med pa'i chos nyid
364a5(mdo sde): lus nges par byung ba byang chub sems dra pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi rnyed de/'dod pa bzhin rnyed cing nyon mongs pa med par rnyed/tshogs med par rnyed nas 'dris par byas te/re zhig
364a6(mdo sde): nide bla na mang pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byung chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rta bar sems mi 'dzin no//byas pacu'i pha rol tu son pas 'did na sangs rgyas rgyu nad tshad med
364a7(mdo sde): pa rnams su 'gro'o//de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i lte ga la ba dor song ste phyin nas de
364b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag bcol nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge
364b2(mdo sde): slong mos pa'i blo gros nges de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gzings chen po bca' bar 'tshul ba dang zam pa chen po gdags par
364b3(mdo sde): 'tshal ba dang /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal brla 'tshal ba dang /sems can thams cad bsgral bar 'tshal ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su sbyang
364b4(mdo sde): bar 'tshal ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs ma mchis/bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa mi mchis/gzhal du ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa yongs su snang bar
364b5(mdo sde): 'tshal ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa yongs su dag pa bsgrub par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang la brtson par bgyi/de skad ces
364b6(mdo sde): gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lhas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong de dag dang yon tan tshad med pa gzhan yang bsgrub
364b7(mdo sde): par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam mo//mtshan mar 'du shes yid la mi
365a1(mdo sde): byed pa dang /nyin par 'du shes dang /grang ba ra 'du shes dang /dro ba 'du shes dang /bkrus par 'du shes dang /zas su 'du shes dang /rnam
365a2(mdo sde): du 'du shes dang /btung bar 'du shes dang /gos su 'du shes pa yid la mi byed pa dang /stobs su 'du shes pa yid la mi byed cing /'du shes thams cad yid la mi byed
365a3(mdo sde): par sgrub pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du byas te brtson 'grus bdum mo//sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa de khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams te/des
365a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brnams na sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du 'gyur ro//sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas
365a5(mdo sde): kyi zhing dpag tu med pa rnams yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i bor du yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//de nas dge slong
365a6(mdo sde): mos pa'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha des de bzhin du bstan cing gdams nas des 'du shes thams cad yid la ma byas te/sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar
365a7(mdo sde): pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad kyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsams nas spyod do//de nas bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad 'das pa dang /de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam
365b1(mdo sde): bapar zar pa la rab tu gnas par gyur nas/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcus nges par byung ste/des sprul pa khrag khrig rjod med pa mngon par sprul nas sbru la dad pa rnams la ltar
365b2(mdo sde): mngon par stsal/klu la dad pa rnams la klu ro/gnod sbyin le dad pa rnams la gnod sbyin du/dri ze la da pa rnams la dri zer/grul bum li dang pa rnams la grul bum du/
365b3(mdo sde): ma yin la dang pa rnams la lha ma yin du/nam mkha' lding la drad pa rnams la nam mkha' lding du/mi mchil dad pa rnams la mi 'am cir/lto 'phye chen po la dad pa rnams
365b4(mdo sde): la lto 'phye chen por mngon par sprul to//de ltar dge slong mis pa'i blo gros des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can sprul pa ji lta bu la dad pa bzhin du rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon
365b5(mdo sde): par sprul te/des der sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par byed pa'i sbyor bas myur du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa
365b6(mdo sde): dgra bajim pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i lha des dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mkhyen nas brtson 'grus kyi sa
365b7(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par rab tu mgu bar byas nas/de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
366a1(mdo sde): phyin pa shin tu bsngags so//de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha des brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa deng ldan pa'i gtum gyis de yang dag par dga' bar
366a2(mdo sde): byas/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu mgu bar byas nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge bar rtsa ba'i
366a3(mdo sde): shugs 'di lta bu rnyed de/de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs kyis nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te 'dug go/'jam dpal de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros par
366a4(mdo sde): snang la 'dug nas 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes rnyed de/gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dge thams//
366a5(mdo sde): cid kyi sngon gyi spyod pa shes/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes/sems can de dge thams cad kyi sems
366a6(mdo sde): dang spyod pa shes so//des ye shes de rnyed nas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la the tshom med cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa la'ang the
366a7(mdo sde): chom med de/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i/de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su band pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod do//stobs bcu stobs
366b1(mdo sde): dachang stobs rab stobs ldan pa//nor myang bshad cing sras rnams nor ldan mdzad//bde gshegs khyod kyi sras rnams nor mung rnyed//'gro 'di shin tu sdug bsngal nor ldan mdzad//
366b2(mdo sde): bde gshegs khyod kyi nor rnams gtor cing gos//rgyal ba khyod kyi sras mchog nor rnyed nas//dga' zhing 'gro la sman phra'i spyod mchog spyod//rgyal ma tshig rgyal dag dang 'dra
366b3(mdo sde): brla 'gyur//thob mchog khyod sras yon tan brgyas ldan pa//spyod pa'i dam pa mchog 'di rnam spyod lnga//skye bar nub cing rga shis gtses pa dang //'gro ba ldog bsnga lnga brgya ldan
366b4(mdo sde): gzing po rnams//sdug bsngal bdag med stong par rtogs pas na//shi 'phos 'gror mchis 'khor ba'i 'gror chags pa//mthong nas 'gro ba sdug bsngal bder 'god cing //
366b5(mdo sde): dag snying rje rlabs chen rnyed par 'gyur//'gro la sman sems snying rje bskyed nas su//'khor ba'i skyed pa bcom yang skye ba 'dzin//dge ba tshad med rnams kyang dran sogs shing //'gro/
366b6(mdo sde): ba rnams la sman bde zhi bar bgyid//log pa'i lam mchis sems can stong rnams ni//stobs bcus bstan pa'i lam mchog rnams su ste//zhi ba'i grong khyer zhi badre dge ba ni//
366b7(mdo sde): gang nas sngon gyi rang byung gshegs par bgod//de dag stong pa tshad med gtong ba ni//mgo lag mig bzang bu sdug de bzhin du//tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus ting nge 'dzin//
367a1(mdo sde): thos dran mkhas shing mos dang stobs lnga gnas//shing dbang drung du bdud sde bcas par btul//dpe med ye shes go 'phang mchog der rnyed//rang 'byung
367a2(mdo sde): sems can stong rnams khrid nas su//mi 'chi byung zhi bde ba zhi par gshegs//nam mkha' 'di la de ring bdag mchis nas//phyogs bcu'i stobs brtsam nor de bzhin gsung ///
367a3(mdo sde): rgyal sras rgyal ba'i yon tan spyod spyad nas//shin tu lung ston pa ni du ma mthong //de dag rang gi spyod thos dga' mgu ste//rab tu mdzum dmul yid ginyis the tshom bral//thal
367a4(mdo sde): mo sbyar te mngon par lus btud nas//stobs bcu yon tAn mnga' ba mkha' las bstod//de ring nam mkha' 'dir mchis bdag gis mthong //'khor ba brgyar ni rgyal srasa?/
367a5(mdo sde): dge spyad nas//dga' ldan lha yi gnas nas shi 'phros te//dri bral dpe med glang chen mchog gyur nas//lha yi gnas nas rab tu babs nas su//yum bde nyal ba'i
367a6(mdo sde): lhums su zhugs pa la//lha rnams stong gis shin tu rab mchod cing //lha mi lha mo rnams kyis gtsor bgyis bstod//de dag yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa na//lha
367a7(mdo sde): yi gnas 'dra rab tu mdzes par gyur//mngal gyis mi gos chu las pad ma ltar//yum la bde zhing yang bar gnas nas su//lha rnams brgya la rab tu chos bshad de//
367b1(mdo sde): lha mchog 'khor rnams dge ba'i lam du btsung //de dag cho sna chog rgya chen thos nas su//skom pas chu la sa bzhin bdud rtsi mthung //nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba
367b2(mdo sde): ni//rgyal sras dri med blo gros dran mkhas pa//yum gyi phyag gis shing gi yal ga bzung //mchan khung nas ni byung ba rab tu mthong //lha dang mi yi dbang pos rab mchod cing //
367b3(mdo sde): sa yi steng na 'jigs med gom pa 'dor//de yis thams cad phyogs su bltas nas su//'dzum dmul tshig spris nga 'dra khams gsum med//nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag
367b4(mdo sde): mchis mthong ba ni//rgyal sras mang po 'gro la sman dga' ba//grong dang grong khyer rin chen bltam pa yi//rab tu 'byor zhing ldan pa'i snga bor te//bral glang rmig pas bcings
367b5(mdo sde): pa bcad pa ltar//blo gros mchog gis khyim chags bsal bcom ste//'gro la sman slad dpa' bo mngon par byung //sdug bsngal zhi zhing srid zad bdud rtsi tshal//nam mkha'i
367b6(mdo sde): ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni//rgyalo sras brtul zhugs dka' thub drag spyad de//skyil mo krung bcas byang chub shing dbang drung //g.yo can bdud btul byang chub dam pa
367b7(mdo sde): reg/rgyal ba thams cad dang ni mnyam rnyeng nas//zhi dga' bde gnas zhing mchog lnga bzhin du//smon lam rgyo chen bdag gis 'dir rdzogs te//'khor brgyar legs spyad brtul
368a1(mdo sde): zhugs 'di grub bo//nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni//phyogs bcu'i stobs bcu shin tu mang po dag/'khor lo rgyu chen rab tu
368a2(mdo sde): bskor ba ni//pha rol rgol 'dul 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zhi//skal yod 'gro ba rnams kyi nyon mongs bcom//mun pa'i rdul bsal 'gro rnams bde ba byin//'jig
368a3(mdo sde): rten gtso bo rnams kyis de thos nas//'khor bri'i rgyud besngal ma song phyogs su song //de ring nam mkha' 'di la bdag mchis nas//rgyal ba brgya dag lho myi 'khor 'du
368a4(mdo sde): zhing //lce mi gnas nas 'grol snying brje yid //'jig rten drug no rab tu zhugs pa mthong //rgyal ba brgya phrag du ma gzhan dag kyang //'khor bzang song zhi bar rdul
368a5(mdo sde): med gnas//lha mi brargyu rnams yid dgar gyur nas su//ring bsrel dam pa de la mchod pa mthong //'jig rten gtso bo rkang gnyis mchog khyod la//lha dang mi dang
368a6(mdo sde): khyim bdag khyod drung mchis//zhal na ste zhi rab chos kyi rang bzhin thos//khyod kyi spyod ldan myur du skyabs su 'gro//mi dbang khyod kyi yon tan yang dag bstod//khyu mchog
368a7(mdo sde): pon byed stobs bcu yon tan 'chang //zhi bar ldan zhing dul bzhi pa rnyed//'khor ba'i rgyud bral 'jigs med phyogs su song //bde gshegs mi yi seng ge khyod kyi
368b1(mdo sde): myanus// m+bu chog khyod kyang steng gi mkhar gnas pa//mngon shes lnga lam+b+ha nyams pa myed rnyed nas//phyogs bcur 'khor rgyud rab 'byam rnam mang bya//mtshungs med du ma/
368b2(mdo sde): de ring mthong ba ni//rgyal ba'i yon tan sna tshogs dri med spyod//yang dge yon tan gyis ni de dge bstod//rgyal ba khyod kyi yon tan mtha' mi rnyed//don su dge slong mos po/
368b3(mdo sde): blo gros des de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bstod nas dge bo'i rtsa ba des phyin chad bskal pa brjod du med par rnam yang mngon
368b4(mdo sde): pa shes pa lce dang bral bar ma gyur te/mngon par shes pa lnga drung ldan par gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na sems can dmyal ba dang /dung 'gro'i skye gnas
368b5(mdo sde): dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten spangs par byas/lha mu yin gyi ris thams cad yongs su chud tsong mi kham pa thams cad chud par gyur to//de smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas
368b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing der yang dang yang skyes pa ni sems can rnams kyis srungs rgyas thog mar byung ba bzhin du shin tu ngo mtshar du shes te/gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa de dang der glang de
368b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa byung ba de na ltas 'byung ba de dag de skye ba'i ltas su byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba na ltas gang 'byung ba de dag kyang mngon par
369a1(mdo sde): shes pa lnga thob nas byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na ltas gang byung ba de dag des mngon par shes pa lnga bshad pa'i tshe'ang
369a2(mdo sde): de dag byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa che'i 'dra byed 'dor ba'i tshe ltas gang byung ba de'i tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba'i tshe'ang lces de dag byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
369a3(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe ltas gang byung ba de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na'adi ltas de dgu byung ngo //des tshe rab sa re re lha'ang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa the
369a4(mdo sde): po chen po la btul/sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la btul to//re zhig ni byang chub sems dpa' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
369a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par songs ma rgyas te/sangs rgyas kyi bya ba de lta bu dag sems can rnams la bstan to//'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong mos pa'i blo/
369a6(mdo sde): gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhun yin pa snyam du yid gnyis drang the tshom zon/'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jom dpal de bzhin gshe
369a7(mdo sde): pa don thams cad grub pa de'i tshe de'i dus ni dge slong mas pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to//'jam dpal de lta bas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang
369b1(mdo sde): dag par sgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge slong mos pa'i blo gros brtson 'grus kyi stobs gang dang ldan par gyur pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs de lta bu dang ldan
369b2(mdo sde): par bya'o//brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshigs chung ngus sems mnyam par gzhog par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
369b3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dbang po'i don las sems slar sdud de/dbang po'i dran la'ang dbang po'i don mi dmigs
369b4(mdo sde): shing drabang po'i don ni dbang po'i don gyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong //dbang po'i don dang dbang po'i mtshan ma'ang ma dmigs/gang gis dbang po'i mtshan mar dmigs pa
369b5(mdo sde): de'ang mi dmigs so////bam po gsum pa//'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa tshad med/grangs med/bsam gyis mi khya
369b6(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na bdud rtsi snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/'dzum dpal bdud rtsi'i snying po'i bskal po de
369b7(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
370a1(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //'a
370a2(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa de byung ba'i tshe/thams cad kyi thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bral ba'i sgra ma byung ngo //gang sems can
370a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sgra dri'ang sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par
370a4(mdo sde): gnon pa de'i rime gro byed pa dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig yod de/don shes chos shes/dus shes/tshod shes/bdag shes/'khor shes/byang
370a5(mdo sde): zag rab drang tha ma shes te/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa la bskal pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/yid du mi 'ong
370a6(mdo sde): bas ma yin no//nges bshad pa rnams kyang bzung ste/bdag gi don yang mi gtang ngo //ngas bskal pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gi bar du 'dod pa'i 'du shes mi bskyed/
370a7(mdo sde): gnod sems kyi 'du shes ma bskyed/rnam par 'chi ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed/srog dang ldan pa dang /gang zag dang ldan pa'i rtog pa ma bskyed/dngos po dang ldan pa'ang ma
370b1(mdo sde): yin/chos dang ldan pa'ang ma smin/chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'ang ma bskyed/gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'ang ma yin/rnam par/
370b2(mdo sde): 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'ang ma yid/nye du la rtog pa'ang me yin/nye du ma yin pa la rtog pa'ang ma yin/shes pa la rtog pa'ang ma yin/mi shes pa la rtog pa'ang mi yin//
370b3(mdo sde): ljongs la rtog pa'ang ma yin/mi dga' bar rtog pa'ang ma bskyed/sems can dang ldan pa'i rtog pa'ang mi bskyed/srog dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/gang zag dang ldan pa'ang ma
370b4(mdo sde): yin/dngos po dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/chos dang ldan pa'ong ma yin/chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang mi yin/mtshan ma dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mtshan ma med pa dang
370b5(mdo sde): ldan pa'ang ma yin/smon lam dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/smon lam ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang me yin/'khor ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'ang
370b6(mdo sde): ma yin/ye shes dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ye shes mi yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'ang me yin/sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin//
370b7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/nyan thos dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/nyan thos ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin
371a1(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/so so'i skye bo ma yin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/rnam par rtog pa med
371a2(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa'ang ma bskyed de/'du shes thams cod dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms/rtog pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas dge ba'i
371a3(mdo sde): rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la nam yang bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur te/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa la bsnyen bkur
371a4(mdo sde): byas/bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la des g.yog dang bsnyen bkur byas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bsnyen cing bsgoms te/
371a5(mdo sde): mong du byas pas ngo phyin chad bskal pa brjod du med pa'i bar du sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing du na ma yong ma skyes/nam yang zhing du 'du shes dang sangs rgyas su 'du shes kyang ma
371a6(mdo sde): skyes/nam yang byang chub kyi sems rgyun du mi 'byung bar ma gyur/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bstan bkur dang g.yog byas/sangs
371a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sprul pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/gang dang gang du sprul pa sprul pa de dang de na sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas byung ba snyam
371b1(mdo sde): du shes te/rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can de dag la ston to//gang dang gang du sprul pa sprul pa de dang der sems can ji lta bu la mos pa de lta bur sprul pa sprul te 'dul
371b2(mdo sde): ba'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud dang sbyar te rnam par 'dul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sprul pa rnam pa du mA re sprul to//sprul pa de dag gos kyang gzhan yang sprul te bstan to//'jam
371b3(mdo sde): dpal 'di lta ste dper na sgyum mkhan gyis sprul pa mngon par stsol te/sgyu ma mkhan gyis spel pa de dag gis kyang sprul pa gzhan mngon par sprul pa de bzhin du/'jam dpal dge
371b4(mdo sde): slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis kyang sprul pa mngon par sprul te/sprul pa de dag gis kyang gzhin mngon par sprul to//'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong
371b5(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyami du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni thams cing
371b6(mdo sde): grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus nA dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya bar gyur to//'jam dpal de lta bas ni sgrub pa med pa'i rnam par thor pA la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
371b7(mdo sde): chen pos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bston par bya/bsgom par bya/ming du bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di'ang
372a1(mdo sde): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'byung ngo //'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus/bskal pa tshad med grangs med/
372a2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi'ang chus pha rol na bskal po'i snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/bskal pa'i
372a3(mdo sde): snying po'i bskal po de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/blod bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen
372a4(mdo sde): bri/skyes bu 'dul ba'i khu lo sgyur ba blan med pa/lha dang mI rnams kyi sbyin bsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshungs pa med pa'i gaN+DI brjid khyod ces bya ba 'jig rten tu byung
372a5(mdo sde): ste/'jam dpal de bzhin go shugs pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzi brjid 'od de'i 'od kyis shwar phyogs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur/
372a6(mdo sde): phyogs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur/nub phyogs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur/bying phyogs su gang+gA'i
372a7(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur/de bzhin du shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /byang shar dang /steng dang /'og dang phyogs bcu kun tu
372b1(mdo sde): phyogs re rer yang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzi brjid 'od de'i 'od kyi snang bar gyur to//sems can gang de'i 'od kyis
372b2(mdo sde): reg pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lus phyir mi ldog par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzi brjid 'od de'i 'jig
372b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las
372b4(mdo sde): 'das nas/byang chub sems dpa' de dag phal cher bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can brjod du med pa rnams theg
372b5(mdo sde): pa gsum gyis rab tu 'god do//yang de'i tshe de'i dus ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/'jig rten gyi khams de ni byang chub sems dpa'
372b6(mdo sde): ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi mchog byed de/des byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
372b7(mdo sde): pa de dag gi dam pa'i chos dus dang po dang /bar ma dang /tha ma gsum du bzung ngo zhes de ltar smon lam btab bo//'jam dpal de ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
373a1(mdo sde): dus ji lta ba bzhin dus sa' 'jig rten gyi khams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rtogs par sangs rgyas te/sems can dpa
373a2(mdo sde): tu med cing brjod du med pa rnams kyi don byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su myo ngan las 'das so//de bzhin go shegs pa de dag thams cad
373a3(mdo sde): kyi dam pa'i chos dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po des dus thog ma dang /bar ma dong /tha ma gsum du bzong ngo //de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten du stegs ma lnga byung
373a4(mdo sde): ste/sems can skal ba med par gyur nas dam pa'i chos nub pa de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' de phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur tI bstan bcos
373a5(mdo sde): grong 'jig rten gyi don du 'gyur ba chos dang ldan pa de khong du chud nas rab tu ston pa 'odi lta ste/snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /mchod sbyin gyi rig byong dang
373a6(mdo sde): srid srung gi rig byed dang /sgra'i bstan bcos rnams dang /gtan tshigs kyi bstan bcos rnams dang /gso ba'i bstan bcos rnams dang /nor sbyar dang dug dang sngogs dang
373a7(mdo sde): sman gyi rgyud dngong /dus 'khor ba dang /dus dang /gza' dang /rgya skur shes pa'ang rab tu ston to//sems can rnams la phan pa dang ljon pa'i bzo'i gnas thams
373b1(mdo sde): ston to//rnam sangs nas byung ba na de'i 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal par gyur te/rgyal po'i sring bar nas 'kho dang bzlas te/khyim nas khyim med byang rab tu byung /
373b2(mdo sde): rab tu byung des de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bstan pa'ang kun 'dzin/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi ring bsrel la'ang mchod po rnam pa mang pos rab tu sbyor bar
373b3(mdo sde): te//skye bo'i tshogs dpag tu med pa rnams spangs rgyas la mchod pa byed du 'jug par gyur/dam pa'i chos dang ldan pa dang /sangs rgyas drang ldan pa dang /sangs rgyas
373b4(mdo sde): tshang ba dang ldan pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang ldan blo dang /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing sems can thams
373b5(mdo sde): cad dang thun mong du byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dgu pa'i phyir yang yongs su bsngos so//'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi rgyal po ngos byang chub sems dpa'
373b6(mdo sde): thanas da byung chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa la de lta 'i tshul dro 'a ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gras/bzhugs pa dang yangs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag thams cadang
373b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa gzhan gyi'ang dam po'i chos dus thog ma dang /bar ma dang /tha ma gsum du bzung ste/'od kyang de lo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams
374a1(mdo sde): kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan na//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par 'byung ba ma yin/
374a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzo brjid 'di de 'dra de'i tshe mya ngan lngas ma 'dus te/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin gyi rgyal po de banam ldan 'das
374a3(mdo sde): debazhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzi brjid 'od kye zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing du smon lam gyi dbang gis yang dang yang skyes nas/de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i stobs
374a4(mdo sde): des de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byas te/de'i tshe bzhino gshegs pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
374a5(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung bstan to//dge ba'i rtsa ba gang la brten pas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag ce na/'di lta ste/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
374a6(mdo sde): lho 'jug pa dang /dus gsum gyi chos thams cad mnyam par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag ga/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas
374a7(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams tha dad par mi mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dang bral bar mthong bas dge slong sprin
374b1(mdo sde): gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go//chos thams cad ma skyes ma 'gags par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go
374b2(mdo sde): chos thams cad 'ong ba'ang ma yon 'gro ba'ang ma yin par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/chos thams cad gnas med par mthong
374b3(mdo sde): bras dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab
374b4(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go//chos thams cad brjod du med par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go//chos thams cad la
374b5(mdo sde): bdag med par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go//chos thams cad la sems can mod par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes
374b6(mdo sde): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/chos thams cad la srog med por mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go//chos thams cad la gang
374b7(mdo sde): zag med par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go//chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes
375a1(mdo sde): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings las byung bar mthong bas dge slong sbyin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
375a2(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag go/de ltar chos kyi dbyings las chos thams cad byung bar mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag ste//
375a3(mdo sde): ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rnyed de/de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rnyed pos ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la
375a4(mdo sde): 'phags te/de bar snang la 'dug nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
375a5(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/la la ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor/la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can rnams 'dul/la la ni tsho'i
375a6(mdo sde): 'du byed 'dor/la la ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'dras pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mthong ste/mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
375a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshungs pa med pa'i gzi brjid 'od de lo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do//bskal pa
375b1(mdo sde): bye ba mang por 'khor ba na//sbyin pa mtha' yas pa dag rgya cher stsal//bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rab 'dri zhing //sbyin gnas mang po dag la bdag gis bsnyen//'ji
375b2(mdo sde): rten rig pa'i 'jig rten mngon grogs pa//spyan ldan dri med ces bgyi mkhyen pa de//ri rab brtsegs 'dra bsod nams brgya yi mtshan//byang chub 'tshal slad de la rim gro bgyi
375b3(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig drug cu mtha' yas pa//de yi dge 'dun bde gshegs sras la yang //lo bye khrag khrig bdun cu'i bar du ni//rgyal ba nyan thos bcas la bsnyen bkur bgyis//dada'
375b4(mdo sde): zhing mos pa mngon par bskyed nas su//zas skom rnam mang yid du 'ong ba dag/bde bar gshegs la bdag gis dbul ba phul//'on kyang bde gshegs des bdag lung ma bstan//
375b5(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus tshe sangs rgyas byung ba ni//mkhyen pa 'jig rten mgon po mya ngan srel//me rtse sprin ces pa yi de bzhin gshegs//nyan thos bcas pa rgyal de bsnyen bkur bgyis//
375b6(mdo sde): 'dren pa de la lo bye drug cu bzhir//bdag gis 'khor dang bcas la bkur sti bgyis//bdag gis ye shes yang snga pa ma sbyangs pas//'on kyang bde gshegs nges bdag lung
375b7(mdo sde): ma bstan//'ongs pa'i dus na 'dren pa byung ba ni//ye shes rgya mtsho zhes kyang phyogs su grags//chos rgyal de yi 'khor du gyur pa ni//bye ba khrag khrig drug nur tshang ba lags//
376a1(mdo sde): bdag gis rgyal mchog nyan thos bcas de la//lo bye dgu bcu'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyis//byang chub dam pa 'tshal ba'i slad du 'dir//bdag gis sbyi
376a2(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas rgya cher stsal//mya ngan 'das par gyur nus lo lnga nas//bde gshegs nyan thos dag la bkur sti bgyis//bshos dang sems kyi rnam par rab tu sbyar//dran
